story:
Short Summary

My name is Isaac Henry and I am from Champaign, Illinois. My sister and I have always dreamed of starting a YouTube PC Gaming channel where we could play the latest games for the public's entertainment. Currently, all we have is a store bought Dell laptop that isn't at all ready for recording gameplay and rendering/editing video footage. We have been trying to save money for the past few months and were thinking that we would definitely need some help from some other people...That's when we found Indiegogo. We thought we would give it a shot and see what would come out of it. A little background about us. I am a musician myself. I have been playing viola for about 5 years now and I also play horn and alto sax. I'm the principle violist of the East Central Illinois Youth Orchestra (ECIYO). I am also a composer and I need a powerful machine to run the composition software. My sister is and artist and a potter. She has done some stellar work making pottery and other crafts. We were planning to try to open a store to start selling her amazing work and we couldn't do that without a good PC to do business on.

One of my sisters bowls:

Here is one of my performances in Smith Hall on the University of Illinois Campus:

Here is one of my compositions, it's titled Taiga:




What We Need & What You Get

We are planning to raise $2,500 USD to go towards our custom computer build. We use www.pcpartpicker.com to pick out the parts for our build. The fund will go directly to the purchase of the parts. All who donate will get exclusive perks via our YouTube channel and some extra perks for giveaways on our channel. We also will share pictures of the final build and might give away some extra hardware. 

The Impact

This campaign will help us live our dream of creating our YouTube channel and entertaining the people of gaming. We will also be able to work on developing our skills and working to better ourselves in our individual talents. Lauryn (my sister) will work to better her potting skills and start her store and I will be able to work on my musicality and become a better musician. And we both plan to become better gamers as well!

story:
Apresentação

Aloha! Meu nome é Evaldo Bragança .  Eu sou Designer Gráfico formado desde 2011 e comecei a trabalhar com jogos recentemente.

Nossa equipe também conta com a Talita ( Solar), a Jessica ( Jazz), e nosso broder João Rodrigues  (Jonny) que também é um surfista.


Meu nome de surfista é Dimmy Tsunami , e eu estou aqui pra te contar melhor sobre nosso projeto e um pouco de mim.

Sou apaixonado por games e artes e esse é o meu trabalho, que será muito bem reconhecido se você me apoiar nessa!

VAMOS AJUDAR ESSA TURMINHA! LETS HELP WHO REALLY NEEDS!

Essa campanha é para arrecadar fundos para o lançamento do jogo completo. Um jogo para android de aventura que conta a história da evolução do surfista desde o início da sua jornada no mundo do surfe até poder realmente pegar uma onda e se tornar um surfista de verdade.

Nós realmente temos como plano de fundo o desenvolvimento sustentavel, e a integração dos humanos com o meio ambiente.

Nossa intenção é usar parte do dinheiro arrecadado para as crianças carentes, creches e escolas do litoral norte de São paulo no Brasil e futuramente outros lugares.

Para que isso aconteça precisamos de um incentivo do seu apoio! Pra que possamos fazer tudo isso e muito mais. Então vocês estará colaborando com um projeto social e muito divertido, como um patrocinador!


Short Summary


Aloha! My name is Evaldo Bragança, I'm a graphic designer graduated since 2011 and started working with development of games lately.



The campaign is to raise funds to launch the full game Surf Monsters! An Android game of adventure account of the evolution of surfer since the beginning of your journey into the world of surfing yet who can actually catch a wave of truth and in fact become a surfer.

We clearly have as background the planet's sustainable development, and the integration of humans with the environment.

We intend to use part of the money to needy children entities of the North Coast.

On a deeper aspect makes the game a review major industries that currently exist and are not concerned with the evolutionary process of the planet earth.


O que nós temos / precisamos

Nós precisamos de pelo menos R$ 1.500 reais pra dar continuidade no projeto, mas mesmo se conseguir menos tá valendo viu? Se arrecadarmos esse tanto vai rolar evento e aula de surf pra galera! :D Além de distribuição de brindes e outras coisinhas.

Queremos fazer um evento no dia das crianças ainda esse ano!!!!

Lá em Maresias (São Sebastião) no dia 12/10/2014, mas pra acontecer isso precisamos arrecadar algum dinheiro se não não vai rolar!! Por isso é muito importante que você participe. Surf Monstros agradece :D


O que nós conseguirmos arrecadar já vai ajudar a fazer o jogo completo e melhores versões.

Desse total que a gente conseguir vai ser o seguinte:

20% - Marketing

30% - Design

25%- Crianças Carentes

15%- Programação

10% - Produção do vídeo



Para essas crianças nós pretendemos dar alguns brinquedos produzidos pela marca surf monstros distribuídas nas nossas tendas e também nas escolas estaduais. Além do evento em Maresias no dia das crianças que vai ser pra divertir a galera.

Se você realmente nos ajudar é só colocar o seu endereço que enviaremos pelo correio com FRETE GRÁTIS.

Vai um adesivo aí?


Pra colar no cachorro, no gato, no irmãozinho mais novo?


Apesar de já termos feito a versão compacta do jogo, nós queremos fazer a versão completa com todos os monstrinhos pegando ondas e se aventurando nas praias mais divertidas.

Nós vamos usar o tanto que conseguirmos de dinheiro, independente de alcançar a nossa meta ou não.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $ 7,000 to get the project to continue. Of this total raised will do the distribution as follows:

40% - Marketing

30% - Design

10% - Programming

15% - Production Video

5% - Needy Children



For Children we want to give they some toys, producing with surf monstros landmark. Dustribuite at our points of sale and in organizations and state schools.

The marketing we need to pay all the advertisers on google, radio, buss and subway of the city of São Paulo to do our publicity campain.

If you realy perk, send us an email with your adrees to send to you the products

free shipping



Despite having already released a version of the game, we want to do the full version with all the monsters catching waves and venturing in the most fun beaches.

We will use as much we raise, regardless whether we have reached the goal or not, all the money goes to the development of the game.

O impacto


Nossa missão é mostrar pras crianças de uma maneira divertida a história de como o mundo ficou cheio de monstrinhos depois da grande poluição e que não está tudo perdido. Aqui está como eles podem ajudar a salvar de verdade o nosso planeta. Sendo um bom surfista, aprendendo um esporte, destruindo esses seres poluídos!

Para contar essa historinha nós usamos personagens fictícios no decorrer das fases, dando dicas importantes de como surfar  com boas doses de bom humor. Além de mostrar as garotas bonitas que achamos no meio do caminho, as vezes muito parecidas com artistas de cinema!


Tornando as pessoas mais conscientes de como ser uma pessoa melhor, e envolvida com o universo.

Então nós esperamos que você desfrute desse grande projeto que é para entreter pessoas, e ajudar os menos privilegiados sairem das ruas e drogas e virem para o mundo do surfe, dar assistencia pscicológica e tecnica para todos eles e ensinar pra quem nunca teve oportunidade de pegar uma prancha e nem surfar na vida.

Não é apenas para gerar lucros, nós somos um projeto social!


The Impact

Our mission is to provide children with a fun story of how the world was full of monsters after pollution and that all is not lost. Here is how children can do much to help our planet. Is being good surfer, is learning to play a sport, be battling these beings polluted!






To tell this story, we use fictional characters over the course of the phases, give important tips on how to surf   with good  humor. Besides showing the scrapes and the beautiful girls that we find along the way, often like those movie stars!


So we hope you join this super project that aims to entertain people, and help
underprivileged children off the streets and live for surfing, give psychological and technical assistance to all of them and also those who have never had
opportunity to learn to surf.

It is not just to generate profits, our project has a social character.


Riscos e desafios

Colocar stands na praia para ensinar pessoas a surfar, nossos alunos de todas as idades sobre esse maravilhoso e satisfatório esporte que faz do atleta uma pessoa feliz e mais saudável.

Surf monstros é muito mais que um jogo, é um portal para o surfe!  Onde todos  que quiserem encontrar a verdadeira felicidade são muito bem vindos. Nós temos muitas influências do graffiti e a arte de rua.

Nosso desafio é promover o esporte de uma maneira única e diferente, lutando contra nossos concorrentes para beneficiar a humanidade. Temos a competição com nossos concorrentes mas quem não tem?

O desafio é agregar mais pessoas ao surfe, tirar crianças das drogas e trazer pro surf.


Risks & Challenges

Put furniture stands on the beaches to teach our students of all ages about this wonderful and rewarding sport that the athlete makes a happier and healthier person.

Surf Monsters is much more than a game, is a gateway to the surf! Where all who wish to find true happiness is very welcome. We have many influences of graffiti and street art.

Our challenge is to promote the sport in a unique and different way, fighting against our competitors to benefit mankind. We risk the wrath of our competitors, but who ever?




Outras formas que você pode ajudar


Se você não tem nada de dinheiro pra nos ajudar, fique tranquilo, você também pode promover nas redes sociais, falar com seus amigos, tios, tias, sobrinhos, papagaios, cachorros, andorinhas todo mundo eh bem vindo aqui falô? Comartilhe siga-nos no twitter e no facebook curta a nossa fanpage!

www.facebook.com/surfmonstros

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have no money to helpus, take it easy, you can promote our campaign in social networks, talk to your friends nephews, nieces, uncles and aunts, everyone you know! Share!


Pôsters


Aqui estão alguns posters pra vocês! Ajude-nos e ganhe um pôster para as crianças colorirem, ou até mesmo pra você colocar no seu quarto! Pode mandar pra gente depois que nós colocamos no site e no facebook brodinhos!


There are our posters for you, help us and bring a poster to your children or young broders, to color! Send to us after color, we´ll post on our web site and facebook broders!

There is Angelina Pôster, we love Angelina!

Our Siren Pôster

Pôster Surfer 001


Pôster surf 002


Pôster 03

Então você pode escolher um desses pôsters quando você fizer uma doação (perk)! Pegue o poster da angelina e mande pras suas crianças proximas, irmãozinhos, primos... E deixe que eles se divirtam colorindo, depois você pode até enviar pra gente ver como ficou e postar no site!

Entra no nosso site e dá uma olhadinha

www.surfmonstros.com

Choose one of these poster qhen you perk! Get the Angelina poster and send to your children, young broders, cousins. And let they send to us the art, we´ll post ate our website and facebook.

Visit our website and see our other images!


Adesivos

Escolha qualquer personagem que está no jogo, aqui estão alguns adesivos que você pde ganhar se nos ajudar. Coloque na sua bike, cachorro, jaqueta, violão, irmão mais novo ... é só acessar o site www.surfmonstros.com e escolher! Se você contribuir nós entraremos em contato.


Stickers

So you can choose any character you want that is in the game, there are some of stickers you can get if you perk. Put it on your plank, bike, room, dog, mom. friends, jacket, guitar ... Just acess www.surfmonstros.com  and choose one! If you perk we´ll contact you.

THE 25th people who perks us win a primer of stickers!!!! (9unit)


OS 25 primeiros que fizerem doações ganha uma cartela com 9 adesivos! VAMOS LÁ VAMOS FAZER ACONTECER!

E aí quem topa formar uma turma igual essa aqui?
So Who accept to do a class like this there?




               OBRIGADO A TODOS, NOS VEMOS EM BREVE!
ALOHAAA ;)

Thank you everybody, see you!

LETS HELP MANY CHILDREN MY FRIENDS!


ALOHA

story:
Hello, my name is Damien Muth or Muth303. I stream full time on the site www.twitch.tv/muth303 . I have just last month started a 1 year streaming challenge, this is to stream every day 11am PST till 5pm PST for 1 entire year. The reason for this challenge is to expand and grow my channel hopefully into a source of revenue and set my self up for a career later in my life.

 

 I have saved up enough money to go for the entire year, but after some unfortunate issues with my computer and internet I have spent some money to repair the issues. This means I am out some money for the year stream. I am asking for $2000... I know it's a lot. The money is going towards internet bills, green screen, as well as food for the last few months of the stream. 


Thank you everyone for your consideration and helping me achieve my goals and further my life. :)


    Risks & Challenges

    The only risks are if the campaign does not get funded. If this happens I may or may not have to cut back streaming hours to accommodate a part time job

      Other Ways You Can Help

      You can also donate to the stream from here


       https://streamtip.com/t/muth303


      You can also spread this Campaign through twitter by clicking here


      http://ctt.ec/Wg1Vr

story:
We believe that the future of gaming cannot continue to ignore the dangers of screen-based games and "gamification" strategies. With technology that is already on the market today it is possible to make games that promote a healthy & active lifestyle, cultivate a culture of curiosity and learning, and help develop vital social and communication skills. Most importantly, we believe that when games are made this way, they can become some of the most enjoyable and memorable experiences we can have with our family and friends.

We currently have 2 such games in development.

Why are we running this campaign

This is not a fund-raising campaign. We intend to immediately follow this up with another campaign around the game platform and the games themselves. For the moment, we are looking to validate our premise, and identify and build a small community of people who are on the same page as us.

Backing us with $1 now will let us know that you truly dig the idea and want to see this happen, and that you don't mind having a conversation with us (at your convenience) about what you like and dislike about games and gaming as they currently are. Your vote with a dollar will help us demonstrate a small but strong chorus of support for our mission.

What happens to the funds raised anyway

We will be in touch with our community via online and offline mediums. The money raised via the $1  pledge will go towards covering a part of our postal costs. We will also send you a personalized Thank You! note on the day we release our first game.
story_txt: We believe that the future of gaming cannot continue to ignore the dangers of screen-based games and "gamification" strategies. With technology that is already on the market today it is possible to make games that promote a healthy & active lifestyle, cultivate a culture of curiosity and learning, and help develop vital social and communication skills. Most importantly, we believe that when games are made this way, they can become some of the most enjoyable and memorable experiences we can have with our family and friends.We currently have 2 such games in development.Why are we running this campaignThis is not a fund-raising campaign. We intend to immediately follow this up with another campaign around the game platform and the games themselves. For the moment, we are looking to validate our premise, and identify and build a small community of people who are on the same page as us.Backing us with $1 now will let us know that you truly dig the idea and want to see this happen, and that you don't mind having a conversation with us (at your convenience) about what you like and dislike about games and gaming as they currently are. Your vote with a dollar will help us demonstrate a small but strong chorus of support for our mission.What happens to the funds raised anywayWe will be in touch with our community via online and offline mediums. The money raised via the $1  pledge will go towards covering a part of our postal costs. We will also send you a personalized Thank You! note on the day we release our first game.

story:
Ski Jump VR is a ski jumping simulator. The game will be available for PC, HTC Vive and Oculus, also on Steam (Greenlight link) and for those who have cardboard and a phone with a gyro. That will be possible using Riftcat. The game will include ta least 10 hills and 3 modes that you can play. It will also give you the possibility to play with the controller, the mouse or try some real jumping in room-scale setup.

 


My name is Dariusz Pietrala, I am from Poland and I am also knowned as Pixel Perfect Dude, the creator of Ski Jump for mobile. The game that currently has almost 3 mln downloads. With this game I'll be getting help from 3D artist that are currently working on some awesome AAA games.

 


There will  be few modes that you can choose from:

  • Real jumping - room-scale setup with HTC Vive, controlling your player in air with head position and controllers position
  • VR standard mode - controlling your player with head tracking and with mouse or a controller
  • VR basic - controlling everything with the mouse/controller
  • non-VR - controlling everything with the mouse/controller (probably with no head rotation)

These are some of the concepts of gameplay:

Hill sizes available in the game at launch:



 


The game will be available for PC, HTC Vive and Oculus.
 

 


2000$ - game is funded

YES! This will really help us make the game a bit faster and better. The game is already in production so basically this is just to show us that you care.

5000$ - additional hills

Reaching this goal will get you additional 5 hills, so it will be 15 total

10000$ - additional hills + designing skis

Here you will get 5 more hills (that'll make 25 total) and the ability to design your own skis in game.

25000$ - 35 hills total + multiplayer

Here you will get 5 more hills (that'll make 25 total) and a multiplayer mode with global contests and tournaments every few minutes.

50000$ - What? You're serious?

We don't know yet. If we get anywhere near we will figure this out ;)

 


Not many, cause this is what we got right now:

  • beta version running on Android, very good feedback, players do like the game
  • all the physics solved
  • lots of game dev experience
  • game in development and will be finished regardless of the indiegogo campaign results

story:
Ritual Motion - Warrior Gaming Skins

Ritual Motion Warrior Gaming Skins are the newest staples in gaming gear. Hand-stitched in the USA, our Gaming Skins are designed by gamers for gamers and offer ultimate comfort and function. 

 

Sizing

- Small/Youth: Height below 5'4" tall or ring finger size below 8 

- Medium/Large: Height between 5’5" and 6’3” or ring finger size up to 13 

- X-Large: Height over 6’4” or ring finger size 14 and up

 

We have just announced our first stretch goal!

For those new to Indiegogo, a stretch goal is when we set a funding amount and a reward if we reach that funding amount. It's a way for us to keep the momentum going in our campaign and also reward YOU for helping us spread the word.

If we reach $25,000 in funding, then every backer will receive a $10 credit in the Ritual Motion Web Store!

 

 

At Ritual Motion our mission is simple:

Help gamers and streamers feel great, perform their best, and build their communities.

To do that, we are bringing you unique gaming gear and products that can truly make a difference.

Our products are designed to reduce fatigue and injury, enhance performance, and extend gameplay. 

At the same time, we are building a powerful Ritual Motion Affiliate Platform, where a growing community of affiliated gamers can promote their own brands by marketing custom-designed products to subs.

The proceeds from this campaign will allow us to complete the build-out of our Affiliate Platform and support those gamers and streamers dedicated to turning their favorite pastime into a meaningful and sustainable career.

 

Why Warrior Gaming Skins? 

It all starts with Ritual Motion Warrior Gaming Skins because Happy Hands = More Game Time = More Wins. What could be better than that?

 

Features and Benefits:

Manufactured in the USA

- Each pair of our Warrior Gaming Skins is individually printed and hand-stitched right here in the USA. Check out how they are made... 

Extending Your Game Time

- The Skins’ moisture-wicking, compression fabric increases blood flow, reduces muscle fatigue, and boosts your overall performance. 

 

Keeping You Comfy

- Gaming has never been more comfortable! The Warrior 1 Skin’s exclusive flex-stitching contours to and moves with your hands like a second skin. Its fingerless, lightweight design provides flexibility, stabilization, and full range of motion. You’ll forget you’re even wearing them!

Get into the Skins, and get into the game.

 

DELIVERY BY X-MAS!

 

Bold Designs

We offer Warrior Gaming Skins in a number of Ritual Motion 'House', 'Special Edition' and 'Curated' designs. We’re also offering a limited number of ‘Custom Design’ Perks and instant registration to our Affiliate Network. When we reach our funding goal, we will complete the build-out of our Affiliate Platform and bring 100% custom design capability to our entire gaming community.

 

Extra Support

If you are looking for extra wrist support, then our Warrior 2 Gaming Skin is what you need. Built-in wrist straps allow you to adjust the compression around your wrists for maximum comfort and support.

 

Sizing

- Small/Youth: Height below 5'4" tall or ring finger size below 8 

- Medium/Large: Height between 5’5" and 6’3” or ring finger size up to 13 

- X-Large: Height over 6’4” or ring finger size 14 and up

 

Our Ask

Ritual Motion is bringing the universe of gamers together with a range of extraordinary specialty gaming products so you can “game to win” and turn your passion into your profession.

We want to build a powerful online Affiliate Platform for gamers in our community to create and market their own lines of custom-branded gaming products. But we need your support!

Join our campaign to build something great for gaming and gamers everywhere. Become a Ritualist and together, let's "make winning a ritual".

story:
Hi there. My name is Norman Sommer and i am the maker of a high quality board game called Whacky Wit. It is inspired by an arcade game of the 80s. After more than a year of development i was able to bring a one player electronic computer game into an stunning board game in 2013. 

Maybe you have already heard about this fun game. It is completely hand made at my little manufactory in Germany. We have already sold 100 copies of Whacky Wit all around the world - most of them in germany - and a lot of people where asking for an international version. The rules of Whacky Wit are printed directly on the board, so you don't need to grab your rule book to check if a special situation is handled this or that way. But: these rules are in german. So what we want to do is: design a neutral and international version of the Whacky Wit board, optimize the production and make once more a perfect board game.

What is it all about?

There is a really great Video from BoardGameGeek-TV and their GameNight! show, where Whacky Wit is showed in a 45 minutes gameplay session. You will see how big it is, how the rules work and how much fun it is playing Whacky Wit. Watch this video and you know everything you need about Whacky Wit: 


It's a two player game but with some lightly variations on the rules you can also play with 3 or 5 persons as you split up the monsters into teams.

  • Whacky Wit is produced of over 450 pieces and has a total weight of 8 Kilograms (17.63 lbs). 
  • Whacky Wit is 570 x 495 x 5cm (22.44 x 19.48 x 1.96 inches) in size. This game is so large that it does not fit in a closet. So there are wall mounts on the back, so you can hang this game like a picture on the wall and put the figures on it. Looks perfect and makes it even more special. 
  • All pieces are hand made. The dots are glued on metal discs and the whole board is magnetic wich gives the munching of dots a very special sound and is also a great experience.
  • All boards are numbered with a nice printed aluminium plate showing your personal serial number of your Whacky Wit copy. 
  • It is set up within seconds. Pull the handles and all Dots are back and ready for the next play.
  • Gameplay and rules are as simple as possible. It only takes a few minutes to explain and a game takes about 10 to 20 minutes.
  • Whacky Wit is perfect for kids at an age of 7 and above and for all children of the 80s :-)
  • You'll love it! Read a few reviews on BGG: LINK1 LINK2

Why making an international version?

I introduced Whacky Wit® at the SPIEL 2013 fair in Essen to a wider public. Scott Alden from BGG bought one at my booth and they did an unboxing video directly at the fair: 


The part "It's a note from the designer ... uh ... in german...  *laugh*" at 6:55 made me think about doing an international version of this game - so we worked hard and now the rules are available in german, english, french and spanish and also in luxembourgian and dutch (maybe you can help to translate the rules into your language?). 

How you can help?

As Whacky Wit is completely hand made, it is not that cheap. At the moment the  "german version" is sold for 479 Euros. But it is possible to lower the price. If we buy higher amounts of raw material at once we get better purchasing conditions. If we switch a few materials to cheaper alternatives (for example a beech frame is much cheaper than a maple frame and a 1 mm anti-slip-mat works as good as a 3 mm anti-slip mat) we can safe material and money to produce the same high quality at an lower price.

With your contribution and you pre-order of the international version of Whacky Wit here on Indiegogo you help us to reach our goal and get all the materials needed for producing the boards at an larger amount. What you will get is a "Indiegogo-Edition" of the Whacky Wit board for a very special price. Check the perks at the side.

Why not producing in asia?

We know that we can save a lot of money if we start producing the game or parts of it in Asia, but it is really important to us, to produce the game in Germany. Whacky Wit in this quality and size is sure nothing for a mass market. Since we probably do not build very large amounts of Whacky Wit boards and pieces during the year, it does not matter whether we produce in Germany or Asia. But if we produce at our location we can 100% guarantee high quality. For such an exclusive, hand made board game a high quality is especially important and here in Germany we have the entire production in sight! 

Quality lasts long

If you want a board game, so fun and unique, so stable and robust that someday your grandchilds will be able to play with their grandchilds - you shall get your copy of Whacky Wit right now :-) And if you are also into the 80s retro gaming - go and select your perk on the right ...

What We Need & What You Get

We need around 15,000 Euros to buy all needed materials in an amount that makes the single Whacky Wit board game less expensive as it is at the moment and to produce all pieces cost-optimized. 

  • It will be great if we get around 30,000 to 50,000 Euros so we could buy some new machines and tools for an optimized in house production like a portal milling machine and maybe a CO2 laser cutter. Those machines help us to do more variations and also do prototypes of new games and ideas. 
  • If you help us to reach our goal we will produce a very special and limited Indiegogo-Edition of your Whacky Wit board as a big "Thank You".
  • If we do not reach our entire goal, it doesn't mean that we can not produce you a nice Whacky Wit® board - So if you selected a Whacky Wit Board as your perk, you will get it - no matter what. It only means, that we can not buy as much raw material as we want to and that production costs are higher and manufacturing of the boards will take a bit longer. 

This is Whacky Wit in Detail

A lot of features are within this great board game. wonderful detailed and hand crafted. Stable but also very easy to repair. If but once a dot gets broken spare parts are included.

With your Whacky Wit perk you'll get:

  • Whacky Wit board in a limited edition with no german text but with a nice Indiegogo-Logo on it  to commemorate this campaign and your support.
  • Four Monsters (Sassy, Classy, Massy and Jive), hand painted and glued with moving eyes
  • Three Whacky Wit figures (for three lives of course), hand painted and glued with eyes made of original 5.25" floppy disc material
  • Three big 12-sided dice (Monster color, Monster number, Whacky number) with special stickers.
  • As an alternative to the dice you can also use the free Whacky Wit dice app for iOS, Android and on the web.
  • Yellow cotton bag, where all dice, whackys and monsters can be stored
  • Three spare dots (1 yellow, two white)
  • Registration Card for registering your board and to get a free member of the whacky club.
  • Printed multilingual instructions in german, english, french and spanish. More languages are available as pdf download (dutch and luxembourgian at the moment).
  • Three Whacky buttons (25mm diameter, different designs)
  • Nice Whacky Wit Postcard


Some maybe want to know how costly it is to produce such a board game - so here are a few pictures of how we build the board:

Now you could get an idea why Whacky Wit is not cheap but good value.


The Perks

We have a lot of lovely perks for you.

Now also available - Whacky Mini:


The Impact

  • I my eyes Whacky Wit is a nearly perfect board game. It is produced by hand on a very high level and it is a impressive game (please watch the videos above). The big items are perfect for children and disabled people and the rules are so simple, that they are explained in under two minutes (if you speak fast) :-) It is a lot of fun chasing Whacky or the Monsters over the board, to plan your next move and strategy and to get the best or worst roll of your dice ever. The gameplay is highly well balanced, so you can not tell if the monsters or whacky are "the better choice". 
  • We have already funded the first, german version of Whacky Wit on the german crowdfunding plattform "Startnext.de", so we really know what we are doing and how we get things done. Now we want to get one step further and bring Whacky Wit as a more affordable version - and with multilingual rules and informations to the world.


When will my perks arrive?

As our indiegogo campaign is a flexible one, we send you your perks right after we received your payment. This happens for most of the perks like the added t-shirts, the Whacky Roll and so on. 

The Whacky Wit Special Edition boards need to be produced, so as we have about 14 lovely maple frames in stock, we can send the first 14 boards within approx. 20 business days, because we need to produce the special indiegogo-boards wich takes some time. But: you receive your perks while this campaign runs and we will be very happy if you blog, post pictures and help us to reach as many people as possible.


Shipping costs and the possibility to bundle Whacky Wit board to save money

Shipping is high from Germany to the States and Europe. But we received some hints from BGG-users, that bundling Whacky Wit boards may be a solution to save shipping costs for our supporters. 

So we can bundle items up to 31 Kilograms which costs 105 Euro to ship this to the States. Whacky Wit is 9.2 Kilograms each packed. So if we bundle two or three boards shipping costs are lower for each item:

From Germany to the Unites States, Canada, Australia, Asia

  • 1 Whacky Wit board = 10 Kilograms = 50 Euros
  • 2 Whacky Wit boards = 20 Kilograms = 75 Euros (37.50 Euros each)
  • 3 Whacky Wit boards = 30 Kilograms = 105 Euros = (35 Euros each)

From Germany to Europe (every location)

  • 1 Whacky Wit board = 10 Kilograms = 25 Euros
  • 2 Whacky Wit boards = 20 Kilograms = 35 Euros (17.50 Euros each)
  • 3 Whacky Wit boards = 30 Kilograms = 45 Euros = (14.66 Euros each)

I hope this will help a bit to organize combined shipping. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help us making the perfect board game, you are welcome to help in any way:

  • We'd love to have more translations into different languages​​. So if you want to help us translating the rules into another language we do not have yet (we have german, english, french, spain, dutch and luxembourgia (Yiha!)) we appreciate your contribution. 
  • We are searching for toy retailer and distributors all around the world - not only for our Whacky Wit board, but also for the other planned games of Spielquader.
  • Spread the word! Write on facebook, twitter, use your blog and share this Indiegogo-campaign with your friends and family. Show them a really cool game with a incredible magneto-mechanic technique. 

And that’s all there is to it.

The big items are perfect for children and disabled people and the rules are so simple, that they are explained in under two minutes (if you speak fast) :-) It is a lot of fun chasing Whacky or the Monsters over the board, to plan your next move and strategy and to get the best or worst roll of your dice ever. The gameplay is highly well balanced, so you can not tell if the monsters or whacky are "the better choice". 
We have already funded the first, german version of Whacky Wit on the german crowdfunding plattform "Startnext.de", so we really know what we are doing and how we get things done. Now we want to get one step further and bring Whacky Wit as a more affordable version - and with multilingual rules and informations to the world.
When will my perks arrive?As our indiegogo campaign is a flexible one, we send you your perks right after we received your payment. This happens for most of the perks like the added t-shirts, the Whacky Roll and so on. The Whacky Wit Special Edition boards need to be produced, so as we have about 14 lovely maple frames in stock, we can send the first 14 boards within approx. 20 business days, because we need to produce the special indiegogo-boards wich takes some time. But: you receive your perks while this campaign runs and we will be very happy if you blog, post pictures and help us to reach as many people as possible.Shipping costs and the possibility to bundle Whacky Wit board to save moneyShipping is high from Germany to the States and Europe. But we received some hints from BGG-users, that bundling Whacky Wit boards may be a solution to save shipping costs for our supporters. So we can bundle items up to 31 Kilograms which costs 105 Euro to ship this to the States. Whacky Wit is 9.2 Kilograms each packed. So if we bundle two or three boards shipping costs are lower for each item:From Germany to the Unites States, Canada, Australia, Asia
1 Whacky Wit board = 10 Kilograms = 50 Euros
2 Whacky Wit boards = 20 Kilograms = 75 Euros (37.50 Euros each)
3 Whacky Wit boards = 30 Kilograms = 105 Euros = (35 Euros each)
From Germany to Europe (every location)
1 Whacky Wit board = 10 Kilograms = 25 Euros
2 Whacky Wit boards = 20 Kilograms = 35 Euros (17.50 Euros each)
3 Whacky Wit boards = 30 Kilograms = 45 Euros = (14.66 Euros each)
I hope this will help a bit to organize combined shipping. Other Ways You Can HelpIf you want to help us making the perfect board game, you are welcome to help in any way:
We'd love to have more translations into different languages​​. So if you want to help us translating the rules into another language we do not have yet (we have german, english, french, spain, dutch and luxembourgia (Yiha!)) we appreciate your contribution. 
We are searching for toy retailer and distributors all around the world - not only for our Whacky Wit board, but also for the other planned games of Spielquader.
Spread the word! Write on facebook, twitter, use your blog and share this Indiegogo-campaign with your friends and family. Show them a really cool game with a incredible magneto-mechanic technique. 
And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Project Summary

For all of the fans of Bigfoot we want to make a game for you!

  • Who We Are: A small but passionate team who loves what we do.  We are located in the Rochester NY area and our entire team is local which is very important to us.

  • Why This Game/ Project? We (like you) love Bigfoot and wanted to make a game that focuses solely on him as a character.

  • You - the fans, will be helping us make this a reality by crowdfunding our project.


About the Game

The game will be a 1st / 3rd person perspective focusing on either playing as Bigfoot or a human.  If playing as Bigfoot you will be trying to avoid human contact.  If playing as a human you will be tracking down Bigfoot. 


What We Need & What You Get


  • Our fully funded goal will get the game made into an Alpha version which will be posted on Steam's Greenlight to help it get onto Steam.  All $25+ supporters will receive a copy (or key) and full access to the later versions (Beta, Standard, and G.O.T.Y.)

  • Some of our awesome perks for various levels include: a book with concept art and photos; name in the credits, VIP forum members / badges; your likeness in the game; being in our documentary; launch party at a castle or mansion; meeting the team and more!

  • If we do not reach our main goal we will still be working on and developing the game as much as possible.  If we exceed our goal we will be doing our best to implement Oculus Rift support and add some awesome DLCs.


The Impact

  • This will be the most exciting game released that is focused on Bigfoot.

  • This game's success will fuel other games that we have in the works as well. 


Other Ways You Can Help Us

If you cannot donate please help us by:

  • Posting on Twitter, Facebook and other places that you use to get the word out about our campaign and project.

  • Using IndieGoGo's built in tools to follow us on Twitter, Like Us on Facebook and more.

THANK YOU for your support and help!

story:
The Concept

An individual when enthused to play a ping-pong game definitely needs an opponent. However, in this busy society and fast-paced world it’s often difficult to find one. So, most of the time, one compromises by playing towards a wall or keeps other side of the ping-pong table vertical so that the ball bounces back. But such alternatives neither give the satisfaction and nor game-playing ability. Therefore, its felt that a robot can supplement such a need. The role of the robot (named as KhelDude - Khel means playing in Sanskrit and Dude is a friend/partner) is to autonomously

  • Sense the motion of the ping-pong ball coming from other side of the table
  • Compute (Think) various positions including the quadrant that ball hits the table on KhelDude’s side, how high it would rise, high much of force needed to apply to return the ball back to other side based on the rules of the game and
  • Hit (Act) as per the calculations. 

The Current Status of KhelDude: 

The proof-of-concept product type was successfully developed and demonstrated. All the relevant Kinematic formulas are derived and well tested. It works fine with breadboard, loose wires, no-soldering, no-PCB designs and not good body-facade design.

What's Next 

The funds received from KickStarter backers will be utilized for following activities:

  • Setup a dedicated full-time Engineering team, facilities and expert adviser.  
  • Design Body and facade of KhelDude with considering 180 degrees of rotation of arms, forward/backward/diagonal horizontal motion of wheels.
  • Deriving accurate formulas to hit the ping-pong ball via racket
  • Buy necessary parts to build complete functional prototype of KhelDude.
  • Assemble few sets of KhelDude.

story:
Smasher Simulator

Your goal is simple: "Be the best."

The competitive Super Smash Bros. tournament scene is one of the most intriguing eSports communities I've ever known. Over the past month, I've been working on programming a simulation about that exact community: "Smasher Simulator." You play the role of a young smasher, dreaming of becoming the best at Melee. This would be a game that would bring attention to one of the deepest crowds in the fighting game community, along with eSports in general. Now I need your help to make my vision a reality.

Why ask for funding?

While I'm able to code the entirety of the game myself, I've reached out to some very talented artists to help with the graphical and musical side of the game. After a while, it was decided just how much was needed to finish the game:

  • $400 is needed for graphics of the characters and HUD
  • $600 is needed for the game's soundtrack
  • Any additional funding past the $1,000 goal will go towards creating more art and music for the game

Gameplay:

The main gameplay consists of planning out how much of your day will be spent practicing, researching, working, etc. This is done with an hourly planner system, present at all times.  One will also have to make difficult decisions throughout the game, which will be randomly presented, adding replayability.

The planning and decisions will increase one's abilities to play Melee at a competitive level.

Once you're prepared, you'll be able to enter tournaments and achieve victory! That is, if you've made the right choices...

The Team:

Programmer: TrampolineTales

  • 3+ years programming experience
  • Released the popular flash game: Loot Clicker
  • Been gaming as long as he can remember

Artist: LilyPichu

  • Has created art for many popular League of Legends fan-videos and comics
  • 230,000+ YouTube subscribers

Composer: Gallo

  • Certificate for Electronic Music Production from SAE Institute
  • Former member of the Project M Backroom

Rewards:

The rewards for supporting the game include having your name featured in the game's credits, your gamertag being used as a smasher's name, early access to the game, and much more!

FAQ:

Q: What platforms will the game be released for?

A: PC and Mac


Q: How much will the game cost once it's released?

A: $4.99 USD


Q: When do you aim to actually release the game?

A: June of 2014, Beta builds will be released in April to those who backed $25 or more.


Q: I can't help fund the game, how can I help in other ways?

A: Spread the word about the game's campaign, and vote for us on Steam Greenlight!


Q: I have other questions, where can I ask them?

A: Feel free to message the lead programmer/developer on his website.


That's all for now! Thanks for reading!

story:
Our Project:

Once my team and I finished the Sword Art Online Anime series, we almost immediately knew we wanted to create a game inspired by that. The combat, storyline, skills, and characters all were amazing. Once we got set up, we starting thinking of ways we could go about this. We started modeling, writing, and getting together almost 15 hours every night for a week. Once we got the basic ideas of what we wanted our game to be and how we could make it different and break the normal RPG genre, we went into action. We have recently merge with ShiniGamiCHOP Productions to increase our quality of the game as well as bringing the wait time down for release and new content. As of right now, we are only in the pre-pre alpha stage. Modeling the world and getting together the basic basic story lines. We have run out of a budget, and unless we get enough money to even begin to start this, our dreams will be crushed. My team and I are so emotionally and mentally set on this, that we have already shed tears on some of the things we have worked on. We aren't asking for much, just enough to get us by.

Sword Art Online is an anime based off a Virtual MMORPG, Sword Art Online. There is an action combat system that is simply outstanding.

 

Why do we need only $5000?

The $5,000 is for the licenses to use the dedicated hosting software and pay for permanent hardware for use to store the project files and use test fields for the MMO section. It will also be used to pay for the Development Kit version of the Oculus Rift and MindWave tool kit to try and make the game as close to the show as possible. These are stretch goals the main amount is for hardware to run it in all. Before you ask if we need the servers now, I would like to point out that we will indeed need it at the time the funding is complete.

 

Our Team(Working at least 15 hours):

 

Jordan Ireland/ art director - project manager

Dylan Murray/ founder and creative director

Nero/ model creator and HR manager

Dylan Rivers/ content creator

Zack benidict/ content creator

Francis Briggs/ art manager

Lukas Mack/ content creator

Pierre/ content creator

Dylanemesis/ PR - modeler

Filfal/ content creator

Michael Murray/ creative writer

Michael landriault/ story writer

Cameron zubricky/ story - voice acting

Mortiflux(3 band members unknown names) sound editing and music talent

Jonathan Ireland/ sound editor

Eula/ art creator and concept director

 

MUSIC:

our sound track is being made by a team of talented and educated specialists with a theme and soundtrack by the talented drum band MortiFlux

Click Here For Mortiflux Youtube Channel

 

What Our game will consist of:

Combat: 1LifeONLINE will have a very exciting action combat system with new skills added with every patch of our game. We took a vote from our community, and they said they wanted to stay true to the Sword Art Online series, and have no magic. Just melee. Don't worry though! The melee combat system will have so much more than just swinging a sword back and forth! You will be able to pick up a piece of bread and throw it at your opponent if you wanted to!(Not very effective though!) You will be able to use most objects in the world to attack with, not just swords!

 

Comabt in 1LifeONLINE will be something you have never seen before. You will have full control over what your character can do. The skills will be animated, but you can move throughout that animation, with changing looks depending on how you move. 

Bosses will be a whole different story. Do you want to run up his leg in real time, dodging his hands trying to grab you? You can! The combat in boss rooms will be a whole new experience. Instead of having to stay in the same place, you will always need to move around. You will have to have a plan before going into the boss room. Everyone has to be in the best mindset, and hopefully you all will return!

 

 

NPCs: Most, if not alll, NPCs will have a backstory. How they got in the game, what their life was like before the game, and very emotional stories to tell. We want to give this game as much emotion and life as we possibly can. The stories will be voiced out, so you can hear the emotion in their voices. The NPCs will act like players will. Some will be chasing others down the street trying to kill another. If an NPC is ordered to work for a plate he broke, he will pick up a broom and start sweeping.(Most likely mumbling under his breath as well!) NPCs will be able to go anywhere (within reason), they'll be able to fight by your side(with the same playstyle as a human). 

As we have said, we want to give as much life to this game as possible. We want to feel like players are protecting, not only the players, but also the NPCs.

 

 

Specialties: 

Perma-Death

Unlike most MMORPGs today, 1LifeONLINE will feature a perma-death system. The first 10-15 levels you will be safe and free to die however many times you wanted, but after that you will be fighting for your life! No magic? No Problem! We will have different potions, pets, and items that will be able to heal while you are battling even the toughest opponents! As well as an automatic battle regeneration rate which you can advance, so you can focus more on killing! The towns, inns, and safe places in the game will feature automatic regeneration as well. While you are in a safe place, your HP will not be able to drop below 10, so you can make sure you won't die!

 

 

Resurrection:

I don't like the idea of losing all of my character data, just for dying. No worries! We will ensure to have resurrection items, and certain 'special skills and items' to make sure you won't have to go through that! If a problem occurs on our side(ie. lag or malfunction), we will ensure your character data will be saved and returned to you promptly. (We can't return your character information if it is a computer or internet issue on the client side.)

 

This is a community Project. Everything we create is accepted by the community.

Professions: 1LifeONLINE will have no set professions, instead there will be 200+ skills that you can choose from to create your own class. You will be able to switch between to primary weapons (ie. Greatsword and in the middle of combat you need to block. You click a certain button and you put away the greatsword, and pull out a lance and spear.) We will also have a 'talent tree' (if you can call it that) with over 400 different talents that you can customize even further. No one will have the same character as you! That is how diverse the game will be.

 

Housing: Like most games, there will be a housing system. Once you clear a floor, you can purchase any house (that's not occupied), on that floor. The higher up, the neighborhood you're in, and the view will be taken into perspective to determine the cost. Later on in the game, in a later patch, we will hope to incorporate a House builder, where you can build a house exactly how you want it. Of course, you will be limited by the neighborhood and placement of the lot. You can own a maximum of two houses at any given time, and it will be like selling and buying a house in real life. Except less annoying!

 

Marriage: We will have a marriage system in our game as well. Marriage will be that of sacred oaths. When you get married in the game, you will have a shared storage space with about 50 slots, where you and your spouse can share items. If you two have more than 2 houses combined, you will have to decided which two houses you want to move into. (If you get divorced, you will get your house back at a discounted cost.) When you are in a party with your spouse and close enough to them, you will get special bonuses (example: HP Boosts, EXP Boosts, SP Boosts, etc.) 

 

Guilds/Legions: We haven't taken much thought into the guilding system, but we can assure you that it will be WAY different than anything you've ever seen before. We will have HUGE guild battles. We won't just have guilds we will have legions as well. Instead of members joining together to create a guild, a legion will be a group of guilds that come together to battle other legions!

If you two have more than 2 houses combined, you will have to decided which two houses you want to move into. (If you get divorced, you will get your house back at a discounted cost.) When you are in a party with your spouse and close enough to them, you will get special bonuses (example: HP Boosts, EXP Boosts, SP Boosts, etc.) 
 
Guilds/Legions: We haven't taken much thought into the guilding system, but we can assure you that it will be WAY different than anything you've ever seen before. We will have HUGE guild battles. We won't just have guilds we will have legions as well. Instead of members joining together to create a guild, a legion will be a group of guilds that come together to battle other legions!

story:
UPDATE 3: NEW BACKER REWARD - BTS HOODIES!

UPDATE 2: WE ADDED STRETCH GOALS! THINK HOMESTORY CUP, DOTA STYLE.

UPDATE 1: WE REACHED OUR INITIAL GOAL OF $25,000 IN A LITTLE OVER 24 HOURS!

 

We've seen the power of the Dota 2 community and would love to do more. Already we have nothing but gratitude for everyone who has donated so far and helped us reach this goal, but because of the amazing interest in our campaign we are going to set stretch goals that if we reach, we promise we will fulfill.

 

With a deep bellow, Beyond the Summit presents the G-7 League. We'll invite the best teams from Asia to compete in an online invitational tournament. The format will be compelling and concise, and every game will be meaningful. Our mission? To give back to those who gave us our start, by bolstering the professional scene in the Asia-Pacific region where we got our start.

 

 

With some impressive micro skills, Beyond the Summit displays its true power. We fly out 1 top team from North America, 1 from Europe, and 1 from Asia, and have a 4th team from one of the regions as well! We pay for their flights, arrange for accommodations, food, and plenty of liquor. They duke it out on LAN for a substantial prize pool and hang out with the BTS team for a full weekend of amazing Dota content. Think Homestory Cup, Dota style. The tournament would happen late 2013 (After TI-3), or more likely early 2014.

_____________________________________________________________

 

Hi guys!

We're David and David, and we want to build the Beyond the Summit ESPORTS Broadcast Studio! If you're reading this, you've probably watched your fair share of nail-biting Dota games, shared a few laughs with us on stream, and maybe even seen us at events such as The International 2. All your support over the past years has helped us to get where we are and is the reason we are here talking to you today. Our dream is to create an ESPORTS broadcast studio in Los Angeles to produce all our content with a professional production level.

Beyond the Summit (BTS) sprung to life back in March of 2012. I (GoDz) was a fairly established Dota commentator at the time, and with Valve's Dota 2 starting to become a major E-sport, I was pushing for more global events, specifically in Asia. At the time, there was a plethora of European and American events, while Asia saw virtually none. I pestered established community members and professional organizations such as GosuGamers to remedy this problem, but nothing changed. The top Asian teams were ready to switch to Dota 2, the viewers were ready to watch them play, and I was ready to commentate them, and so Beyond the Summit was born.

In April 2012, I ran our first Dota 2 tournament, the Gigabyte Dota Masters. After many sleepless nights, I manged to secure funding, commentators, a website, admins, and commitments to participate from the top teams. Finally, the event was ready to begin. After inviting 22 of the best teams in Asia directly, we hosted 2 open qualifiers to give unknown teams a shot to compete with the best of Asia. Nine of these teams would go on to earn invitations to The International 2 in Seattle later that year. Seven would finish in the top 8, winning over $1.3 million dollars in total prize money, in no small part due to our efforts organizing this event and the subsequent Beyond the Summit World Tour.

The Gigabyte Dota Masters was only the beginning for us. Since then, we've continued to broadcast and organize events within Asia, and recently we've begun to expand our coverage into Europe and North America.

When we started last April, Beyond the Summit was just a cool name. But what started as a catchy name has evolved into a philosophy that guides our every step. Like Matt said, Beyond the Summit means something different to each and every person, but to me and LD, it means that our work is never done. It means always striving to improve and never resting on our laurels. Beyond the Summit means constantly challenging ourselves to do more and to do it better.

For every success we've had, we've had a dozen failures, but we'll never stop experimenting with new ideas and working hard to give you guys, the teams, and the players the Dota 2 coverage you deserve. What lies Beyond the Summit? A new summit!

We've come a long way since BTS was founded. In our first month, we had ~80 thousand unique viewers, 50 thousand total hours watched, and 142 thousand video plays. Pretty good, right? That's what we thought!

In last December ALONE, we reached over 1 MILLION unique viewers, 1 MILLION total hours watched, and 3.7 MILLION video plays, all in only 14 days of broadcasting. You, and viewers like you, have made our incredible growth possible.

Beyond the Summit, or BTS, has grown and evolved a lot in the past 10 months, but we would never have grown the way we have without all your support. This community gave me the confidence to organize and produce the first major Dota 2 tournament in Asia. This community supported my decision to give David (LD) a shot during The International 2 East Qualifiers last June, even though he was an unknown, inexperienced caster at the time. Thanks to you and viewers like you, that same LD would go on to become my full partner here at Beyond the Summit and cast the Grand Finals of the International 2 with Luminous later that year. And it's this community whose unquenchable thirst for more and better content drives us to improve our product every single day.

Last October, we were invited to provide official English coverage of a Chinese Dota tournament known as the G-1 League. It was the first ever Chinese Dota 2 tournament with English casters, and coming right on the heels of Valve's The International 2, we know we had to do something really special to achieve even a fraction of the production quality of that event. Unfortunately, we were a few million dollars in funding short...
 
We needed help, and we had faith that this community would deliver. That's why we started our search for graphics designers, video editors, and stream mods with a Reddit post! With the help of some talented community members like Chester Gee, QoJ, and Joakim Tobiasson, we put together some unique content to enhance the overall production quality of the event.
 
Examples of this additional production include our now iconic BTS intro, a hype trailer for the event, group stage and playoff highlight reels, team/player introductions (featuring DPM voice acting!) for DK, LGD, iG, and Orange, player interviews with 1437, iceiceice, and Mushi, translated Chinese content such as iG's team discussions, and overlays with daily schedules, group standings, brackets, and other important information. Our G-1 League production was the first time something of this magnitude had ever been done for an online production of a Dota 2 event.

It's always been our philosophy to put the teams, players, and viewers first. With the G-1 League, we wanted to create a compelling story, put faces to player's names, and give these top-class teams the exposure they deserved. Additionally, we wanted to give the viewers a memorable and enjoyable viewing experience.

We’ve always looked to you guys for support, inspiration, and feedback and you've never failed us. So we're coming at you again, with a bigger dream, a more ambitious goal. We're setting our sights even higher and we're confident you can make it happen.

Thanks to your support over the past year, we've been able to devote ourselves more and more to producing e-sports content. What started as a part-time hobby for us, is quickly becoming a more full-time undertaking. Our ultimate goal? To be able to produce awesome ESPORTS content full-time for you guys, as a sustainable business.

To achieve this goal, we need to build our studio! In a real studio, we'll have the equipment, infrastructure, and space we need to step up our production quality. Not to mention the human resources, with both of us in the same location and able to focus on organizing events and producing content. On that note, we've chosen to base ourselves in LA, in large part because we'll be near other great community figures, such as Purge, Luminous, Blitz, and Fluffnstuff, amongst others. You better believe we plan on taking full advantage of them to improve our product!

A real studio means more and better content for you to enjoy. But to make the best possible studio, we need your help. Building a full-fledged broadcast studio isn't cheap. Here's just a short list of some of the costs your contributions will help cover:
  • Travel / relocation expenses (we have to get to L.A. to build a studio there!)
  • Equipment purchases: Furniture, computers, monitors, cameras, microphones, mixers, lighting, audio gear, cabling, and more!
  • One-time startup costs: sound-proofing, networking, painting, electrical work, etc.

Finally, if you guys are really generous and we exceed our goal, the money will go directly into the prizepool for our first major event.

We chose indiegogo because it's a great way for you guys to contribute what you want, easily and safely, plus we get to give you some awesome rewards! 

We've done our best to come up with some cool and unique rewards for all our supporters, such as exclusive access to replays, 1-on-1 coaching in Dota or broadcasting, personalized narrations of anything you want (yes, yes, even you brushing your teeth!), rare BTS T-Shirts and gear, and much, much more! Check out our list of backer rewards on the right for the complete list.

Whether you give $1 or $100, every little bit helps and goes directly towards our dream of building and running the best esports studio possible for Dota 2.

What was initially an online project based out of my office in Thailand at times, TriumphOfMan's bedroom in Tasmania at others, or even LD's shared flat in Philly has grown to become something so much more. Every day, we're constantly reminded that we could never have achieved any of it without you (and Twitch, whose amazing support from the very beginning has helped make this all possible). We hope to continue doing our part to grow a healthy and sustainable Dota community. You're the best community we ever could have asked for <3

If you have any questions about rewards, fundraising, or anything related to this BTS project, feel free to contact us via email -
bts [@] beyondthesummit.tv

story:
Whatâ€™s all the buzz about?!?

Social gaming is freakinâ€™ huge.  People are spending billions in games like Farmville to build fake farms that grow fake food to serve to fake people.  Itâ€™s unbeelievable!

So what if there was a game that was just as fun and addictive as the most popular social games and it actually did real things in the real world?  Things like building a schoolhouse in Haiti... protecting polar bears in the Arctic... and serving meals to hungry children in America.

Well... thatâ€™s Bee*kin!
 
What is Bee*kin?

Bee*kin is a next-generation social gaming platform that combines the addictive elements of Farmville, the crowdfunding techniques of IndieGogo and the quirky characters of Angry Birds... oh yeah, and the goal of the game is to save the world.

Through a partnership of the best brands, the brightest stars and the most respected nonprofits, Bee*kin generates funds, awareness and action for causes around the world... and you get to win real rewards for yourself!

Bee*kin is going to change the game?  Literally.   

 

So who the heck are the Bee*kin?!?

The Bee*kin are the cosmic relatives of both human and bee.  Human beeings... if you will.  And they are coming to help us build a better world.  

But the Bee*kin canâ€™t do it alone.  They need our help.  You see everyone in the world is connected to their very own Bee*kin.  When you beefriend your Bee*kin, youâ€™ll team up to do good in the world.

And donâ€™t worry, the Bee*kin ainâ€™t buzzkills.  Theyâ€™re wild and crazy and are gonna put the "fun" in fundraising.


How does it work?

Players partner with their very own Bee*kin to lead an elite squad called The Bee*Team on a series of missions that feature fun games and addictive activities.  Players contribute small amounts and take simple social actions that, when added up, will make a big impact.  Along the way, players get points they can redeem for virtual and real world rewards (including brand gift cards, avatar items and special one-of-a-kind offers like backstage passes to concerts by your favorite artists).

Bee*kin is the ultimate game... one where everyone wins.


What We Need & What You Get

Since the goal of Bee*kin is to use crowdsourcing to help save the world, it seemed like a natural fit to seek some of our funding through crowdsourcing.  By helping to fund Bee*kin, you'll have a hand in creating an amazing machine that can raise millions of dollars for causes around the world. 

Right now, we're looking to raise $30,000 to help us complete the prototype.  We've been in production for several months and can tell you that the game is gonna be awesome.

We'd love to have you on the Bee*Team and we'll reward you for your support! 

If youâ€™ve beecome a beeliever, please spread the word about Bee*kin.  Ask your friends to support us on IndieGoGo.  Tweet it... Post it... Shout it in the streets!      

For the time beeing, we'll leave you with these immortal words:

To Bee*kin or not to Bee*kin... There is no question.

story:
NFCeek.com has created a real world near field communication (NFC) outdoor based adventure game. We are showcasing the cool and diverse things that can be done with NFC by creating a geocaching meets scavenger hunt game.
By creating a fun game for users, that requires an NFC enabled phone, players will interact with locations like never before while having a great family oriented adventure. This is how you play a game WITH your Smartphone, not ON your Smartphone.

The goal of our campaign is to raise at least $ 7,500.00 USD to help us deploy a minimum of 25 games across the United States. Each Near Field Communication game set is made up of 4 individual NFC enabled stickers; we call them Gamekeys, that are encoded with the Latitude and Longitude of the next location for the game. You set them up on our game dashboard and then active the game for people to play.

How do you Play?

Players find the location of the first Keystage when they choose the game to play. Our game requires an NFC enabled Smartphone because once the player is at the first location they 'Tap' the NFC enabled Keytag to retrieve the next location.

Each completed game earns a Keypoint, These Keypoints are needed to earn Keybadges. The Keybadges are your levels from White Belt all the way up to a Black Belt. You can also earn Keymaster Points for every game that you setup and work your way up to the ultimate Keymaster position.

What will we do with the Money?

We expect that the cost of running this campaign, buying supplies, and giving rewards will cost us approximately 30% of the total amount raised. That leaves $5250.00 for us to purchase Taskrabbits for game placement. We expect that the Taskrabbits will cost us almost $200.00 average cost for each game that is deployed based on the cost of services that we have seen researching this.

We will purchase as many placements as we can with any amount raised or exceeding the campaign limit. We will use up to 10% of any amount in excess of our campaign set amount to cover weird or unexpected costs (Like if we max bandwidth out our provider because of response, or stuff like that)

 Taskrabbit? What's that?

Taskrabbit.com is a service that allows you to hire a person to perform small tasks for you. We are based in Pittsburgh, PA area so we can place games in our area of the Country, but in order for the game to have value it needs to be available in more than just our region. Taskrabbits are available in 10 major cities around the county, including a few places where we don't know anyone.

 Why not just wait for people to buy games?

We are currently finishing up our alpha of the product. Launching our Indiegogo campaign is the start of our Beta. While we have some friends around the country, we still need to have games for people to play in as many places as possible. Also, this will help ensure that we will have as many games to choose from once we are Live.

 What do I get for helping?

We are offering a number of unique 'Thank You' perks for helping us out. Get a single special edition Keystone NFC sticker for just a $ 10.00 donation all the way to a low number special game set and a Keystone Contributor T-Shirt for $ 105.00. And, you will be listed on the Keystone 'Thank You' page on our website for your contribution level

 Can I help without donating money?

YES! If you are willing to donate your time to setup a game for us we would grateful. This game would be classified as an in-house game. That means that you would not get the benefits of the game dashboard that Keymasters get, BUT you would be allowed to name the game and be listed as the creator. Note: You must have an NFC enabled phone, or a GPS device, and be willing to place and record the Latitude and Longitude of each game piece for that game for us!

 

Your help with our campaign will give us a real leg up on getting the word out about Near Field Communication for Smartphones. We think this is an awesome technology! It allows you to have real world items, 'tagged' with NFC, linked to online information. This is one of the neatest additions to current generation Smartphones and we hope our NFC game and this campaign can help spread interest and education about the technology.

 

Here is some information about NFC:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Near_field_communication

 

Here is some information on which phones have (or will have) NFC:

http://www.nfcworld.com/nfc-phones-list/

 

Glossary of our Terms:

Keybadge - Badges earned with your Keypoints

Keymaster - Creator of a game. You can be a Keymaster!

Keypoints - Points earned for completing each game

Keystage - A single stop in an NFCeek game. You see this on your NFC enabled phone when you ‘tap’ any Keytag at a location

Keystone Contributor – YOU! We are saying thank you for your help by listing all of the contributors on our site on a special Keystone Contributors page

Gamekeys – the physical NFC enabled sticker

NFCeek.com (pronounced N-F-Seek), That's US! We thought that the name said it all about what we are doing.
