The goal of our campaign is to raise at least $ 7,500.00 USD to help us deploy a minimum of 25 games across the United States. Each Near Field Communication game set is made up of 4 individual NFC enabled stickers; we call them Gamekeys, that are encoded with the Latitude and Longitude of the next location for the game. You set them up on our game dashboard and then active the game for people to play.
How do you Play?
Players find the location of the first Keystage when they choose the game to play. Our game requires an NFC enabled Smartphone because once the player is at the first location they 'Tap' the NFC enabled Keytag to retrieve the next location.
Each completed game earns a Keypoint, These Keypoints are needed to earn Keybadges. The Keybadges are your levels from White Belt all the way up to a Black Belt. You can also earn Keymaster Points for every game that you setup and work your way up to the ultimate Keymaster position.
What will we do with the Money?
We expect that the cost of running this campaign, buying supplies, and giving rewards will cost us approximately 30% of the total amount raised. That leaves $5250.00 for us to purchase Taskrabbits for game placement. We expect that the Taskrabbits will cost us almost $200.00 average cost for each game that is deployed based on the cost of services that we have seen researching this.
We will purchase as many placements as we can with any amount raised or exceeding the campaign limit. We will use up to 10% of any amount in excess of our campaign set amount to cover weird or unexpected costs (Like if we max bandwidth out our provider because of response, or stuff like that)
 Taskrabbit? What's that?
Taskrabbit.com is a service that allows you to hire a person to perform small tasks for you. We are based in Pittsburgh, PA area so we can place games in our area of the Country, but in order for the game to have value it needs to be available in more than just our region. Taskrabbits are available in 10 major cities around the county, including a few places where we don't know anyone.
 Why not just wait for people to buy games?
We are currently finishing up our alpha of the product. Launching our Indiegogo campaign is the start of our Beta. While we have some friends around the country, we still need to have games for people to play in as many places as possible. Also, this will help ensure that we will have as many games to choose from once we are Live.
 What do I get for helping?
We are offering a number of unique 'Thank You' perks for helping us out. Get a single special edition Keystone NFC sticker for just a $ 10.00 donation all the way to a low number special game set and a Keystone Contributor T-Shirt for $ 105.00. And, you will be listed on the Keystone 'Thank You' page on our website for your contribution level
 Can I help without donating money?
YES! If you are willing to donate your time to setup a game for us we would grateful. This game would be classified as an in-house game. That means that you would not get the benefits of the game dashboard that Keymasters get, BUT you would be allowed to name the game and be listed as the creator. Note: You must have an NFC enabled phone, or a GPS device, and be willing to place and record the Latitude and Longitude of each game piece for that game for us!
 
Your help with our campaign will give us a real leg up on getting the word out about Near Field Communication for Smartphones. We think this is an awesome technology! It allows you to have real world items, 'tagged' with NFC, linked to online information. This is one of the neatest additions to current generation Smartphones and we hope our NFC game and this campaign can help spread interest and education about the technology.
 
Here is some information about NFC:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Near_field_communication
 
Here is some information on which phones have (or will have) NFC:
http://www.nfcworld.com/nfc-phones-list/
 
Glossary of our Terms:
Keybadge - Badges earned with your Keypoints
Keymaster - Creator of a game. You can be a Keymaster!
Keypoints - Points earned for completing each game
Keystage - A single stop in an NFCeek game. You see this on your NFC enabled phone when you ‘tap’ any Keytag at a location
Keystone Contributor – YOU! We are saying thank you for your help by listing all of the contributors on our site on a special Keystone Contributors page
Gamekeys – the physical NFC enabled sticker
NFCeek.com (pronounced N-F-Seek), That's US! We thought that the name said it all about what we are doing.

story:
Dragon's Hoard Publishing proudly presents

 
"Angels, Daemons and Beings Between" - A patrons source book for the Dungeon Crawl Classics RPG.
 
Here at Dragon's Hoard Publishing we love Goodman Games' Dungeon Crawl Classics RPG and all that it stands for. 
 

Dungeon Crawl Classics takes tabletop roleplaying back to its roots.  It focuses on (but is certainly not limited to!) traditional dungeon crawl adventures.  Its unique core system of rules allow for a breath of fresh air and flexibility in a crowded market.  We believe that what Goodman Games has achieved, in terms of presentation, writing, and art work, will take you into the worlds described by the authors listed in Appendix N, the influential writing described by Gary Gygax in the AD&D Dungeon Master's Guide.

 

Our goal with "Angels, Daemons and Beings Between" is to expand upon this amazing product by focusing on a unique concept from the DCC RPG - patron magic - and expanding it. 

 

"Angels, Daemons and Beings Between" is a perfect bound softcover supplement book detailing a host of new patrons for use in the DCC RPG.  In terms of patrons, expect our work to show the influences of Gardner Fox, A. Merritt, Leigh Brackett, Michael Moorcock, Robert E. Howard, and H.P. Lovecraft to name a few.  "Angels, Daemons and Beings Between" will be a 32-page, high quality product featuring brand new artwork.  It will utilize the Open Game License and the Dungeon Crawl Classics compatibility license to ensure full compatibility to the Dungeon Crawl Classic rules set.

 

Because this project is still in development, and because we want to make this supplement really worth your time, Dragon's Hoard publishing is proud to announce a number of stretch goals to "Angels, Daemons and Beings Between".  For every additional goal we meet, after our initial goal, we will add an additional sixteen pages of patrons until the book reaches a staggering 96 pages, with the final 4 pages dedicated to our brand new magic items section!

 

If that isn't enough to pique your interest, we will also be providing free shipping anywhere in the world.

 

Everybody will receive the 96 page book if we hit our initial goal in one capacity or another.

 

Below we have outlined what we are hoping to achieve with this project at each stretch goal.

 

[ACHIEVED] Goal #1 - Our primary goal is to reach $2,000. If successful, everyone will receive the full book either as a PDF or book or both, depending at what amount you contribute.

 

Goal #2 & #3 Combined! - *UPDATE* Upon reaching $4,000 we are combining goals 2 and three this means if we reach the amount we will add a wopping 32 pages to the book AND you will receive Sean's module, “The Tomb of Curses” (so that means everyone who contributes $10 receives it andif you were already going to get it, yours will be a deluxe version with unique art and signed by Sean). You will also receive his second module "The Snow Witch of the Melstarian Mountains"; she must be defeated and you're just the people to try again. It should be noted that to get the print version you must have contributed $20 otherwise it will be a PDF only.

 

Goal #4 and #5 Together at Last! - *UPDATE* If we reach $8,000, stretch goals 4 and 5 will be considered achieved. This means we will add yet another 32 pages of patrons and magic items to the book! Additionally you will receive a bonus 3-panel screen, as well as a unique game box with artwork from Scott Ackerman our Illustrator!  If you were already going to receive these items (by contributing $25 or $35 respectively), yours will be upgraded to a four panel screen and your game box will feature unique art signed by Scott.

 

Goal #6 The Final Countdown- *UPDATE* Our final stretch goal is $10,000 and should we reach it, will be a mystery addition to “Angels, Daemons and Beings Between”. This will be a special gift to all of those who donated to the project no matter the amount!

 

Perks

 

So what do you get? Our goal with the perks for "Angels, Daemons and Beings Between" is to provide a variety of great options for you the contributor. Every perk has a variety of items you will receive upon the completion of this project as well as being very affordable no matter what perk you select. Our perks range from $1 to $100 and even provide a sneak peek at some of the upcoming patrons that will be displayed in "Angels, Daemons and Beings Between". Let's take a closer look:

 

$1 - Radu, King of the Rabbits

 

It is easy to underestimate Radu, King of the Rabbits.  Those who invoke him as a patron hope to share his speed, his alertness, and moreover his cunning.  

 

$1 Receive a poster of "Angels, Daemons and Beings Between" with our thanks.

 

$10 - Enzazza, Queen of the Hive

 

Where bees, wasps, and their kin gather, so too can the golden voice of Enzazza be heard.  The Great Matriarch, Enzazza views males as worth little, save for mating, but values her female workers well.  Beware the sting of her swarms!

 

$10 PDF + poster + bonus goal two if reached

 

$20 - Umwansh, Father of the Wave

 

The great water elemental Umwansh has servants who gird the oceans round.  He can bring storms against vessels far at sea, or see them safely ashore.  He is also the Lord of ManyTreasures, who has the pick of those things which have sunken in the sea from a thousand ships and a hundred drowned lands.

 

$20 perfect bound book + PDF + poster and PDF of  “The Revelation of Mulmo” by Daniel Bishop and bonus goal two & three if reached.

 

$25 - Lavarial, Angel of the Temple

 

Beautiful and fierce, the Angel of the Temple seeks to protect travelers in night-haunted lands, and to overthrow the crawling legions of Chaos.  Will you support her?  Her demands are not easy, but her aid is not to be scoffed at either.

 

$25 perfect bound book + PDF + poster and module “The Revelation of Mulmo” by Daniel Bishop and bonus two,three & four if reached.

 

$30 - Yan Oshoth, Revered Ancestor

 

From among your ancestors, the spirit of Yan Oshoth reaches across time and space to bring glory to your family name!  He will grant you guidance, wisdom, and knowledge.  In your direst need, he may even grant you his warrior's arm.

 

$30 perfect bound book + PDF + poster and module “The Revelation of Mulmo” by Daniel Bishop and bonus goal  two,three & four if reached, plus name a patron using an anagram of your name and get your actual name in the credits.

 

$35 - Ptah-Ungurath, the Opener of the Way

 

He has been known by many names, and always he has heralded the approach of Chaos.  Some call him the Seeing Face.  Some call him the Black Goat.  Others yet call him Father and Mother of Monsters.  Perhaps it is better to have Ptah-Ungurath on your side than on the side of your enemies.

 

$35 perfect bound book + PDF+ poster  and module “The Revelation of Mulmo” by Daniel Bishop and bonus goal two, three, four & five if reached, plus you help design a patron with us and name it and get your actual name in the credits.

 

$40 - Logos, the Perfect Form

 

A creature of living metal from a far world, in turns intrigued and disgusted by organic life, Logos seeks to bring perfect geometrical Law wherever his influence is felt.  His Shapes may be of aid to those he favors, but few who fall within the ambit of the Perfect Form remain fully human themselves.

 

$40 perfect bound book + PDF + poster plus bonus dragons hoard t-shirt plus the module  “The Revelation of Mulmo” by Daniel Bishop plus bonus goals two, three, four and five, if reached.

 

$45 - Set-Utekh, the Destroyer

 

Although bound, the dark god Set-Utekh still seeks to free Himself and bring destruction upon the cosmos.  Should Set-Utekh ever be freed from His other-worldly prison, He will eat the life of stars and planets.  Until that time though, He offers much power to those who would do His dark bidding, and would gamble against the chance that some minor task their patron sets will release the Destroyer.

 

$45 perfect bound book + PDF + special dm's screen + poster + t-shirt and the module “The Revelation of Mulmo” by Daniel Bishop plus all stretch goals.

 

$50 - Mab, Dark Queen of Faerie

 

She brings dreams dark and delightful, which make men mad.  She rides the dark nights in the autumn of the year, the Hosts of the Slaugh her retainers. Slighted, she curses new-born children.  On a whim, she plucks babes from their cribs to devour, or lays with young men who arise withered and old.  Yet the Dark Queen of Faerie can be a friend to those who know their place, and who are willing to pay her awful price.

 

$50 perfect bound book + PDF + signed + special dm's screen + bonus magic item section, detailing 16 new items + poster + t-shirt and the module  “The Revelation of Mulmo” by Daniel Bishop plus all stretch goals.

 

$75 - Mulmo, He Who Whispers Forgotten Secrets

 

This tentacled mass of ever-shifting form dwells in shadows and dark spaces deep beneath the ground.  It is said that Mulmo knows every secret that has ever been forgotten.  It is said that Mulmo hears every word whispered on love's pillow, every curse screamed in defiance, rage, or hatred.  To see Mulmo is to be driven mad.  To hear Mulmo's rasping whispers is to know much...and, perhaps, also to be driven mad.

 

$75  everything mentioned above + game box with unique art by Scott Ackerman plus all stretch goals + magic item section.

 

$100 - Pesh Joomang, the Gate and the Keeper

 

In the Lands of the Sau, long ago, dwelt the sages Yaggyx and Sarnon, who distilled the visions of a slew of prior wizards and scribes into several great tomes of lore and magic.  But, as time passed, Tarot Wizards wrested the tomes from the great sages.  What Yaggyx andSarnon had wrought was distorted and lost.  Indeed, there were some who felt that the Old Magic had never truly existed, and that tales of a long-lost Golden Age were but illusions of memory.

 

It was Pesh Joomang who tracked back through the works of the great sages,  discovering thepandects of the scribes who came before Yaggyx and Sarnon, and so renewed the fires of the Old Magic.  Pesh Joomang is both the Keeper of, and the Gate to, the Old Magic.  Some claim that he is the greatest patron of them all.

 

$100 everything above plus all stretch goals + my own module signed and shrink wrapped "The tomb of curses", coming out this year published by Dragon  Hoard  publishing + bonus patron "Pesh Joomang" the greatest patron of them all, not included anywhere else.

 

 

 Other Ways You Can Help

 

Can't contribute right now, but still want to see "Angels, Daemons and Beings Between" succeed? Then please tell your friends about the project, jump onto your favorite RPG forum board, social media site, or head down to your local gaming store and send them our way.

 

Thank you for taking the time to read this campaign and for your support of the "Angels, Daemons and Beings Between" project. If you have any questions, please leave a comment below and remember that even if you are unable to contribute monetarily, spread the word

story:
Like us on Facebook!

TreesureGame mobile application helps, if your kid hates to exercise

Finnish start-up-company Treesure has launched a gps-based mobile game, which attacks on child obesity and tries to help kids and families to exercise more.

If you google “Kid hates to exercise” you’ll get around 45 million results. That is very deep. Parents are asking what to do with a kid, who really hates to exercise and be outdoors.
TreesureGame is a Finnish mobile application launched for iPhone/iPad and it will help families to activate kids more in an exciting way. TreesureGame is based on a stories and the idea is to plan a route from home to shop, kindergarten or nearby park. Along the route, the story that kid has chosen, continues and there are also activating tasks for kids and whole family.

The money - Why we need it?

We have set up a goal to gather 10 000 dollars. This money will go straight to make our very small company to improve product that certainly helps families to move and activate together more.

We will:


Develop a new version of TreesureGame available for you guys and maybe even your own characters!
 

Why would I fund it?

We can see our own kids, who love to play the Angry Birds or watching cartoons. But when it comes to walking the dog outside or just few hundred meters to nearest shop, the activity doesn’t interest at all.

It is not a secret that kids love stories. My kids love stories and they really want to listen stories, books and comics. Why couldn’t you just bring those stories outdoors? And that’s how TreesureGame was first invented.


With TreesureGame, we hope to activate kids to be more physically active outdoors. And the results have been very positive so far. A father with 12-year old son tried the game out and whoops, they went on a 3,5 kilometres route just by playing pirates and policemen. And my own daughter, 4 years old girl just loves the princess story and she’ll walk anywhere just because she loves it so much.

It is not about competition, it is about being healthy, we say.

It is not a secret that kids love stories. My kids love stories and they really want to listen stories, books and comics. Why couldn’t you just bring those stories outdoors? And that’s how TreesureGame was first invented.
 With TreesureGame, we hope to activate kids to be more physically active outdoors. And the results have been very positive so far. A father with 12-year old son tried the game out and whoops, they went on a 3,5 kilometres route just by playing pirates and policemen. And my own daughter, 4 years old girl just loves the princess story and she’ll walk anywhere just because she loves it so much.
It is not about competition, it is about being healthy, we say.

story:
Hi, i'm Devin Logan

Ever since a couple years ago my friends and I have wanted to either start up a gaming group or make a video game. We decided to go with the gaming group, for now.

Donating to us would help us out greatly, 

 

           What We Need & What You Get

Right now we are trying to raise $500, though this may go up in the future.

By donating a certain amount you will get tons of in-game perks, such as donator, vip, or Council.

Even if we don't reach our goal, the money will still go to setting up these servers. So even if you donate and we don't reach our goal it's still going to the same cause.

story:
Hi! Thanks for stopping by!
Today we are trying to raise some money to send the staff at ArenaNet, devoloper of the game Guild Wars 2 some delicious cupcakes to show some appreciation for the hard work and dedication they are putting in to Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns, the new expansion being released October 23.

Why?
Guild Wars 2 is a mostly well balanced MMO with no subscription fee and next to no pay to win strategy. It's exceptionally beautiful. It's forgiving to new MMO players. It has unsurpassed immersion and a solid player community. This, and the time, effort, and dedication this wonderful group of men and women have expended to make this exceptional game available to us are more than enough reasons. Don't you think that that deserves a cupcake?

But I can't give a lot!
A cupcake is an average of 3.50 dollars. A cupcake lasts on average, 6 bites, depending on size. Therefore if you were to give 50 cents, you would bless an ArenaNet employee with about two delicious bites of cupcake. Your 50 cents could very well be the first two bites, and generate so much happiness. Think of the power your small bit of money has!

Cupcake Conclusion
If we raise around $1300, we should be able to send enough exquisitely crafted cupcakes from The Yellow Leaf Cup Cake Co. to satisfy every ArenaNet employee. These cupcakes are going to brighten up the day of very real and unique people who make the game we all love what it is today. This is about sending some goodies to the hard working guys and gals at ANet that are working their butts of to get Heart of Thorns launched and show them we appreciate their work.

I don't know about you, but I think they deserve a cupcake or two.

story:
This is me

My name is Reto, I’m 34 years old. Since my childhood I’m a big formula 1 fan and a passionate gamer. The game genre “sports management” fascinates me since I can remember. There are quite some popular football manager games out on the market, but if you are looking for a good racing manager you won’t find a much convincing choice. I would like to be the one who is finally changing this.


This is the Game


Every new player will start in the cart racing class as a twelve-year-old. With the right settings on your vehicle and by applying the right strategies to the race you will earn better rankings. The better the rankings are, the sooner new teams or higher racing classes will make you an offer to join.

Make your career from the Cart-class to Formula BMW up to Formula 1 and finally become a legend in racing.


What you can do in Formula Career

Watch the race live

The race will start at 20:00 every other evening. You will be able to watch it live, or if you missed it, a recording of the race. You can also choose not to watch the race, it’s up to you.

Find the optimal setup for your qualifying

Only with the ideal settings will you achieve a good ranking in the qualifying. Run as many training rounds on the track as you need to find these settings. You can modify settings on the engine’s output, the gearbox, brakes and the amount of gas.

Negotiate with sponsors

As in real life you will need to make money in Formula Career. Based on the ranking you will get price money and next to it every racer will have undertaken sponsors. You’ll need the money to pay for costs of the training, repairs and to buy upgrades for your racecar. The negotiations with sponsors will be a key part of the game play.

Improve your racing car

The right settings on the car will not always guarantee a top ranking. You will have to improve your car frequently. There are several upgrades available for all the different parts of your racing car. And they have to be paid for…

Create your own driver

The players can create their own driver in Formula Career, from the hairstyle up to the beard.

Train your driver

Your driver will need training to make a career in a higher racing class. Strength, concentration and endurance are just some examples.



How it works

The season consists of 15 racing weekends and will last for 1 calendar month. This means, that there will be a race every other evening.

Day 1

8:00 – 20:00 is the time frame for the training. This time is as well used to optimize the settings on your race car.

Day 1 to Day 2

20:00 – 08:00 is the time frame for the qualification. A good starting position will decide the race.

Day 2

At 20:00 the race begins. You can watch it live on your screen.

There is plenty to do in Formula Career in between the races. Find new sponsors, train your driver, repair & optimize your race car and much more.



The representation

The video demonstrates how the game approximatively will represent itself. This is not the final version yet, we will work on a highly improved graphic in the final version. The operation has been kept simple and provides great overview. The graphical interface will run on smartphones, tablets and PC to ensure you can play Formula Career from everywhere you are.



Innovation requires funds

To bring this unique game to live I will work with a German software developer that will build this highly complex game for me. To finance this undertaking I will need CHF 40000.-, this includes the development of the app & graphics, renting the servers to host it and future game updates.




That you get for your funding

Perks are special as they provide you the ability to immortalize yourself in the game. Be it as a sponsor or with your own racing team. Find more details in the two videos.



Become a part of Formula Career

You can create your own sponsor in Formula Career, give it a name and a logo to make it unique.

It’s your choice to either give it a real name or to make up a name.

Formula Career will have a total of 100 sponsors, that will be categorised into 5 classes:

very small    $ 50 USD

small            $ 100 USD

medium     $ 200 USD

big               $ 400 USD

very big      $ 800 USD

Whilst the size of the logo remains the same for all classes, a really big sponsor will be contracted more often as the driver will be interested in the money and faster cars. This means, that the logo of the really big sponsors will be shown in the game more often than the really small sponsors.

Depending on the sponsors category the price for the perks will be different. I will reserve myself the right to decide what sponsor names I will allow in the game.



Create your own racing team for Formula Career, give it a name and two different colors to make it unique.

It’s your choice if you use your own name, i.e. smith racing or if you create a fantasy name. Formula Career will have a total of 50 teams, in 5 racing classes, which each are then divided into 3 categories:

Beginners-Team         $ 100 UDS per Team

Advanced Team         $ 500 USD per Team

Professional-Team  $ 1000 USD per Team

A good team will not only earn better reputation but as well a faster racing car, which will position you more likely for winning the race. The different teams will have different perk prices. I will reserve myself the right to decide what racing team names I will allow in the game.




previously acuqired racing Teams


Beginners-Teams (2 of 20)

Team-Name: Eisoher GP
Racing-Class: unknown


Team-Name: Gas Monkeys
Racing-Class: unknown


Team-Name: Banzai Squad
Racing-Class: unknown


Advanced-Teams (1 of 20)

Team-Name: Branded Petrol

Racing-Class: unknown


Team-Name: Morrella Racing
Racing-Class: unknown


Top-Teams (1 of 10)


Team-Name: Lupo Racing
Racing-Class: unknown



previously acuqired Sponsors


very small Sponsor (2 of 20)


     

    Sponsor-Name: Donut


Sponsor-Name: Forward Media
Homepage: http://forwardmedia.ch/


small Sponsor (0 of 20)

there have been not yet purchased small sponsors



medium Sponsor (0 of 20)

there have been not yet purchased medium sponsors



big Sponsor (1 of 20)

Sponsor- Name: Chiliworks

Homepage: http://www.chiliworks.ch

there have been not yet purchased very big sponsors

story:
iLavado will be a new home based laundries network. With the app the customers will be able to find a professional or home based partner who offers laundry service near theirs home. The dresses will be recollect and delivery at the customer's home, dry and clean !
 

Where is the innovation? All people can start their home based laundry for FREE and offer to the customers their laundry service !

Customer Side

The project is based in offering a laundry service with collection and delivery at your home. With our app the customer can select a premium or basic laundry partner and the partner will collect the dresses at home, and delivery it dry and clean in maximum 48 hours.

After delivery, the customer can vote the service from 1 to 5 stars and post a comment. The customers can see the evaluation of the partners in the map with the proximity function of gps.

Partner Side

All people can subscribe the home based laundry network and offers with our IOS and Android app, the laundry service with a low cost price.
 


The professional laundries can register in the app and offer the premium service with a different flat price based on the weight of the dresses. This guarantees to the customers the double choices on the kind of service.

The partner will pay a credit in the app when a customer order the service.
We'll organize pack of credits in special offers. For example a home based laundry will pay a commission for each order the customer confirm in the app.

Future Development

We want to lunch it in all markets. We'll start with European Market and South America Market. With this project we're looking for country managers and investors to open other international markets.

We need funds for:

- Network organization;
- Customer service;
- Development of the apps;
- Advertising and press campaigns;
- Websites in different languages;
- App upgrades.

Please help us to share this campaign, so a lot of people can start up a new laundry activity at home !

story:
My Story

Hi, my name is David and this is my last year in university. My passion for games started very early and now I'm about to step in the world professional game development. But development tools and resources are expensive and as a student I can't afford it. I need Your help! 


Their Story

In Star Frontier you'll control a spaceship with a very small crew: the Captain and the First Officer. Their mission is to visit boring worlds. Boring worlds are those which suspended communication years ago. These planets are mostly destroyed or depopulated. But on their last mission the situation gets hot. The solar system's sun is in it's final stage and about to explode in a supernova. Our heroes need to jump into light speed before the explosion reaches them. But their ship is really old and gains speed slowly. 



A sketch that illustrates the main concept of the game.


Your task is to evade space refuses  so the ship can gain speed continuously. Over time the spaceships's shield will charge up and protects it, but because the shield generator is old too, it won't last long. During the great escape the Captain and the First Officer will give you some good ... and some really bad advice, and from their conversations you will learn more about them, and their early life.



Added some color.


The game's visual style will be pixel art. The player will control the ship with "left" and "right" buttons. At the top section of the screen the Captain and the First Officer append funny comments to the events below.

What I Need & What You Get

I need at least $755 for game art and publishing fees (Android Market and Apple Store). But I also need additional $800 for Unity with Android and iPhone plug-ins, which makes mobile development really fast.

I offer something for any amount of donation, please check out the perks on the right side to learn more


Other Ways You Can Help

You can help a lot with sharing too. If you can’t contribute at the moment you can still help me with sharing the project with others on twitter or facebook. It really helps.

Thank you!


Estimated release date: 2012 Summer

story:
View our announcement trailer in the gallery or click this link:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1coSlDHPHS8


###UPDATE #2

We were featured on www.diygaming.com!

http://www.diygamer.com/2012/04/the-space-race-...

And www.n4g.com !

http://n4g.com/news/976349/bearstronauts-bear-astronauts-indie-game-needs-your-help


###UPDATE #1

We added a whole bunch of content to our updates/gallery pages! Check em out!



Bearstronauts: Bear Astronauts is a 2D side scrolling action game for Windows Pc and Mac; but it is so much more than just a run of the mill run and gun. It its heart, it is a game about second chances, but it's also about exploration, solving puzzles and blasting enemy Bearstronauts with a variety of awesome weapons. The player controls John Hunt, the first initiate of "Project Honey," and the only American Bearstronaut.



The Jist: 

During the cold war, Russian scientists performed gruesome experiments in order to provide their Cosmonauts with the ability to hibernate in outer space.  Ashamed by what they had created the Russians abandoned their bear astronaut program, and their Bearstronauts in deep space.  However due to a series of events that will be revealed through the course of the game, the Russian Bearstronauts return to Earth hell bent on conquering the world. By utilizing the technology used to create them, the Soviet Bearstronauts are turning innocent people into evil Bear Astronauts. The only one who can stop them is the only one immune to their transformation technology; American Bearstronaut John Hunt.

  • Utilizing Guns, Grenades and his Bear hands John Hunt must battle an army of enemy Bearstronauts as he fights to stop the invasion.
  • Experience intense combat featuring exciting fast action gunplay and melee attacks.
  • Outwit adversaries by using stealth, mines or traps.
  • Solve puzzles and unwind a truly unique and exciting story.

 

 

About the developers and why we need your help:

Digital Bacon is a 3 man development studio from Toronto Ontario Canada. We worked together as artists in the film industry, and as huge gamers decided to make the leap into game development. However, being far more creative than we are rich, we need help to fund this project.  In addition to day to day development costs we need help paying for things like a unity3d Pro license to take advantage of many great features not available in the indie version. We also need help paying for sound fx libraries like the great products available from BoomLibrary.com. We'll also need great music for our game, and we'll need to hire a composer to make sure we can produce the best product possible.

Additionally we want to be able to publish on as many platforms as possible and in as many languages as possible, your support can make all of this happen!

 

About the Incentives:

Games funded by gamers should be made by gamers. We want your help and input in making this game, we have incentives ranging from forum contribution, providing Beta Tester access, creating game art, character design choices, and becoming your own full blown Bearstronaut character.  We want to include you in the process because, frankly game design is a lot of fun, and if you're helping pay for the game you deserve to get in on the action!

 

 

What else can you do to help?

Please spread the word! Crowd sourcing only works if there is an actual crowd, power in numbers and all that jazz! Luckily for us, indieGoGo makes it easy with those handy share buttons at the top of the page! Use em! The universe (us included) will thank you for it!

Digital Bacon is a 3 man development studio from Toronto Ontario Canada. We worked together as artists in the film industry, and as huge gamers decided to make the leap into game development. However, being far more creative than we are rich, we need help to fund this project.  In addition to day to day development costs we need help paying for things like a unity3d Pro license to take advantage of many great features not available in the indie version. We also need help paying for sound fx libraries like the great products available from BoomLibrary.com. We'll also need great music for our game, and we'll need to hire a composer to make sure we can produce the best product possible.
Additionally we want to be able to publish on as many platforms as possible and in as many languages as possible, your support can make all of this happen!

 
About the Incentives:
Games funded by gamers should be made by gamers. We want your help and input in making this game, we have incentives ranging from forum contribution, providing Beta Tester access, creating game art, character design choices, and becoming your own full blown Bearstronaut character.  We want to include you in the process because, frankly game design is a lot of fun, and if you're helping pay for the game you deserve to get in on the action!
 

 
What else can you do to help?
Please spread the word! Crowd sourcing only works if there is an actual crowd, power in numbers and all that jazz! Luckily for us, indieGoGo makes it easy with those handy share buttons at the top of the page! Use em! The universe (us included) will thank you for it!

story:
Sending Emotion Online

When you send flowers or gifts to family, friends or colleagues, your thoughts and emotions are most often missing from your gift. The "card" that is sent along with your gift is limited in space, hard to find, and often includes a boring generic message.

Sending e-cards isn't a great solution either--often missed in crowded inboxes and have little ability to convey your warm wishes. Sending e-cards has never carried the emotional impact.

Let's change this! A personalized video greeting card can and will send emotion with our campaign.

A video greeting card platform is a simple solution to the boring, emotionless, printed on the back of the shipping label card that is all too often is sent out with the gifts and flowers that we all order online.

The thanksVideo greeting card service provides an easy tool for users to record a video greeting, send it, share it, and save it forever.

Imagine sending flowers to your mom for Mother's Day. Like usual, you order the flowers online and type a sweet message to be included. That message gets printed on the back of the shipping label and your flowers are shipped off to your mom. She receives your beautiful flowers, but unfortunately can't find the card and has no idea who sent them.

Let's try this again with thanksVideo. Your order the flowers, you can still type your sweet message, but you also have the option to record a quick video. Sing her a song, read her a poem, or simply tell her Happy Mother's Day in your own words. She receives your video and can  reply with a thank you video of her own (and hopefully you'll get to see those beautiful flowers you sent now sitting on her table!)

With your help we can change the greeting card world online and help evolve the eCard to the next big thing, a Video Greeting Card!

What We Need & What You Get

We need $10,000 to build out the video greeting card platform. The completed product will make recording and sending a video greeting card a snap!

PERKS

  • $10 You will be informed about updates to our service including when mobile apps will be available
  • $25 You will receive access to beta test, send videos for free
  • $100 Beta test and free basic membership for life when it launches
  • $250 Beta test and free pro membership for life when it's available
  • $500 All the benefits above PLUS your own Personalized Recording Widget!

If we are unable to reach our goal, the funds we do raise will still be used for the apps, but the process will slow down. All perks will still be honored.

The Impact

The convenience to send emotion online will disrupt eCards online and cookie cutter greeting cards offline in the following ways:

  1. Save and resend your video messages and memories for life
  2. Send video messages to family members and soldiers overseas
  3. Be one of the first in the world to try this new technology
  4. Send videos on birthdays, weddings and other special event messages like never before
  5. Vimeo backed video service for trustworthy reliable service for your keepsake video storage

With a successful campaign we plan to launch the mobile apps in late 2013.

My name is Brandon Kirkland. I have been in the floral industry for over 10 years. Our team has had recent success delivering valuable apps and e-commerce solutions. Please visit epicMobi.com and epicFlowers.com

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, please consider using the Indiegogo share tools to broadcast our campaign about helping the first video greeting card platform that helps send the emotion that can be saved forever. 

 We want to keep you informed about updates to our service including when mobile apps will be available.

story:
Short Summary

Suppression is a 2D side-scrolling horror game wherein you take the role of a police officer who has recently moved to a new town. Whilst checking out an apartment in which to live he stumbles into the beginnings of an epidemic, one that is turning the residents into shambling, vicious creatures.
After becoming infected himself, the officer resolves to help as many survivors who are under siege in the apartment building as possible before he succumbs completely to the disease.
 
It is here that the game really begins, as the story branches out into many different endings that you can achieve based upon your actions.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding is going to help pay for the music/sound composer, artist and the developer to complete the project. If we don't meet the goal then it will take us a lot longer to finish the game.

The Impact

You will be helping our small team make our best game yet and allow us to dedicate more time towards finishing it off.

The Budget

Programming: $2800
Art: $1500
Music: $500
Sound: $200
Other Expenses: $1000

story:
Celestia - a fantasy dream!

The world of Celestia comprised of 18 unique lands housing interesting breeds, engaging activities, and more. Players are able to navigate and explore Celestia with a goal of unlocking all 18 worlds. Unlock all worlds to utilize the whole gene-pool and participate in each world's unique activities.

Breeding

Celestial Equine offers a sophisticated genetics system, which allows members to create their own breeds. There are two ways to create a new Celestial Equine. The first option is to breed two current breeds together, and hope for at least three significant genetic differences. A significant genetic would be body type, wings, horn, or a combination of at least three minor genetic differences (mane/tail type, base color, hoof type). The second option is to use our Art Depot area and order a custom breed by a Celestial Equine approved artist. Players have the ability to keep their breed private (unable to be created by other users) or set the breed for public use!

 

Horse Creation

Horse creation is another leading attraction on Celestial Equine! We have two methods available for creating horses on Celestial Equine; our standard creation and and the premium creation area.

The standard horse creation area is available for all users! Simply navigate to your desired world, select the standard horse creation area, and choose a breed to create! You may select your horse's breed, gender, starting competition discipline, and name. A set of random genetics will be generated upon creation.

The premium horse creation area allows the user to select their desired body type (10 available) and the individual genes for their horse. Check out the preview below to view the premium creation process! This creation area is accessible to all users, but only players with an upgraded account can complete this creation process.

 

Competitions

Fancy entering your horse into the show ring? Compete in Breed, Age, and Level specific shows to further your horse's show career. From Hunter Jumpers to Western Pleasure, we have it! Once your horse has reached the top levels, compete in club sponsored championship classes! Points gained from these classes vastly increase your horse's value!

Battle System

Not so into competitions? Join us in the battle arena and put your horse's strength to the test! Battle other players, or in game characters! Players may also place bets on current battles, and spectate!

Beauty Contests

Are you a breeding fanatic with a passion for showing off your horses? Then this activity is right up your alley! Beauty contests allow players to vote for their favorite horse in a head to head, pick your favorite style of game. Simply enter your horses (winners selected weekly in each world), and then mosey on over to the voting area. Here is a preview of the game's setup.

Other Features

Celestial Equine has a ton of other fun activities! From player profiles to fun shops, Celestial Equine has it all. Here is a short current feature list!

  • Player Profiles
  • Referral System
  • Private Messaging
  • Player Shops
  • Bank System
  • Forums
  • Player Chat
  • Battle System
  • Questing System
  • Breed Gallery
  • Top Scores
  • Competitions
  • Horse Creation
  • Battle
  • Worlds
  • World Stores
  • Activity Awards
  • Custom Gene Orders
  • Upgraded Gameplay
  • and more!

 

 

Why indiegogo?

Celestial Equine is currently in a live development mode with an amazing, active group of players. We are entering our final phase of development, which includes perfecting our current features, resolving lingering bugs, and most importantly improving our game's load times. In order to speed up Celestial Equine, we are needing a total overhaul of our genetics system. Due to the massive amount of genetics available for players, we have ran into glitches during breeding, breed registration, and an overall lag during browsing and other activities. Here is a breakdown of where the $1,500 will be spent:

  • Genetics Overhaul - $500.00

The genetics update will not only improve load times, but also result in a more interesting breeding experience! In addition to optimizing our database, we also have a new breeding algorithm to introduce! This new genetics feature will allow for carrier genes, incorporate genetics from the parent breeds, and add a rarity factor into the breeding script.

  • Server Upgrades - $500.00

We anticipate a sizeable influx of active players once our load times are resolved, so upgrading our servers is our second most important priority. We would like to raise 3 months worth of server fees + the fee our developer will charge to assist with the move. Our upgraded server will ensure Celestial Equine stays lighting fast!

  • Bug Fixes - $300.00

We have a handful of pesky bugs (errors) remaining that need to be resolved. These fixes will help improve the game experience and allow us to introduce new features!

  • Genetics Management System Upgrades - $200.00

The last bit of our raised funds will go towards upgrading our genetics management admin panel! These upgrades will include the following:

  • Adding a rarity aspect to each gene and integrating into the breeding script
  • Speed up gene uploading process
  • Ability to preview recently uploaded breeds to check for errors

All additional funds will go towards new features!

Contributor Rewards!

Onto the fun stuff! We have put together a really fun set of rewards for those of you who contribute to our fundraising goal. Each reward tier includes all previous tiers, so keep that in mind! Keep reading to learn more about the rewards!

 

Backer - $3

The "backer" level includes a 1 month silver upgrade and 1 special item! This reward is instantly redeemable (manually given) after being purchased. You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support!

Avid Supporter - $10

The "avid supporter" level includes a 2 month gold upgrade and 2 special items! This reward is instantly redeemable (manually given) after being purchased. You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards.

Celestial Supporter - $15

The "Celestial Supporter" level includes 1 custom body color and a registration scroll to register a new breed. This reward will be delivered after the genetics overhaul (instant rewards given at the time of purchase). You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards.

Genetic Pack - $25

The "Genetic Pack" level includes a package of unreleased genetics (2 natural body colors, 2 unnatural body colors, 2 horns, 1 wing set) that will be exclusive to our Indiegogo campaign. This reward will be delivered after the genetics overhaul (instant rewards given at the time of purchase). You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards.

Genetic Guru - $35

The "Genetic Guru" level includes 1 custom advanced genetic! Backers may choose from a custom horn, wing set, mane/tail combination, or a wearable. Limitations do apply! This reward will be delivered after the genetics overhaul (instant rewards given at the time of purchase). You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards.

Premium Supporter - $50

The "Premium Supporter" level includes 1 custom advanced genetic and 2 custom body colors! Backers may choose from a custom horn, wing set, mane/tail combination, or a wearable along with 2 natural or unnatural body colors. Limitations do apply! This reward will be delivered after the genetics overhaul (instant rewards given at the time of purchase). You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards.

Wearable Guru - $75

The "Wearable Guru" level includes 2 custom detailed wearables! For example: full-body armor or a tack set. Limitations do apply! This reward will be delivered after the genetics overhaul (instant rewards given at the time of purchase). You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards.

Platinum Package - $100

The "Platinum Package" level includes a low digit account and forever upgrade! This reward is delivered instantly after backing (manually). You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards (please see previous tiers for delivery times).

Breed Creator - $150

The "Breed Creator" level includes 1 custom breed order (limitations do apply)! This reward will be delivered after the genetics overhaul. You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards (please see previous tiers for delivery times).

Celestial Creator - $200

The "Celestial Creator" level includes a pack of 5 unreleased wearables! These wearables will only be available for "Celestial Creator" level backers. This reward will be delivered after the genetics overhaul. You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards (please see previous tiers for delivery times).

Super Supporter - $250

The "Super Supporter" level includes a pack of 5 unreleased genetics! These genetics will only be available for "Celestial Creator" level backers. This reward will be delivered after the genetics overhaul. You also receive a "contributor" account title to show-off your support! Also includes previews tier rewards (please see previous tiers for delivery times).

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Luckily, Celestial Equine has already overcame most of the risks of development. We are currently a live game, so the risk of not delivering a playable game is non-existent! Our major challenge is potentially encountering a more complicated genetics issue that would result in a later than expected delivery date. A more complicated genetics re-code could also result in a higher cost, which would take away funds from new features. However, we are very confident in our amazing development team to deliver an on-time, on-budget improved genetics system!

Other Ways You Can Help

Unable to donate but love Celestial Equine? Share our campaign to help spread the word about this amazing, free to play browser game!

story:
After years of research and innovation, the GameSir VX2 AimSwitch gaming keypad is coming . It is specially crafted for the unprecedented gaming performance and unrivaled reliability. The next-generation keypad criteria are refreshed by GameSir. By polishing and optimizing the CPU and algorithms, as well as all aspects of external hardware upgrades, the overall performance of the GameSir VX2 has increased by 200% over the predecessor. 

 

✅ 200% overall performance improvement

✅ TTC mechanical red switches

✅ Full keys programmable

✅ ALPS ultra-thin 3D joystick

✅ Designed for console games

✅ Agility X 2.4GHz wireless technology (2nd Gen.Polling Rate up to 1000Hz)

✅ LED backlight with 16.8 million color options

✅ GM400 Ultra-lightweight RGB Gaming Mouse

 

We are proud of what we have created to date but need your help to push it over the limit. By supporting us, you will witness the birth of GameSir VX2 AimSwitch. We have a fully functional physical model of the device now and all funds raised will go directly to funding the final mass production. We would like you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.

As early backers, we are keen on rewarding you with some unique perks. All GameSir VX2 AimSwitch claimed as perks will have at least 23% OFF the planned retail price.

Allowing for the campaign date, Christmas (December 25th,2019) and Chinese traditional Spring Festival(January 24th,2020) is approaching. In order to let all backer enjoy sheer pleasure brought by GameSir VX2 AimSwitch during holiday with friends and family, we will arrange to get VX2 shipped as soon as the campaign goes alive.  The first deliveries will begin in December 2019 - only for early backers.


What prizes will the lucky backers receive?

The 1st Prize, one GameSir VX2 AimSwitch for FREE, 3 lucky backers. 
The 2nd Prize, one GameSir GM400 Gaming Mousefor FREE , 7 lucky backers. 
The 3rd Prize, one GameSir F4 Falcon for FREE , 10 lucky backers. 


We will post the list of lucky backers on our Facebook.
The prizes will be sent together with GameSir VX2 ordered on Indiegogo in late Jan, 2020. 
As always, we will provide free shipping.

 

 

36 TTC Mechanical Red Switches


The all-new GameSir VX2 AimSwitch gaming keypad is a wireless one-handed mechanical keypad with 36 TTC mechanical red switches, enabling up to 50 million keystroke lifespan and being superior for speed and accuracy to give you a gaming experience like never before.

 

Designed Specifically for Console Games

The tech changes the way we play console games. GameSir VX2 AimSwitch gaming keypad supports almost all consoles. It’s compatible with Xbox One, Xbox One S, Xbox One X, PS4, PS4 Slim, PS4 Pro, Nintendo Switch and Windows PC. GameSir VX2 AimSwitch can be widely used on different consoles. All you have to do is to overshine others from different platforms.

 

2nd Gen. Agility X 2.4GHz Receiver

GameSir developed a robust wireless solution to solve the fundamental problems of latency, stability, and connectivity. The ultimate result is  Agility X 2.4GHz wireless technology, a pro-class wireless solution. GameSir VX2 AimSwitch keypad utilizes the 2nd generation Agility X 2.4GHz wireless receiver for instant and reliable wireless connection with ultra-low latency, whose polling rate achieves up to 1000Hz, and is 8 times faster than that of  1st generation.
Let you get rid of the wires hassel and play games freely.

 

Support Wired / Wireless Mouse

GameSir VX2 AimSwitch is widely compatible with different mouses, so you can choose your favorite mouse to use together, which adds another layer of compatibility to GameSir VX2 AimSwitch. In brand-new VX2 combo, VX2 AimSwitch comes with a GameSir GM400 wired mouse, lightweight, RGB, and skeleton,armed with the flagship sensor PMW3360, which will, no doubt, become your royal ally in the FPS games.

 

Backlight with 16.8 Million Color Options

Featuring individually programmable backlit keys and 16.8 million color options. Choose from preset lighting effects or create your own unique palette of colors for a gaming experience that’s truly yours. In the darkness, the moon is not the only that people can see, including you this time.

 

Full Keys Programmable via GameSir G-Crux

With the GameSir G-Crux app on mobile phone, you can customize every key to your own preference to maximize in-game control. In addition, a variety of parameters can be precisely adjusted through GameSir G-Crux app, including mouse sensitivity, smoothness, horizontal sensitivity, vertical sensitivity, ADS setting, deadzone setting and button setting.

 

7-Key Roll-over with Anti-ghosting

GameSir VX2 AimSwitch gaming keypad features anti-ghosting capability for up to 7 simultaneous key presses. Even in the heated and highly-commanding FPS games, there is no need to worry. Moving, aiming, shooting, grenade, jump...Everything is at your fingertips.

 

ALPS Ultra-thin 3D Joystick

Equipped with the ALPS ultra-thin 3D joystick which can be used as D-pad or left joystick makes GameSir VX2 AimSwitch gaming keypad completely different from other gaming keyboards.

 

Compact and Portable Design

Play a console game on the couch with the compact designed GameSir VX2 AimSwitch gaming keypad, allowing you to focus on the game by getting rid of half the keyboard for more precise control. Of course, you can also easily travel with GameSir VX2 AimSwitch and get you back into the game wherever you go.


Aluminium Alloy Top Plate

The precision-machined aluminum alloy top plate is integrated stamping with CNC engraving process, allowing for both a minimal design and a beautiful aesthetic. Excellent workmanship provides a sturdy top plate and non-slip chassis for an unbeatable gaming experience.

Note：Before you pledge, please make sure that your  delivery destination is listed as followed,otherwise we cannot delivery your items.
 

North America: USA, Canada,Martinique,Antigua and Barbuda, Dominican Republic

South America:Mexico,Brazil, Argentina,Colombia,Chile,Guiana, Cuba,Panama,Bahamas, 
Paraguay, Venezuela

Europe: France, UK,Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Switzerland, Austria, Belgium, 
Denmark,Spain, Belarus,Russia,Bulgaria,Cyprus,Greenland,Norway, Croatia,
Faroe Islands,Czech Republic,Iceland,Estonia,Germany,Hungary,Latvia, Romania, 
Finland, Slovenia, Ireland,Luxembourg,Lithuania,Slovakia,Malta,Portugal,Serbia,
Poland,Ukraine,Sweden,Gibraltar

Asian:South Korea, Malaysia,Taiwan, Japan, Singapore,Israel, Lebanon,UAE,Indonesia,
Qatar, India,Saudi Arabia,Turkey,Kuwait,SriLanka,Pakistan,Bahrain,
Oman,Kazakhstan, Afghanistan,Bhutan, Myanmar, Cambodia, Laos, Vietnam

Africa: South Africa,Reunion,Thailand,Ghana,Togo, Zambia,Sudan,Côte d'Ivoire,Democratic Republic of the Congo,Central African Republic, Ethiopia

Oceania: Australia,New Zealand
 

In order to make more gamers can enjoy the sheer joy brought by our product, GameSir are striving to cooperate with the global well-renowned logistics companies. However, allowing for  complicated and uncontrolled factors, some countries and regions are still out of reach, for we feel sorry for those gamers, but we are working on expanding our delivery range. We believe that in the not distant future, you shall experience our products crafted by passion and out-of-state technology. Thank you for your attention to this campaign.

 

 

 

Q: What console is GameSir VX2 AimSwitch compatible with?
A: GameSir VX2 AimSwitch is compatible with the PS4, XBOX ONE, and Nintendo Switch.

Q: What is the difference between GameSir VX and GameSir VX2?
A: GameSir VX had taken a huge step to evolve to GameSir VX2. We not only redesign the appearance but also improve the universal using experience.

 

Q: Do I need any apps when using GameSir VX2 AimSwitch?

A: No, you don’t. After unboxing the GameSir VX2, you can follow the instruction to directly play on PS4/XBOX ONE/Nintendo Switch without any apps. But you also can download G-Crux to customize the game configs for advanced gaming experience.

 

Q: What does the GameSir VX2 AimSwitch joystick do?

A: You can use the 3D joystick to accomplish the functions of direction pad, but you also can use it as a left joystick of any console controller by pressing FN+4.

 

Q: Does GameSir VX2 AimSwitch supports headphone?
A: We are sorry to tell you that GameSir VX2 doesn’t support headphone, please try to use other audio equipment for assistance.


Q: When is expected to deliver the items?
A:We plan to ship items from Hong Kong in October 2019. The estimated delivery time 
is approximately 20-25 business days.
 
Q: How can I track my package?
A:If the item has been shipped, we will upload or email you the 
tracking number and tracking link. You can track your package anytime, anywhere.

Q: Can I change my shipping address?
A: You can email us at cs@gamesir.hk to check the status of your order. 
If the item has not been shipped, we can change the shipping address for you.

Q：Can I cancel my order?
A：You can email us at cs@gamesir.hk to check the status of your order. 
If the item has not been shipped, we can cancel the order for you.

Q：Which countries can you ship to?
A：We can ship to most countries, but we are unable to ship to PO boxes or
 APO/FPO addresses. If it turns out that it cannot be shipped to your 
country, we will cancel your order and fully refund you.
 
Q：Who pays duties & import taxes?
AYour order may be subject to additional taxes, duties and/or fees (including customs 
clearance) charged by the destination country. Please contact the destination 
country’s customs office for more information. You will be responsible for any 
customs duties or taxes required in destination country. During shipment, 
USPS, FedEx, UPS, DHL or your local customs may contact you to collect duties or
 taxes. Once you pay the customs broker, your order will be processed for final delivery. 
Unfortunately, we are unable to mark items as gifts or to change commercial invoices.

Q：What is your warranty policy?
A：* 12-month replacement of the same model from the date you received it.
* Contact us for free online technical support.
Website: https://gamesir.hk
E-mail: cs@gamesir.hk

Q：What is your return policy?
A:We want you to be thrilled with your new purchase. However, if you need to return
 an item, we're here to help. You have 30 calendar days to return the item from the date 
you received it. Please ensure that the item you're returning is in original package with all 
the items, accessories, giveaways and documentation that were included when you received
 it. And you need to pay the return shipping cost. If you want to start the return process, 
please send an email to cs@gamesir.hk to tell us the reason for the return and check the 
return address.

Q：Who can I reach out to if I still need help?
A：You can contact us at cs@gamesir.hk.

After years of research and innovation, the GameSir VX2 AimSwitch gaming keypad is coming . It is specially crafted for the unprecedented gaming performance and unrivaled reliability. The next-generation keypad criteria are refreshed by GameSir. By polishing and optimizing the CPU and algorithms, as well as all aspects of external hardware upgrades, the overall performance of the GameSir VX2 has increased by 200% over the predecessor. 
 
✅ 200% overall performance improvement
✅ TTC mechanical red switches
✅ Full keys programmable
✅ ALPS ultra-thin 3D joystick
✅ Designed for console games
✅ Agility X 2.4GHz wireless technology (2nd Gen.Polling Rate up to 1000Hz)
✅ LED backlight with 16.8 million color options
✅ GM400 Ultra-lightweight RGB Gaming Mouse
 


We are proud of what we have created to date but need your help to push it over the limit. By supporting us, you will witness the birth of GameSir VX2 AimSwitch. We have a fully functional physical model of the device now and all funds raised will go directly to funding the final mass production. We would like you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.
As early backers, we are keen on rewarding you with some unique perks. All GameSir VX2 AimSwitch claimed as perks will have at least 23% OFF the planned retail price.
Allowing for the campaign date, Christmas (December 25th,2019) and Chinese traditional Spring Festival(January 24th,2020) is approaching. In order to let all backer enjoy sheer pleasure brought by GameSir VX2 AimSwitch during holiday with friends and family, we will arrange to get VX2 shipped as soon as the campaign goes alive.  The first deliveries will begin in December 2019 - only for early backers.



What prizes will the lucky backers receive?
The 1st Prize, one GameSir VX2 AimSwitch for FREE, 3 lucky backers. The 2nd Prize, one GameSir GM400 Gaming Mousefor FREE , 7 lucky backers. The 3rd Prize, one GameSir F4 Falcon for FREE , 10 lucky backers. 
We will post the list of lucky backers on our Facebook.The prizes will be sent together with GameSir VX2 ordered on Indiegogo in late Jan, 2020. As always, we will provide free shipping.
 


 
36 TTC Mechanical Red Switches

The all-new GameSir VX2 AimSwitch gaming keypad is a wireless one-handed mechanical keypad with 36 TTC mechanical red switches, enabling up to 50 million keystroke lifespan and being superior for speed and accuracy to give you a gaming experience like never before.
 
Designed Specifically for Console Games

The tech changes the way we play console games. GameSir VX2 AimSwitch gaming keypad supports almost all consoles. ALPS Ultra-thin 3D Joystick

Compact and Portable Design

Of course, you can also easily travel with GameSir VX2 AimSwitch and get you back into the game wherever you go.

Aluminium Alloy Top Plate

story:
NOTE: This campaign is now closed.

We're still in active development. If you want to keep up with our progress, bookmark our website!

http://rolledoutgame.com/

_______________________________________________________________________________________

 

I'm Brandon Johnson, and I really like marble games. I've made custom levels for many popular marble rolling games and even released huge cohesive custom level packs, featuring over 200 unique levels.

None of them had all of what I wanted in a marble game condensed into a single package though. What I was asking for was very specific:

  • Online multiplayer for racing or competition
  • Out-of-the-box custom level support with a workshop for sharing creations
  • In-game global leaderboards for courses and stages
  • Spectating
  • Replays
  • The character in the ball will break free and escape your computer
  • ...actually, not that last one.

So, I decided to make my own game to meet my needs!

I'm passionate about this, and so are my friends! They have gotten together to help me in many different ways to make this project a reality. But if I were to break our contributions down to the primary, 'core' team, well.. here we are!

Brandon Johnson is the lead designer (backgrounds, levels, gameplay, and more!) and writer. He has very strong opinions on videogames.

Mike is the lead programmer, and basically the reason we're here right now. He's responsible for any complex systems in the game, like our custom level support!

Laurence is the lead artist. They're very talented!!! They're the one responsible for many of the adorable animals you've seen, as well as most of the drawings on this page.

...hey, come on! Don't laugh! We're all young 20-somethings, so give us a break!

Also, here's a list of all the wonderful people who have helped us so far!

  • Jo
  • Abi
  • Upy
  • Frankie
  • Peter
  • Nathan
  • Umm... well, there are lots! Thank you guys!!!

Here's a bunch more places where you can interact with our community, and receive updates on how the game is progressing.

https://discord.gg/FxWcK93

https://blog.rolledoutgame.com/

https://twitter.com/rolledout

Like I said, we're all young 20-somethings. Just making a living today is rough!! For the most part, the funding will be going to basic needs, such as rent and bills for our primary team members, so we can work on the game as much as possible. But these funds will also allow us to pay artists we commission (painters, musicians, etc). After all, the art is very important too! If a game has no heart in its art, then people won't want to play it very much, no matter how good the mechanics are.

Naturally, some of the money will go to taxes, processing fees, etc. 

Meeting our goal would allow us to work on the game a great deal more than we can currently. I would personally be able to work full-time on it... what? That's unbelievable!!!

Of course, if you support, you will be able to reap the rewards in-game. There shall be titles and special thanks for anybody who supports at all. For those who go above and beyond, we have several tasty offers on the table, such as the chance to work with our team to implement a playable character of your design!

  • $30,000 - In-Game Level Editor (MET! THANK YOU!!)
  • $40,000 - Party Games (MET?! WHAT! THANK YOU!!)
  • $50,000 - Lua Scripting (Oh... we met this one too...?)
  • $75,000 - Post-Release Nintendo Switch Port!

We've hit so many of our stretch goals, I can hardly even believe it. We hope we meet everybody's expectations! It's scary to think we might even hit that Switch port goal, but let's shoot for the stars!

Ultimately, we just want to make a fun game. We're passionate and like-minded people, and we want to make a game that not only would we have fun playing, but anybody and everybody.

We have talents uniquely suited to make this real! And so far, we've come a long way in realizing that already. If you want to play it too, hopefully you can help it happen.

...every little thing helps. If this project looks interesting to you, share it with a friend! Post it on your blog! E-mail your boss, or your partner, or a stranger you've never even met. Put the URL to this page on a scrap piece of paper, stuff it in a bottle, and cast it out to sea. Seriously, this stuff helps more than you can imagine.
