We have talents uniquely suited to make this real! And so far, we've come a long way in realizing that already. If you want to play it too, hopefully you can help it happen.


...every little thing helps. If this project looks interesting to you, share it with a friend! Post it on your blog! E-mail your boss, or your partner, or a stranger you've never even met. Put the URL to this page on a scrap piece of paper, stuff it in a bottle, and cast it out to sea. Seriously, this stuff helps more than you can imagine.

story:
Versione Italiana \ Italian Version  



… so much more than a game!



The union of history, art, strategy, entertainment and passion, that’s what M400 was born from. A game of conquest, which revolves around an important and defining historical period: the 1400.

But this century is so much more than just a bunch of years: it’s one of the most magnificent periods in the history of Italy and the European culture. Because it’s not a coincidence if the end of this century marks the beginning of the “Modern Age”.

M400 comes from the idea to bring strategic board games to the next level; neither the name nor the historical references to the XV century are just a fortuity. The century that saw the fall of the last Eastern Roman Empire, the birth of the power of Spain and England, the ascent of the Russian Republics, and the achievements of the glorious Republic of Venice are the ideal background for the birth of this new way to have fun with history.

M400 has a high level of playability with multiple players, and the cards allow an always different gameplay, helping the creation of new and different matches. Every time a player finds themselves in the late Medieval period of the game, they can rewrite important pages of history in new ways, through trades, battles, journeys and revolutions. The challenge and the strategy also allow to create with the opponents new dynamics of gameplay beyond the rules: deceptions, bluffs, silent and secret alliances. The almost total absence of chances and coincidences, linked to the dices, reduces the possibility of a player to win just by chance.

M400 is a game which contains very different elements, elements that can mix, and give the player a unique and unpredictable kind of entertainment. This game is for everybody, and the choice of the Latin makes it reach a new level of universality, just like the one of the world of the XV century.



                                  (M400 Preview at Lucca Comic's and Games, 
                                          one of the biggest game's fair in italy)

The creation of M400 started during a winter night in January 2009, when a group of  friends, tired of the dullness and the monotony of some board-games, started chatting about ideas, solutions, projects and  childhood dreams.

So, almost like by luck, M400 was born, and then small ideas became a  real project and also a dream: the dream to create a board-game where players could battle with cards, where luck was just a small part of the game, and where you would have to think and show your skills, your strategy, your cunning and your bravery to win. A board-game suited for everyone, from history lovers to fight and conquest game lovers, from children to adults, from families to associations, and to all of the people who tried a board-game for the first time in their life.

After focused and accurate tests, a lot of different ideas and 5 years of hard work, that group of friends, with their passions and skills, managed to create a game that is revolutionary in its kind, where a player fights, laughts and smiles from the beginning to the end of the match, and he can always make the right choice to win the game.

That group of friends is today the staff of M400, and they are trying to achieve an ambitious goal: the chance to show the world their game and keep on following their dreams.

- A Game Board with the "Europe of the XV century".



- 10 wooden "army" figures in 5 different colors.


- 75 wooden round "State-marker" and "Point-marker" tokens in 5 different colors.

- 20 wooden round "Pestem" black tokens.


- 109 game freehanded drawn cards.


- A Score Board.


-  The rules.


The cards of M400 are a mix of straight forwardness and beauty.


Every card is hand drawn by the M400 staff illustrators and it shows details of the life, the society and of the world in the XV century. Its size 8.8 x 6.5 cm (Magic standard), a symbol of quality, makes the deck easy to use without sacrificing the beauty of the illustrations; the number displayed in the four corners makes it easier to manage the cards; the rounded corners make the deck safer for the children.  


                                                      (same size Magic's card)



The Game Board is a High Quality representation of the Europe of the XV century, 50 x 70 cm. The historical setting and the "old looking" graphic make the Board look like an ancient parchment, where you can play with the wooden figures and at the same time learn and understand the history and geography of Europe, taking the world of Board-games to the next level. 

                               (the graphic evolution of the map over the years)


                                               (the high detail of the sea)




The historical setting of M400 is based on an accurate historical research made by the experts of the staff of the game.

The geopolitical organization of the Board shows the European states between the 1400 and the 1453, year of the fall of Constantinople, even though something had to be changed to help the gameplay.

Latin has been chosen as the official language of the game, because it was one of the most important languages of the Europe the the XV century. This choice represent another educational element and it gave our staff the chance to create a game that can be played all over the world.

Some of the features of this game are hardly found in other board-games, and this make M400 a unique game of strategy and conquest. 

Some states (Venetia, Luxeborg and Byzantium) show geographical organizations that are "strange" for a Board-game, but they help strategical movements during the game. The game strategy is completely rebuilt: luck is just a small part of the match, where the cards are the main characters, with rules easily understandable even for children; the ability to manage the deck has now the same importance as the movements of the figures and the goals.

Every player can stay in the game till the end, and they can always regain points and win. M400 also has unique cards (Pestem and Rivolutionem) which have unpredictable and very strategical effects.

The "Alliance" 2 player mode offers the most skilled players a new experience of ability and entertainment.

The staff really put a lot of effort in the creation of the game in every detail and sustained the expenses for the realization of prototypes and the launch of M400 during the most important Italian Board-game exhibitions.

Now we need you to bring M400 in every house and to fulfill the dream of a unique game, which is the result of beauty, knowledge and entertainment in a simply box.


Your contribution will be precious for the creation of a high quality product (update 10 June)



We could start the production of the first 1000 boxes to September 2014.
If all goes well, we will be able to distribute the game in November and for this Christmas, also for the perks :)

Thank you for your contribution.

The following is the list of perks. Each perks has one or more objects for you to thank you for your generosity.

Shipping Cost:
The shipping costs are not included in the cost of perks. When your perks will be ready, we will contact you and when the shipment will be paid we will send you the object.

Payment Method:
The payment is processed through Paypal.





Our initial goal is the minimum to begin the production of the game, but our staff has in the works several evolution for the original game.. help us to reach our successive goals !

 $ 65.000 = M492 Goal

When we'll reach the "M492" goal, our staff will start developing the first Expansion Pack on M400. The historical setting moves to the end of the XV century, to the age of the geographical discoveries and the beginning of the "modern age".

New Capitals, new conquests, new hand made cards, entertainment and communications between players brought to the next level: a New World, with a new way to play.

                                         (The probable extended map of M492)


$ 120.000 = M400 Multiplayer 3D

Our staff is made up of 3D Designers and Software Developers, so we have already imagined a possible version of the online game but the realization costs are very hight (cloud server, hardware, external developers, etc..)

With your help we can achieve also this target !!


 

                                              (the probable M400 3D Screenshot)


$ 200.000 = M400 Mobile Version

If we reach this new goal, we will begin the development of mobile application game. We want to create an multiplayer app for all platforms (Windows Phone, iOS and Android) but even in this case the development costs will be very high.

Help us to reach this goal!!



We are the staff of M400.
We are a group of a little crazy friends with a passion for games that have dedicated the last few years to the creation of their first boardgame.
Our group name is Creative Sun Games and M400 is only the beginning........
With your help we will be able to giving life to many new projects :)



                       ARE YOU READY TO REWRITE HISTORY?
                                                              www.m400.it









VERSIONE ITALIANA






… molto più di un gioco!



Dall’incontro tra storia, arte, strategia, divertimento e passione nasce M400, un gioco di conquista che ruota intorno ad un periodo storico molto importante e significativo: il 1400.

Una data storica che rappresenta molto di più di una scansione temporale: dietro a queste quattro cifre si nasconde uno dei periodi storici di maggiore splendore per l’Italia e la cultura europea. Non a caso la fine di questo secolo segna l’ingresso dell’umanità nella cosiddetta “era moderna”.

M400 nasce dall’idea di portare i giochi strategici ad un’ulteriore evoluzione; la scelta del suo nome e il riferimento storico al XV secolo non è casuale. Il secolo che ha visto la caduta dell’ultimo
Impero Romano d’Oriente, la nascita della potenza spagnola e di quella inglese, l’ascesa delle repubbliche russe e le imprese della gloriosa Repubblica di Venezia, rappresenta lo sfondo ideale per concepire questo nuovo modo di divertirsi con la storia.

L’originalità del gioco è alla base della sua grafica accattivante: la plancia di gioco fonde in sé la rappresentazione fisica di un’Europa moderna con una divisione politica storicamente attendibile, seppur semplificata e in parte adattata alle esigenze del gioco strategico.
L’aggiunta di carte di gioco tematiche e graficamente nuove, fa di M400 un gioco da tavola didattico in grado di rappresentare, visivamente e strutturalmente, la società, le tecnologie, la geografia e la storia del XV secolo.

M400 presenta un elevato grado di gioco in più giocatori, mentre l’utilizzo di carte permette di intervenire di volta in volta in maniera differente, creando partite mai uguali e mai ripetitive. Ogni volta che un giocatore si cala nel mondo tardo medievale del gioco, è in grado di riscrivere pagine di storia sempre differenti, attraverso commerci, battaglie, viaggi e rivoluzioni. La competizione e la strategia permettono, inoltre, di instaurare con gli avversari dinamiche di gioco che vanno oltre la schematizzazione di un regolamento: sotterfugi, bluff,
alleanze segrete e silenziose. L’assenza di meccanismi basati sul caso, come ad esempio i dadi, riduce al minimo il verificarsi di condizioni favorevoli al giocatore legate esclusivamente al caso fortuito.

M400 è un gioco che concentra in sé elementi molto diversi tra loro, ma in grado di amalgamarsi e regalare ai suoi partecipanti un divertimento unico e mai scontato. E’ un gioco adatto a tutte le età e la scelta del latino come lingua grafica lo proietta verso l’universalità, come universale era il mondo antico rappresentato.

P.S.: E’ consuetudine per i giocatori di M400 salutarsi la mano sinistra aperta e pronunciando il termine benedettino “Benedicite” prima di iniziare la partita, per augurarsi un buon auspicio.



                                  (Presentazione di M400 a Lucca Comics and Games)


La creazione di M400 è nata in una tipica serata invernale del gennaio 2009, quando un gruppo di amici, stanco della monotonia e la ripetitività di alcuni giochi, ha cominciato a discutere di idee, soluzioni, progetti e sogni nel cassetto.

E così, un po’ per gioco, è nato M400 e con il passare del tempo quelle piccole idee sono diventate un progetto concreto, ma anche un sogno: quello di dare alla luce un gioco da tavola in cui i giocatori si potessero sfidare a colpi di carte, dove la fortuna fosse ridotta al minimo e dove per vincere fosse necessario dosare al meglio abilità, strategia, astuzia, coraggio, rischio. Un gioco da tavola che fosse adatto a tutti, dagli appassionati di storia agli amanti dei giochi di combattimento e conquista, dai bambini agli adulti, dalle famiglie alle associazioni, fino a tutti coloro che non hanno mai provato un gioco da tavola.

Attraverso test mirati ed accurati, numerose idee e 5 anni di duro lavoro, quel gruppo di amici, ognuno con la sua passione e le sue capacità, è riuscito a dare alla luce un gioco rivoluzionario nella sua tipologia, dove il giocatore lotta, ride e si diverte, dall’inizio alla fine e ha sempre la possibilità di effettuare la scelta giusta e di vincere la partita.

Quel gruppo di amici costituisce oggi lo staff di M400 e cerca di raggiungere un obiettivo ambizioso: avere la possibilità di mostrare al mondo il proprio gioco e continuare ad inseguire i propri sogni.

-  Plancia di gioco “Europa del XV secolo”;



-  10 pedine “esercito” in 5 colori differenti;


-  75 pedine “segna-stati” e “segna-punti” in 5 differenti colori;

-  20 pedine “Pestem” di colore nero;


-  109 carte da gioco disegnate a mano;


-  Tabella punti;


-  Regolamento.




Le carte di M400 mescolano in sé praticità di gioco e bellezza artistica.


Ogni carta mostra un disegno realizzato a mano dai disegnatori di M400 e rappresenta alcuni particolari della vita, della società e del mondo del XV secolo. Le dimensioni 8,8 x 6,5 cm (standard Magic) rendono il mazzo maneggevole senza limitare la bellezza dei disegni e rappresentano garanzia e qualità; il valore numerico della carta inserito nei 4 angoli rende la gestione del mazzo più semplice anche con molte carte a disposizione; gli angoli arrotondati rendono sicure le carte anche per i giocatori più piccoli


                                         (stessa dimensione delle carte di Magic)



La plancia di gioco è realizzata in alta qualità e dimensioni 50 x 70 cm, con rappresentazione grafica dell’Europa del XV secolo. L’ambientazione storica e la grafica computerizzata “antichizzata” trasformano la plancia in un’antica pergamena, in cui si può giocare con le pedine, ma allo stesso tempo conoscere ed imparare la storia e la geografia, portando il mondo dei giochi da tavolo ad un ulteriore livello di sviluppo.

                       (l'evoluzione grafica della mappa nel corso degli anni)


                                               (il mare altamente dettagliato)




L’ambientazione storica di M400 è basata su un’attenta ricerca storiografica compiuta dallo staff qualificato del gioco. L’assetto geo-politico della plancia mostra gli stati Europei tra il 1400 e il 1453, anno della caduta di Costantinopoli, seppur con piccoli adattamenti per funzionalità di gioco. La lingua scelta per i nomi delle carte da gioco è quella latina, universalmente riconosciuta ed utilizzata in tutta Europa nel XV secolo. Questa scelta offre un ulteriore elemento didattico e dà la possibilità al nostro staff di creare un gioco universalmente utilizzabile in tutto il mondo.


Alcune caratteristiche di gioco sono difficilmente ritrovabili in altri giochi da tavolo e fanno di M400 un gioco di strategia e conquista unico nel suo genere.

Alcuni stati (Venetia, Luxeborg e Byzantium) mostrano dislocazioni storiche “strane” per un gioco da tavolo, ma che aumentano gli spostamenti strategici all’interno della plancia. La strategia di gioco viene completamente rivoluzionata: i combattimenti vengono sottratti alla fortuna utilizzando esclusivamente le carte, secondo un meccanismo molto conosciuto anche dai bambini; la gestione del proprio mazzo diventa fondamentale a pari livello degli spostamenti delle pedine e la scelta degli obiettivi.

ogni giocatore rimane in gioco dall’inizio alla fine della partita, con possibilità di recuperare punti in classifica e vincere.
M400 presenta anche carte esclusive (Pestem e Rivolutionem) dagli effetti imprevedibili e altamente strategici.

La variante di gioco a 2 giocatori “Alleanza” offre ai giocatori più esperti un ulteriore prova di abilità e divertimento.

Finora il nostro staff si è impegnato alla creazione del gioco in ogni minima parte e ha sostenuto le spese per la realizzazione dei prototipi e la sua presentazione nelle principali fiere italiane. Ora abbiamo bisogno di voi per portare M400 su ogni tavolo da gioco e realizzare il sogno di creare un gioco dal carattere unico, che concilia bellezza, conoscenza e divertimento in un’unica scatolola.

Il tuo contributo sarà prezioso per la realizzazione di un prodotto di alta qualità (aggiornamento 10 giugno)

Inizieremo la produzione delle prime 1000 scatole per Settembre 2014
Se tutto andrà bene, saremo pronti a distribuire il gioco per Novembre e per Natale, anche per i  perks :)


Grazie del vostro contributo.

Quella che segue è la lista dei perks (premi). Ogni perks porta uno o più oggetti per voi per ringraziarvi della Vostra generosità.

Costi di spedizione:
I costi di spedizione non sono inclusi nell' importo del perks. Quando il tuo perks sarà pronto, noi vi contatteremo e al momento del pagamento della spedizione vi invieremo l'oggetto.

Metodo di Pagamento:
Il pagamento è processato tramite Paypal.





Il nostro goal iniziale è il minimo per iniziare la produzione del gioco, ma il nostro staff ha in cantiere diverse evoluzioni del gioco originale... aiutateci a raggiungere i nostri successivi  goals!

 $ 65.000 = M492 Goal

Espansione M492

Al raggiungimento dell’obiettivo “M492”, il nostro staff ha in cantiere la realizzazione della prima espansione di M400. L’ambientazione storica si sposta alla fine del XV secolo, nell’epoca delle scoperte geografiche e dell’ingresso del mondo nell’era moderna.

Nuove capitali, nuove conquiste, nuove carte disegnate a mano, divertimento e interazione tra i giocatori oltre ogni limite: un Nuovo Mondo per modi sempre nuovi di giocare.

                                         (La probabile mappa estesa di M492)


$ 120.000 = M400 Multiplayer 3D

Il nostri staff è formato da Disegnatori 3D e sviluppatori di Software, quindi abbiamo già immaginato una possibile versione del gioco online ma i costi di realizzazione sono molto alti (cloud server, hardware, sviluppatori esterni, etc..)

Con il vostro aiuto possiamo raggiungere anche questo obiettivp!!


 

                                              (il probabile screenshot di M400 online)


$ 200.000 = M400 Versione Mobile

Se raggiungeremo questo nuovo goal, inizieremo lo sviluppo dell' applicazione mobile del gioco. Vogliamo creare una App multigiocatore per tutte le piattaforme (Windows Phone, iOS e Android) ma anche in questo caso i costi di sviluppo sono molto alti.

Aiutateci a raggiungere questo goal!!



Noi siamo lo staff di M400.
Siamo un gruppo di amici un pò fuori di testa con la passione dei giochi che hanno dedicato gli ultimi anni alla creazione del loro primo gioco da tavola.
Ci facciamo chiamare Creative Sun Games e M400 è solo l'inizio........

Con il vostro aiuto possiamo dar vita a numerosi nuovi progetti :)




                       SIETE PRONTI A RISCRIVERE LA STORIA?
                                                   www.m400.it

Dall’incontro tra storia, arte, strategia, divertimento e passione nasce M400, un gioco di conquista che ruota intorno ad un periodo storico molto importante e significativo: il 1400.Una data storica che rappresenta molto di più di una scansione temporale: dietro a queste quattro cifre si nasconde uno dei periodi storici di maggiore splendore per l’Italia e la cultura europea. Non a caso la fine di questo secolo segna l’ingresso dell’umanità nella cosiddetta “era moderna”.M400 nasce dall’idea di portare i giochi strategici ad un’ulteriore evoluzione; la scelta del suo nome e il riferimento storico al XV secolo non è casuale. Il secolo che ha visto la caduta dell’ultimo Impero Romano d’Oriente, la nascita della potenza spagnola e di quella inglese, l’ascesa delle repubbliche russe e le imprese della gloriosa Repubblica di Venezia, rappresenta lo sfondo ideale per concepire questo nuovo modo di divertirsi con la storia.L’originalità del gioco è alla base della sua grafica accattivante: la plancia di gioco fonde in sé la rappresentazione fisica di un’Europa moderna con una divisione politica storicamente attendibile, seppur semplificata e in parte adattata alle esigenze del gioco strategico. L’aggiunta di carte di gioco tematiche e graficamente nuove, fa di M400 un gioco da tavola didattico in grado di rappresentare, visivamente e strutturalmente, la società, le tecnologie, la geografia e la storia del XV secolo.M400 presenta un elevato grado di gioco in più giocatori, mentre l’utilizzo di carte permette di intervenire di volta in volta in maniera differente, creando partite mai uguali e mai ripetitive. Ogni volta che un giocatore si cala nel mondo tardo medievale del gioco, è in grado di riscrivere pagine di storia sempre differenti, attraverso commerci, battaglie, viaggi e rivoluzioni. La competizione e la strategia permettono, inoltre, di instaurare con gli avversari dinamiche di gioco che vanno oltre la schematizzazione di un regolamento: sotterfugi, bluff, alleanze segrete e silenziose. L’assenza di meccanismi basati sul caso, come ad esempio i dadi, riduce al minimo il verificarsi di condizioni favorevoli al giocatore legate esclusivamente al caso fortuito.M400 è un gioco che concentra in sé elementi molto diversi tra loro, ma in grado di amalgamarsi e regalare ai suoi partecipanti un divertimento unico e mai scontato. E’ un gioco adatto a tutte le età e la scelta del latino come lingua grafica lo proietta verso l’universalità, come universale era il mondo antico rappresentato.P.S.: E’ consuetudine per i giocatori di M400 salutarsi la mano sinistra aperta e pronunciando il termine benedettino “Benedicite” prima di iniziare la partita, per augurarsi un buon auspicio.
                                  (Presentazione di M400 a Lucca Comics and Games)
La creazione di M400 è
nata in una tipica serata invernale del gennaio 2009, quando un gruppo di
amici, stanco della monotonia e la ripetitività di alcuni giochi, ha cominciato
a discutere di idee, soluzioni, progetti e sogni nel cassetto.

E così, un po’ per
gioco, è nato M400 e con il passare del tempo quelle piccole idee sono
diventate un progetto concreto, ma anche un sogno: quello di dare alla luce un
gioco da tavola in cui i giocatori si potessero sfidare a colpi di carte, dove
la fortuna fosse ridotta al minimo e dove per vincere fosse necessario dosare
al meglio abilità, strategia, astuzia, coraggio, rischio. Un gioco da tavola che
fosse adatto a tutti, dagli appassionati di storia agli amanti dei giochi di
combattimento e conquista, dai bambini agli adulti, dalle famiglie alle
associazioni, fino a tutti coloro che non hanno mai provato un gioco da tavola.

Attraverso test mirati
ed accurati, numerose idee e 5 anni di duro lavoro, quel gruppo di amici,
ognuno con la sua passione e le sue capacità, è riuscito a dare alla luce un
gioco rivoluzionario nella sua tipologia, dove il giocatore lotta, ride e si
diverte, dall’inizio alla fine e ha sempre la possibilità di effettuare la
scelta giusta e di vincere la partita.
Quel gruppo di amici
costituisce oggi lo staff di M400 e cerca di raggiungere un obiettivo
ambizioso: avere la possibilità di mostrare al mondo il proprio gioco e
continuare ad inseguire i propri sogni.

 
- 
Plancia di gioco “Europa del XV secolo”;

- 
10 pedine “esercito” in 5 colori
differenti;
 
- 
75 pedine “segna-stati” e “segna-punti”
in 5 differenti colori;
 
- 
20 pedine “Pestem” di colore nero;
 
- 
109 carte da gioco disegnate a mano;

- 
Tabella punti;


- 
Regolamento.

Le
carte di M400 mescolano in sé praticità di gioco e bellezza artistica. Ogni
carta mostra un disegno realizzato a mano dai disegnatori di M400 e rappresenta
alcuni particolari della vita, della società e del mondo del XV secolo. Le
dimensioni 8,8 x 6,5 cm (standard Magic) rendono il mazzo maneggevole senza
limitare la bellezza dei disegni e rappresentano garanzia e qualità; il valore
numerico della carta inserito nei 4 angoli rende la gestione del mazzo più
semplice anche con molte carte a disposizione; gli angoli arrotondati rendono
sicure le carte anche per i giocatori più piccoli                                         (stessa dimensione delle carte di Magic)La plancia di gioco è
realizzata in alta qualità e dimensioni 50 x 70 cm, con rappresentazione
grafica dell’Europa del XV secolo. L’ambientazione storica e la grafica
computerizzata “antichizzata” trasformano la plancia in un’antica pergamena, in
cui si può giocare con le pedine, ma allo stesso tempo conoscere ed imparare la
storia e la geografia, portando il mondo dei giochi da tavolo ad un ulteriore
livello di sviluppo. 
                       (l'evoluzione grafica della mappa nel corso degli anni)                                               (il mare altamente dettagliato)
L’ambientazione storica
di M400 è basata su un’attenta ricerca storiografica compiuta dallo staff
qualificato del gioco. L’assetto geo-politico della plancia mostra gli stati
Europei tra il 1400 e il 1453, anno della caduta di Costantinopoli, seppur con
piccoli adattamenti per funzionalità di gioco. La lingua scelta per i nomi
delle carte da gioco è quella latina, universalmente riconosciuta ed utilizzata
in tutta Europa nel XV secolo. Questa scelta offre un ulteriore elemento
didattico e dà la possibilità al nostro staff di creare un gioco universalmente
utilizzabile in tutto il mondo.

Alcune caratteristiche
di gioco sono difficilmente ritrovabili in altri giochi da tavolo e fanno di
M400 un gioco di strategia e conquista unico nel suo genere. 

Alcuni stati (Venetia,
Luxeborg e Byzantium) mostrano dislocazioni storiche “strane” per un gioco da
tavolo, ma che aumentano gli spostamenti strategici all’interno della plancia.
La strategia di gioco viene completamente rivoluzionata: i combattimenti
vengono sottratti alla fortuna utilizzando esclusivamente le carte, secondo un
meccanismo molto conosciuto anche dai bambini; la gestione del proprio mazzo
diventa fondamentale a pari livello degli spostamenti delle pedine e la scelta
degli obiettivi. 

ogni giocatore rimane
in gioco dall’inizio alla fine della partita, con possibilità di recuperare
punti in classifica e vincere.
M400 presenta anche carte esclusive (Pestem e Rivolutionem) dagli effetti
imprevedibili e altamente strategici. La variante di gioco a 2 giocatori
“Alleanza” offre ai giocatori più esperti un ulteriore prova di abilità e
divertimento.

Finora il nostro staff
si è impegnato alla creazione del gioco in ogni minima parte e ha sostenuto le
spese per la realizzazione dei prototipi e la sua presentazione
nelle principali fiere italiane. Ora abbiamo bisogno di voi per portare M400 su
ogni tavolo da gioco e realizzare il sogno di creare un gioco dal carattere
unico, che concilia bellezza, conoscenza e divertimento in un’unica scatolola.Il tuo contributo sarà prezioso per la realizzazione di un prodotto di alta qualità (aggiornamento 10 giugno)
Inizieremo la produzione delle prime 1000 scatole per Settembre 2014Se tutto andrà bene, saremo pronti a distribuire il gioco per Novembre e per Natale, anche per i  perks :)Grazie del vostro contributo.Quella che segue è la lista dei perks (premi). Ogni perks porta uno o più oggetti per voi per ringraziarvi della Vostra generosità.Costi di spedizione:I costi di spedizione non sono inclusi nell' importo del perks. Quando il tuo perks sarà pronto, noi vi contatteremo e al momento del pagamento della spedizione vi invieremo l'oggetto.Metodo di Pagamento:Il pagamento è processato tramite Paypal. Il nostro goal iniziale è il minimo per iniziare la produzione del gioco, ma il nostro staff ha in cantiere diverse evoluzioni del gioco originale... aiutateci a raggiungere i nostri successivi  goals! $ 65.000 = M492 Goal
Espansione
M492

Al raggiungimento dell’obiettivo “M492”, il nostro
staff ha in cantiere la realizzazione della prima espansione di M400.
L’ambientazione storica si sposta alla fine del XV secolo, nell’epoca delle
scoperte geografiche e dell’ingresso del mondo nell’era moderna.

Nuove
capitali, nuove conquiste, nuove carte disegnate a mano, divertimento e
interazione tra i giocatori oltre ogni limite: un Nuovo Mondo per modi sempre
nuovi di giocare.
                                         (La probabile mappa estesa di M492)$ 120.000 = M400 Multiplayer 3DIl nostri staff è formato da Disegnatori 3D e sviluppatori di Software, quindi abbiamo già immaginato una possibile versione del gioco online ma i costi di realizzazione sono molto alti  (cloud server, hardware, sviluppatori esterni, etc..)Con il vostro aiuto possiamo raggiungere anche questo obiettivp!!                                               (il probabile screenshot di M400 online)$ 200.000 = M400 Versione Mobile Se raggiungeremo questo nuovo goal, inizieremo lo sviluppo dell' applicazione mobile del gioco. Vogliamo creare una App multigiocatore per tutte le piattaforme (Windows Phone, iOS e Android) ma anche in questo caso i costi di sviluppo sono molto alti.Aiutateci a raggiungere questo goal!!Noi siamo lo staff di M400. Siamo un gruppo di amici un pò fuori di testa con la passione dei giochi che hanno dedicato gli ultimi anni alla creazione del loro primo gioco da tavola. Ci facciamo chiamare Creative Sun Games e M400 è solo l'inizio........ Con il vostro aiuto possiamo dar vita a numerosi nuovi progetti :)                       SIETE PRONTI A RISCRIVERE LA STORIA?                                                   www.m400.it

story:
Download the rule book

(Note: Viewing the rule book in the dropbox viewer may result in poor quality. Be sure you click the download button for the best experience.)

Robots on the Line is a creative game for 2 to 4 players where you build and sell robots. It's a perfect balance of fun and strategy. It's great for casual and hardcore players alike.

I've had the wonderful opportunity to test the game literally hundreds of times with a lot of different people—men, women, and children from ages 8 to 70. I also belong to the Board Game Designers Guild of Utah. Some of the testers have published games themselves so I was able to get really good feedback. I'm on version 37 of the game, some versions had minor changes while others were nearly complete redo's but all the changes that were made had one purpose—simplify and make the game better. Ultimately we ended in a good place with a solid game. I hope that you’ll agree.

This Indiegogo campaign is for those who missed the Kickstarter launch.


The mechanic revolves around robot parts moving down two conveyor belts on the production line. Players take turns pulling robot parts (heads, bases, arms, hands, batteries, antennas and magnets). As players collect parts they are able to build robots throughout the game and once they've met requirements they can sell the robots and earn money. The game ends when all tiles are off the line or when a player builds 4 robots. The player with the most money at the end of the game wins.




Buyer Boards with requirements and bonuses


Above are some robot builds from an actual game. You can see some of the original prototypes here:

Link 1

Link 2

Link 3


For $5 you'll receive an exclusive Robots on the Line desktop wallpaper.


For $48 and up you'll receive one copy of the game plus the Robots on the Line desktop wallpaper.

story:
Rougarou: Journey to the End of the Night will be held in Columbus, Ohio on September 20, 2014. Working together, we can produce a fantastic event for adults and students in Columbus.

Created over a decade ago in San Francisco, Journey to the end of the night is a creative commons street game that’s been played in large cities around the world.  It's a massive game that combines elements of a 5k race with a scavenger hunt, all mixed with a game of tag.  Contestants race through the twilight streets of downtown Columbus, running from checkpoint to checkpoint completing tasks and trying not to get caught.  At the end there's a big party.

The event is held annually in places like Washington D.C., Chicago, Vienna, Budapest, Sydney, Australia, and, with your help, Columbus, Ohio--the 15th largest metropolis in the United States.

The event will be produced by Columbus Creative Cooperative, a local arts organization, in partnership with lots of Central Ohio businesses and organizations.  We also have help from Story Luck, an organization that has run a similar event in Chicago for many years.

A ROUGAROU is a creole version of a Werewolf.  This year's theme is based loosely on the book Hagridden by Samuel Snoek-Brown, which will be released this fall by Columbus Press.

Learn more about Rougarou: Journey to the End of the Night at www.ColumbusJEN.org.


How the Game Works

When you arrive at the event, you'll be given a map with the location of 5 checkpoints in the city. You'll have to make your way from checkpoint to checkpoint, completing a task at each one.  The task is normally a puzzle or something goofy, never anything hard.  Your job is to get through all five checkpoints and to make it to the end of the course.

But...there are Rougarous (werewolves) chasing you, trying to tag you.  At the beginning of the event, there will be only one tagger.  But if you get tagged, you also become a Rougarou yourself, and your job will be to tag other people.

The truth is that being Rougarou is just as much fun as finishing the race.  To avoid being tagged, you can run, you can hide, you can use cunning and deception.

If you take the shortest distance between all five checkpoints, you'll travel a total of about 5 kilometers, which you can reasonably walk in about an hour.  But, you make your own course, and you may find yourself taking longer routes to avoid getting tagged.  It's all up to you.  You may use public transportation.


The Fundage

We're seeking $1,000 to produce this event.  That money will be used for four primary purposes:

  • Race Materials.  We'll need to print maps, make headbands for teams, and other miscellaneous items to effectively run a great Journey to the End of the Night event.
  • Promotion.  The more people we can get to an event like this, the more fun it is!  We need to print posters and flyers, host websites and more to get the word out about this event.
  • Props and Theatrics.  There's a big difference between a cheap checkpoint, and one that's really invested in the theme.  In order to provide an immersive ROUGAROU experience, we'll need to spend some money on props, costumes and decorations for our event.
  • Closing Party.  Venues, beverages, decorations--all of these things cost money, and they're all important to providing a really cool event.


The Rewards

Our rewards will help you spread the word about this awesome event, and to get into the Rougarou mood!

Our t-shirts are provided by Outfit Good.  They're high quality American Apparel shirts, printed right here in Columbus, Ohio, and they're so soft you'll want to have a baby just so you can wrap it up in one.  T-shirts will be shipped within one week of the end of this Indiegogo campaign.  T-shirts are available in heather black (gray) or gold.


Columbus Press will provide paperback pre-release copies of Hagridden, autographed by Samuel Snoek-Brown. This fantastic book is the best way to get in the mood to be chased by Rougarous.  Plus, it's the only way to get an autographed copy ahead of the book's official release date.  Books will need to be signed and shipped to you, but should arrive within two weeks of the close of this campaign.

If your company would like to sponsor this event, we'd be happy to feature your company name and/or logo on all of our printed and website materials.


A Free Event

It's important to us that we offer this event to the general public for free.  But there's a reason that most 5k races charge $30-$60 to run--the costs really add up.

Only with your help can we make sure that we're producing a first-class event that will be 100% free to participate in.  Together, we can build a great event that's based on community, creativity and exploring our great city.


The Leadership Team

Noah Firestone is a JEN aficionado.  He organized last year's event in Columbus, has assisted with the organization of the RAJEN event in Chicago for many years, and is a real smart dude.

Alan Files is a computer scientist.  He brings a lot of energy, know-how and resources to the team.

Brad Pauquette is a writer, and the founder and director of Columbus Creative Cooperative, one of the midwest's largest independent writers' groups.  He provides organizational support for the event, as well as a well of resources and volunteers.


Risks & Challenges

The risks to this event are minimal.  If we don't reach our funding goal, we'll still put on an event, it just won't be nearly as cool.

All of the funds will be collected and spent under the proven stewardship of Columbus Creative Cooperative, so you can be sure that 100% of the money raised will be used appropriately.  You can also be confident that the event will be executed as promised.


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can give financially.  But we can still use your help in the following ways:

  • Tell people about this Indiegogo campaign.  If this seems like a good idea to you, please help us by spreading the word to others.  Indiegogo has even provided some helpful tools for sharing this event via social media.
  • Tell people about the event.  We'd like to spend some money promoting this event, but at the end of the day a successful turnout is up to you!
  • Volunteer.   We need skilled and unskilled volunteers to help make this event happen. If you've got time to share, please go to our website, www.columbusjen.org and contact us.

Thank you for helping us to make this a great event.


UPDATE: Closing Venue Secured!

We've secured the Gateway Film Center for our closing party!  We'll have exclusive access to their private upstairs lounge area, as well as a movie theater to show classic werewolf movies!

Thank you to all who have funded the event so far.  Please keep spreading the word, this is shaping up to be an awesome event!

story:
Get out of jail free card! 


This project will aid as many protesters as possible with bail who are arrested protesting WalMart this Black Friday.  There will be protests all over the nation, arrests are anticipated, this fund raiser is to aid those who are arrested for standing up for their rights.

The burden of bail is impossible to manage on the salary of a WalMart employee, they will be given priority, but we will try to help as many people as possible.

$10,000 will bail out 20 people if bail is set at $500.

$50,000 will bail out 100 people if bail is set at $500

$100,000 will bail out 200 people if bail is set at $500

You get the idea.  It is difficult to say how many people will be arrested but it looks as if turn out this Friday will be huge.  We do not support getting arrested, or any illegal activity.  We will only bail out individuals peacefully protesting, as we still have the right to assembly.  

Arrests will have to be verified, and funds will go directly to the jail or bail bonds man.

 99% of the money raised will go directly for the bail of those arrested, any excess funds will go to aid in legal fees.  I keep 1% for my time effort and energy.   

*** You may not be able to protest, but you CAN help.  

~ Donate 

~ Get the word out about this campaign

Thank you!
story_txt: Get out of jail free card! This project will aid as many protesters as possible with bail who are arrested protesting WalMart this Black Friday.  There will be protests all over the nation, arrests are anticipated, this fund raiser is to aid those who are arrested for standing up for their rights.The burden of bail is impossible to manage on the salary of a WalMart employee, they will be given priority, but we will try to help as many people as possible.$10,000 will bail out 20 people if bail is set at $500.$50,000 will bail out 100 people if bail is set at $500$100,000 will bail out 200 people if bail is set at $500You get the idea.  It is difficult to say how many people will be arrested but it looks as if turn out this Friday will be huge.  We do not support getting arrested, or any illegal activity.  We will only bail out individuals peacefully protesting, as we still have the right to assembly.  Arrests will have to be verified, and funds will go directly to the jail or bail bonds man. 99% of the money raised will go directly for the bail of those arrested, any excess funds will go to aid in legal fees.  I keep 1% for my time effort and energy.   *** You may not be able to protest, but you CAN help.  ~ Donate ~ Get the word out about this campaignThank you!

story:
Our Story

William Moss, David Correa, and Steve Craig met for the first time at Startup Weekend San Diego. Their passion for entrepreneurship, startups, and improving the world through technology brought them together and within hours of meeting, they founded ReaderUp. The team worked tirelessly through the 54-hour event to validate and solve one of the most important problems of our time: how to ignite a child's passion for books and reading.

After competing against 10 other innovative startups, the ReaderUp team was selected as winner of the Pillsbury Law & Project Tiki's development & legal services incorporation prize: all of the important documents & resources they needed to bring their dream to life.

We are all so passiontae about the idea that we want to use it on our own children!!! Who doesnt want their children having fun reading?

So, what is ReaderUp?

ReaderUp is an app that makes books a fun and rewarding activity for young readers (grade levels 4th through 12th). 

ReaderUp will make it super easy to:

  1. Pick books & set goals
  2. Read & earn points
  3. Redeem points for rewards

Readers may use traditional paper books or eReaders and then take the chapter quizzes in our app.

Earn Points for Reading

Our quizzing system rewards readers with points for answering questions from their favorite books. Our platform will support hundreds to thousands of books geared towards readers age 10-17.

Compete with Friends

We make reading competitive as readers can go head-to-head with friends, family, or classmates to show off points, achievements, trophies and badges. Readers can also compete on local, state or national leaderboards with other readers in their grade level.

Unlock Rewards

Readers unlock customized rewards like gift certificates, coupons, and stuff from their Amazon wishlist. Parents can also set non-monetary rewards like trips to the park, a day at the movies, or even an extra hour of TV time.

Our Mission

ReaderUp was founded as a socially responsible, for-profit business. Our first priority is making an amazing mobile experience that encourages youngsters to start reading more and explore books other than what's required in the classroom. We want to bring balance back to their lives in a time when there are just too many distractions!

ReaderUp also fosters parent/child bonding as it will help parents find books that their children might be interested in and also provide them with positive reinforcements as they read each chapter. ReaderUp will appeal to both intrinsic and extrinsic rewards while creating a healthy and safe competitive environment.

What We Need

As a startup less than 1 week old, ReaderUp needs an infusion of financial support from the community to augment the founders' investment and build our platform. Funds from this project will be used as follows:

  • 50% - Development of the iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch app (don't worry, we will support Android in the future)
  • 25% - Development of a back-end platform capable of scaling to millions of readers
  • 15% - Building our catalogue of quizzes for books to be supported on our platform
  • 10% - Marketing expenses to get the word out about ReaderUp

What You Get

We made a bunch of great perks available to you to express our gratitude for your support. The higher your contribution, the more likely we'll reach our goal and make ReaderUp a reality! Perks are listed on the right, they include:

  • Virtual high-five from our Twitter account (please make sure to add your Twitter URL to your IndieGoGo profile so we know which username to tweet)
  • A special "Thank You" email message from the ReaderUp team
  • Your name listed on the ReaderUp Supporters page
  • A hand-written "Thank You" postcard from the ReaderUp team in San Diego
  • Free early access to the platform when our app is launched
  • Bronze, silver, gold, and platinum trophy name recognition on our Supporters Page + pick your favorite books to be supported on our platform
  • Leaderboard or Homepage Banner advertising opportunity for companies and brands

Choose your perk today and thank you for supporting ReaderUp!

story:
Chaos Publishing Ltd proudly presents Medieval Mastery, a tactical board game of medieval conquest in which 2-6 players assume the roles of provincial lords of France as the country erupts into a war of succession. Send your brave knights forth to conquer the surrounding lands in an all-out struggle to claim the throne!

With a playing time of 30-60 minutes, Medieval Mastery is a thrilling game for the whole family - featuring stunning artwork, multilingual support (included rule books in English, German and French) and a high degree of replayability. Check it out now:

The Rule Books: (5.0 MB – 16 Pages) + more translations coming soon!

  • English
  • German
  • French

Click the buttons to the right to get your copy!

Tile and card illustrations by Gary Simpson, Graphic design by Miles Ratcliffe

After developing the initial concept of Medieval Mastery throughout 2010, Chaos Publishing was founded and Medieval Mastery underwent extensive development prior to a small initial release at the UK Games Expo, June 2011. This was the first edition of the game and only 200 copies were ever produced.

As this edition received such a great response from its release, we then decided to move to a larger scale production of 3000 copies, with multilingual support, improved artwork and high production values.

After lots of hard work, lessons learnt and money spent, we now have the new, multilingual edition in production, ready for its initial release at SPIEL 2012 in Essen (October 18-21).

Box cover art by Miguel Coimbra

During a game of Medieval Mastery, you will:

  • Advance your knights across the map - battling the other players for control of the land
  • Defend your territories from attack - enforcing your dominion over the region
  • Make use of your resources - to acquire reinforcements, plan tactical advances and disable your rivals’ artefacts
  • Attain special bonuses from artefacts - to gain insight, manage your hand and acquire advantages in battle.
  • Plan your campaign carefully - best taking advantage of all the interacting elements of the game ...as no two games will ever be the same!
  • Manipulate your opponents - with devious tactics and unexpected assaults, keep them on their toes and unsure of your plans.

In each box of Medieval Mastery, you will find:

  • 3 Rule Books
    • 1 English
    • 1 German
    • 1 French
  • 39 Tiles (Hexes)
    • 6 Castles
    • 30 Territories
    • 3 Lakes
  • 126 Cards
    • 6 Player Decks (of 18)
    • 18 Artefacts
  • 60 Six-Sided Dice (10 of each colour)

 

[$5.00] Card Sleeves: For each $5 you add to your perk level, you will receive a supply of 200 standard Mayday card sleeves to help protect your copy of Medieval Mastery (with 74 to spare!).

 

Coming soon...

 

Now, you’ve heard about the game and our story so... what brings us to indiegogo?

Well... we have put a lot into producing the game to high standards as well as into preparing the game for its initial release at SPIEL 2012. Because of this, we are now very low on funds and have very little to help further promote the game as well as deal with any unexpected costs we may experience as we head towards worldwide distribution.

We have also had plenty of interest from people wishing to pre-order this edition of the game and the indiegogo platform will allow those people to do just that.

We guarantee that we will fulfil all our perks and will send everyone their copies of Medieval Mastery prior to its retail release, expected this November.

We have many plans for the future, with a number of great games and expansions currently in development. Your support will help bring these games to life.

There are other ways you can help besides making a contribution or pre-ordering copies of the game. Spread the word! If you think someone you know would be interested in the game, send them the link.

Want to keep up to date with all our latest news and updates? Why not like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter?

We hope you choose to contribute to our project and thank you for your support!

 

http://www.chaospublishing.com

 

http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/86882/medieval-mastery

 

How much will Medieval Mastery retail for?

Medieval Mastery will have a RRP of £24.99 in the UK, €29.99 in Europe and $34.99 for the rest of the world. Note that this may be higher for some woldwide locations.

Do you really offer FREE worldwide delivery?

Yes. We want to give everyone in the world an equal opportunity to pre-order the game and at great value!

Will I receive my perks if the goal is not reached?

The 2nd edition is currently in production so we will fulfil all our perks regardless to whether or not we meet our goal (which we hope we do). If you want to pre-order your copies and get a great deal, now is the time!

What is you booth number for Essen?

You can find us at booth 7-102.

If I'm not collecting my copies at SPIEL 2012, when will I receive them?

The 2nd edition copies should be arriving in the US at the end of October/early-November. We will then have these shipped from the warehouse and you will receive your copies in the following few days. If you ordered at the PALADIN, we should be able to ship your complete order by the end of October.

When will we hear about the over-funding achievements?

We have some great ideas for over-funding achievements and additional bonuses for you. As we get closer to our goal, we will start to reveal some of these special rewards although we are still a long way from our main goal ...so get sharing!

story:
Potions: A Curious Tale is an adventure-crafting game where your wits and ingenuity are your greatest weapons, and combat is not always the answer. Play as Luna, a young witch who overcomes obstacles with the potions she brews.

Encounter fairy tale characters and stories from around the world in new settings and situations as you guide Luna on her quest to become a potions master.

Growing up is hard, and it’s even harder when you’re a witch! As Luna, you’ll solve devious puzzles and battle monsters with your arsenal of mystical potions. With a little help from your grandmother (a powerful witch in her own right), you’ll explore enchanted lands inspired by your favorite fairy tales – often with an unexpected twist!

As powerful as your potions are, you’ll find yourself up against monsters that can shrug off your most powerful attacks. You’ll have to think on your feet and act quickly to sidestep danger. Manage your resources carefully, or you may find yourself with an empty satchel when you need your elixirs most. 

"Put the kettle to the meddle."

  • Conflict resolution that goes beyond pure combat—calm, charm, tame and scare your enemies
  • Strategic combat—use potions, the environment, and even other monsters to defeat your enemies
  • Quirky storyline featuring rich characters from folklore around the world – all with a unique spin
  • Crafting system that rewards experimentation
  • Countless environments to adventure and search for rare ingredients
  • Resource management, with a vast number of potions and ingredients
  • Luna—Your resident witch-in-training and strong, female lead
  • Beautiful, illustrated art style reminiscent of your favorite storybooks and animated tales

"Potions: A Curious Tale is a wonderfully charming visual delight that promises a tongue-in-cheek storyline and lovely characters. While still in its early stages, gamers who love crafting and exploration should keep an eye on this game."  - SIX Judge

“What struck me most about Potions: A Curious Tale is the beauty of the sprites used throughout it.” - Spong

“Potions: A Curious Tale makes players re-think the standard hack-n-slash, kill-the-monster gameplay.” - MMORPG

 "It brought back a sense of nostalgia -- it reminded me of a cross-breed of old school games." - SIX Judge

"Something wicked, this way. Fun!"

Combat is fast-paced, non-linear, and highly customizable. Set your own play style with the potions you use and the way you choose to face threats. Go full-throttle with an arsenal of deadly potions that burn enemies to ashes, or drop a confetti bomb and escape before they can blink. 

Potions’ effects can work together, allowing for powerful combinations of different attacks. They can also trigger helpful and deadly reactions in the environment. 

Timing is key, any pause taken in battle to throw one of your potions leaves you vulnerable as your enemies barrel down upon you. You’ll have to time attacks just right to take down tougher enemies. All potions are friendly-fire, so be careful where you point that incendiary vial! 

Some creatures will even need to be coaxed by other methods to share their goods. You must think carefully about which monsters to engage with and which to avoid or trick. Sometimes, using your enemies against each other is the most efficient solution. 

Get too carried away fighting and you’ll use up your precious potions and have to re-arm before your next adventure. 

"Every problem... has a solution."

On Luna’s path to master potion brewing, she must gather rare ingredients to craft new potions. While her grandmother will teach her some potion recipes, most recipes must be discovered through experimentation with ingredients. 

Each ingredient has descriptive text that hints towards its potential use. These descriptions, along with additional hints from characters in the game, can lead Luna to craft undiscovered recipes. 

Luckily, Luna also learns from her failures. So, while an unsuccessful experiment may ruin her ingredients, it also provides her insight that will lead to the discovery of new recipes as her skills grow.

If she’s just refilling her potion satchel, Luna can use her trusty recipe book, where she records all of her previous concoctions. 

Luna must manage her potion supplies by avoiding unwanted trouble and exploring to find ingredients for recipes, or go out and hunt exotic monsters to gather rare ingredients for experimentation! 

Enchanted creatures, large and small, dwell in the forests, caves and mountains around Old Haven. Some are harmless or even benevolent. Others are licking their chops at the prospect of having a lovely young witch for supper.

Each creature in the Deep Dark Forest has its own strengths and weaknesses. While your potions of flame may burn spiders to ash, they’ll have little impact on the lava-loving salamander. Think of each creature you encounter as a tiny puzzle, with abilities, vulnerabilities, and behaviors you can exploit to your strategic advantage (and monetary gain).

Although many monsters hold the ingredients you need to brew more powerful potions, most will be reluctant to part with them. Some may be persuaded by force, others by charm, still others by guile. It’s up to you to brave the wilderness while using tricks, cunning, and an arsenal of arcane connections to win the components you’ll need to become a potions master.

A good witch chooses her battles wisely! Remember, not every creature needs to be defeated, and picking the wrong fight may be the difference between being the cook and being the meal.

"Go stir crazy!"

Not only will your wits and potions help you with the monsters you encounter on your adventures, they will also be key to solving the countless puzzles strewn across the lands. Some obstacles will need a special potion to pass, while others will require creative problem solving to unlock their secrets! 

Hidden items are scattered all over this mystical land, so don’t be surprised if any rock or thicket conceals a hidden artifact or ancient potion recipe forgotten over the ages. Even your talks with characters can unveil important pearls of wisdom. 

Luna lives in a world inspired by fairy tales and folklore from around the globe, from African folklore to Western nursery rhymes. Luna's wit and intellect help her overcome challenges posed by these enchanted lands. However, in her quest to become a Potions Master, she also learns important coming-of-age lessons in the tongue-in-cheek story line. Respect is earned, advice can be deceiving, and adults aren't always right. 

Luna never quite fit in with her peers as she was always off exploring and experimenting. When one of her experiments explodes spectacularly, Luna learns that she has an aptitude for brewing magical potions. Unable to train Luna herself and desiring to keep the young girl out of further trouble, Luna’s mother sends her to live with her grandmother to learn potion crafting. 

Granny lives in a small village to the north on the edge of the Deep Dark Forest. Her little town, Old Haven, is the last stop for adventurers on their way to find fame, fortune, and glory in the enchanted lands beyond. A respected Potions Master, Granny has more than enough business selling potions and remedies to the townsfolk and travelers. However, with her advanced age, she is happy to take on an apprentice who can venture into the enchanted forests, mountains, deltas, and grasslands on her behalf. 

Whether it’s helping Mary Muffet with a spider problem or assisting the monk, Tripitaka, and his unlikely crew of disciples on their pilgrimage, Luna finds a way to lend a hand with her cunning wit and, of course, her potions. 

Full Release 

The full release will be available for Windows, Mac, and Linux via direct download (DRM-free) and Steam.

Alpha/Beta Access 

Access to the alpha and beta will be granted on Steam for Windows initially, with Mac to follow. We intend to also do a beta release for Linux, but cannot guarantee it at this time. 

Other Platforms 

We are in talks with various platform holders to release Potions: A Curious Tale on their platforms. We are very interested in releasing on consoles.

Renee Gittins

Matthew Endsley 

 Wesley Eldridge 

Joshua Du Chene 

 Jake Neal 

David Dunne 

 Carol Gittins

The Game 

A digital downloadable copy of Potions: A Curious Tale (PC, Mac, Linux) when the completed game releases on Steam! Retail price is expected to be $20.

Beta Access 

Play the game before it is released into the wild! Access new features and content the moment they go online. Beta is planned for PC, Mac and Linux.

Development Forums and Polls 

Ensure your voice is heard and direct the game’s development with your feedback and opinions! Vote to choose which lore and monsters are included in the game by participating in polls! 

Digital Map 

A high resolution digital copy of a map showing the lands featured in Potions: A Curious Tale. 

Diploma 

Show off your rank as a supporter of Potions: A Curious Tale with a gorgeous diploma featuring your name or a name of your choice. 

Wallpapers 

A digital pack of exclusive backers only Potions: A Curious Tale themed wallpapers with stunning art for your computer and phone! 

Credit 

To thank you for your support, your name will appear in the final credits of the game in recognition of your pledge level. Each backer from Journeyman up will be recognized in their specific reward tier. 

Art Book 

Enjoy an art book of the concept art and beautiful finished illustrations from Potions: A Curious Tale. The physical version is bound in a handsome hardcover. 

Original Soundtrack 

Listen to high quality, lossless tracks from Potions: A Curious Tale’s original soundtrack! Physical copy is screen printed and comes in a jewel case with art insert.

Collectible Postcard 

We love the art from Potions: A Curious Tale and we are sure that you will, too! Send a gorgeous postcard featuring some of our wonderful art to your friends and share the love! 

Potions T-Shirt 

Show your support for Potions: A Curious Tale with this t-shirt! Men and women’s cut t-shirts will be available.

Alpha Access 

Play the game before anyone else! Be the first to try out new features, play through the stories, and give your feedback to the Potions development team. Alpha may only be available for PC.

Signed Poster 

A beautiful full-sized poster of Potions: A Curious Tale artwork, signed by the developers! 

We aren’t just making a game for ourselves to play, we want you to play it and love it, too! If you think Potions: A Curious Tale sounds like a fun game, you can help us bring it to life: 

  • Provide feedback via comments
  • Follow us on Twitter and Facebook (you can even follow Renee!)
  • Add Potions: A Curious Tale to your Steam wishlist
  • Tell your friends!

Fun!"Combat is fast-paced, non-linear, and highly customizable. Set your own play style with the potions you use and the way you choose to face threats. Go full-throttle with an arsenal of deadly potions that burn enemies to ashes, or drop a confetti bomb and escape before they can blink. Potions’ effects can work together, allowing for powerful combinations of different attacks. They can also trigger helpful and deadly reactions in the environment. Timing is key, any pause taken in battle to throw one of your potions leaves you vulnerable as your enemies barrel down upon you. You’ll have to time attacks just right to take down tougher enemies. All potions are friendly-fire, so be careful where you point that incendiary vial! Some creatures will even need to be coaxed by other methods to share their goods. You must think carefully about which monsters to engage with and which to avoid or trick. Sometimes, using your enemies against each other is the most efficient solution. Get too carried away fighting and you’ll use up your precious potions and have to re-arm before your next adventure. "Every problem... has a solution."On Luna’s path to master potion brewing, she must gather rare ingredients to craft new potions. While her grandmother will teach her some potion recipes, most recipes must be discovered through experimentation with ingredients. Each ingredient has descriptive text that hints towards its potential use. These descriptions, along with additional hints from characters in the game, can lead Luna to craft undiscovered recipes. Luckily, Luna also learns from her failures. So, while an unsuccessful experiment may ruin her ingredients, it also provides her insight that will lead to the discovery of new recipes as her skills grow.If she’s just refilling her potion satchel, Luna can use her trusty recipe book, where she records all of her previous concoctions. Luna must manage her potion supplies by avoiding unwanted trouble and exploring to find ingredients for recipes, or go out and hunt exotic monsters to gather rare ingredients for experimentation! Enchanted creatures, large and small, dwell in the forests, caves and mountains around Old Haven. Some are harmless or even benevolent. Others are licking their chops at the prospect of having a lovely young witch for supper.Each creature in the Deep Dark Forest has its own strengths and weaknesses. While your potions of flame may burn spiders to ash, they’ll have little impact on the lava-loving salamander. Think of each creature you encounter as a tiny puzzle, with abilities, vulnerabilities, and behaviors you can exploit to your strategic advantage (and monetary gain).Although many monsters hold the ingredients you need to brew more powerful potions, most will be reluctant to part with them. Some may be persuaded by force, others by charm, still others by guile. It’s up to you to brave the wilderness while using tricks, cunning, and an arsenal of arcane connections to win the components you’ll need to become a potions master.A good witch chooses her battles wisely! Remember, not every creature needs to be defeated, and picking the wrong fight may be the difference between being the cook and being the meal."Go stir crazy!"Not only will your wits and potions help you with the monsters you encounter on your adventures, they will also be key to solving the countless puzzles strewn across the lands. Some obstacles will need a special potion to pass, while others will require creative problem solving to unlock their secrets! Hidden items are scattered all over this mystical land, so don’t be surprised if any rock or thicket conceals a hidden artifact or ancient potion recipe forgotten over the ages. Even your talks with characters can unveil important pearls of wisdom. Luna lives in a world inspired by fairy tales and folklore from around the globe, from African folklore to Western nursery rhymes. Luna's wit and intellect help her overcome challenges posed by these enchanted lands. However, in her quest to become a Potions Master, she also learns important coming-of-age lessons in the tongue-in-cheek story line. Respect is earned, advice can be deceiving, and adults aren't always right. Luna never quite fit in with her peers as she was always off exploring and experimenting. When one of her experiments explodes spectacularly, Luna learns that she has an aptitude for brewing magical potions. Unable to train Luna herself and desiring to keep the young girl out of further trouble, Luna’s mother sends her to live with her grandmother to learn potion crafting. Granny lives in a small village to the north on the edge of the Deep Dark Forest. Her little town, Old Haven, is the last stop for adventurers on their way to find fame, fortune, and glory in the enchanted lands beyond. A respected Potions Master, Granny has more than enough business selling potions and remedies to the townsfolk and travelers. However, with her advanced age, she is happy to take on an apprentice who can venture into the enchanted forests, mountains, deltas, and grasslands on her behalf. Whether it’s helping Mary Muffet with a spider problem or assisting the monk, Tripitaka, and his unlikely crew of disciples on their pilgrimage, Luna finds a way to lend a hand with her cunning wit and, of course, her potions. Full Release The full release will be available for Windows, Mac, and Linux via direct download (DRM-free) and Steam.Alpha/Beta Access Access to the alpha and beta will be granted on Steam for Windows initially, with Mac to follow. We intend to also do a beta release for Linux, but cannot guarantee it at this time. Other Platforms We are in talks with various platform holders to release Potions: A Curious Tale on their platforms. We are very interested in releasing on consoles.Renee GittinsMatthew Endsley  Wesley Eldridge Joshua Du Chene  Jake Neal David Dunne  Carol GittinsThe Game A digital downloadable copy of Potions: A Curious Tale (PC, Mac, Linux) when the completed game releases on Steam! Retail price is expected to be $20.Beta Access Play the game before it is released into the wild! Access new features and content the moment they go online. Beta is planned for PC, Mac and Linux.Development Forums and Polls Ensure your voice is heard and direct the game’s development with your feedback and opinions! Vote to choose which lore and monsters are included in the game by participating in polls! Digital Map A high resolution digital copy of a map showing the lands featured in Potions: A Curious Tale. Diploma Show off your rank as a supporter of Potions: A Curious Tale with a gorgeous diploma featuring your name or a name of your choice. Wallpapers A digital pack of exclusive backers only Potions: A Curious Tale themed wallpapers with stunning art for your computer and phone! Credit To thank you for your support, your name will appear in the final credits of the game in recognition of your pledge level. Each backer from Journeyman up will be recognized in their specific reward tier. Art Book Enjoy an art book of the concept art and beautiful finished illustrations from Potions: A Curious Tale. The physical version is bound in a handsome hardcover. Original Soundtrack Listen to high quality, lossless tracks from Potions: A Curious Tale’s original soundtrack! Physical copy is screen printed and comes in a jewel case with art insert.Collectible Postcard We love the art from Potions: A Curious Tale and we are sure that you will, too! Send a gorgeous postcard featuring some of our wonderful art to your friends and share the love! Potions T-Shirt Show your support for Potions: A Curious Tale with this t-shirt! Men and women’s cut t-shirts will be available.Alpha Access Play the game before anyone else! Be the first to try out new features, play through the stories, and give your feedback to the Potions development team. Alpha may only be available for PC.Signed Poster A beautiful full-sized poster of Potions: A Curious Tale artwork, signed by the developers! We aren’t just making a game for ourselves to play, we want you to play it and love it, too! If you think Potions: A Curious Tale sounds like a fun game, you can help us bring it to life: 
Provide feedback via comments
Follow us on Twitter and Facebook (you can even follow Renee!)
Add Potions: A Curious Tale to your Steam wishlist

Tell your friends!

story:
Click Here to Pre-Order Sentinel










The Modern Day Shotgun on the Mantle

My name is Ryan Hyde I have been building and manufacturing products for 26 years. I grew up in Wyoming and guns are part of my life and my heritage. The Gun Box products we build are the modern day "gun on the mantle" which represents being ready to defend, freedom, independence, responsibility, respect, and pride in our heritage.  Many are convinced that in modern times we should hide and wait for society to protect us.  I strongly believe that we have an individual responsibility, to protect ourselves and provide safety for those we love.  I am proud of these products because we give gun owners the ability to protect and defend responsibly.

Three years ago we asked a question “why have a gun for protection if you can’t get it when you need it? We had guns for protection but they were locked up far from where we needed them, or they were being stored unsafely where children and others could access them. That is why we launched The Gun Box 1.0! The Gun Box 1.0 solved the problem and started the gun storage revolution. With 1.0 handgun owners now had an attractive way to store their guns in plain sight. With guns stored in plain sight and quick access, handgun owners could now realize their intention for owning a gun, that of safety and protection. Handguns no longer need to be stored irresponsibly or hidden in places that are inaccessible in a crisis.

The Gun Box brand is the leader in plain sight, accessible, gun storage. We develop products that look amazing and blend in with home and office décor.  For quick access you can place your gun box in the living room, bedroom, work or home office, anywhere you might need to get to your gun quickly. To achieve the fastest unlocking we use the latest in access technology including biometric/fingerprint, RFID, and Bluetooth. We secure our plain sight storage containers with technology using motion alarms, and other notifications, providing the highest level of security in a plain sight storage container. 

The Gun Box line up is causing a paradigm shift in the gun safe industry. The gun safe industry is focused on HIDING, locking up, and bolting down, your guns in "out of sight/out of mind” places like basements and closets. Traditional gun safes have their place but they are designed to protect what’s on the inside of the safe. The Gun Box line up is different!  Everything we do is to protect what’s on the outside of the box especially children, you, and your family in the event you need your gun immediately for protection and safety. We favor safe storage in plain sight with quick access, which is the main reason you have your gun for protection.

 Since launching The Gun Box 1.0 we have been asked many times:  "Do you have anything to secure my tactical rifle or shot gun?"  We have been working hard and we are very proud to introduce The Gun Box Sentinel. The world’s first plain sight tactical long gun storage with a built in HiFi speaker system! A container that looks this good, delivering premium sound, positioned where you need it, should be enough to convince skeptics that there is a safe tactical way to store your weapon.  

Thanks to all those who have helped support our previous campaigns and we would appreciate your help on The Gun Box Sentinel.

story:
Stitch Digital is a small group of Georgia Tech grads who love video games and creating experiences for players. 

We love fighting games and the community associated with it. We are gamers ourselves and have spent countless hours watching tournament streams on Twitch and battle archives on YouTube. Naturally, it was time to help the community we know and love grow.

We thank you for taking the time to visit our page and thank you even more for contributing to our campaign. We hope to help the FGC take the next step to becoming a bigger and better community. 



Fightro is a mobile app built for players, by players. With Fightro, players will have a central hub to interact with other players in the FGC. Players can track battles, watch live streams, follow players, and much more!

In order to bring Fightro to life, we're looking to raise $7,500 to support our development and marketing costs. With the $7,500 we will be able to pay for development licenses, server space for the app and web dashboard, licensing fees for the Apple and Android store, and miscellaneous marketing costs.


        



We have a slew of great perks for contributors listed out to the right. We couldn't do this without you, so we will send a great thank you from the team based on the amount you contribute to the project. Learn more about perks by viewing the list to the right.


  1. Spread the word on social media with a follow or tweet to @fightroapp and a "Like" at http://facebook.com/fightroapp.

  2. Support Fightro Here on IndieGoGo! We need your support to bring Fightro to life! Help fund Fightro right here on IndieGoGo! We appreciate all of our supporters!
