story:
Take a Table-Top Trip to Michigan's Historic Heart of the Great Lakes!

NOTE: Due to recent publicity, or campaign has been extended until June 27, 2014.

If you're like us, you love to visit Mackinac Island, but you can only visit occasionally. We created Mackinac Island Treasure Hunt Card and Board Games (MITH) as a fun way to re-create the best things about a trip to the Island: Discovering new things, exploring the woods and historic places, and good times with friends and family.

In a world where everything is moving fast and technology mediates most human interaction, we think that a board game can give you good times with those you love (or, at least those you get along with reasonably well), just like a trip to Mackinac Island.

A Game to Grow Into

The five different games that come with MITH let you choose the experience you want based on the available players (2 to 8 people can play), the amount of time you have, or how much you want to think. While some of the games share common rules and themes (for example, each game features some sort of nature observation), each is a completely separate game. We designed the games to be challenging and fun and infinitely replayable. You can learn about the Island as you play, though they are not trivia games.

We appreciate euro-game sensibilities, so these are games that require strategic thinking. Each turn you'll have several paths to take that may affect how the game progresses for you later.

  • Match Me if You Can is an Authors Cards-style set collection card game that can be fun for mixed age groups.
  • The Nature Hike is a roll-and-move game of nature observation. Each turn you have to find the path that will allow you to see the most plants, animals, and natural features (and score the most points).
  • The Scavenger Hunt is a cooperative game that has players planning together to find a set of hidden treasures before Winter arrives.
  • The Hide and Seek game tests your memory as each turn reveals the hiding place of a historical treasure on the Island for you to collect...if you can remember where it is.
  • The Treasure Hunt has you playing the sleuth, asking questions of the other players in order to discover the treasures they have hidden around the Island.

Inside the box is a game board, 126 playing cards, 24 hiding place cards, 8 pawns, 8 scoring markers, one season marker, 3 turn summary cards, one scoring track card, and a 24-page rule book and field guide.

You Enable Michigan Made!

MITH is completely designed and tested. See some of the play tester's comments here. The examples you see on this page were printed by a print-on-demand board game manufacturer which, while beautiful, come at a high price and from outside of Michigan. In order to get the cost to a reasonable level, we have to have MITH printed by a large volume game manufacturer. Luckily, one of the premiere game manufacturers in the World is located in Battle Creek, Michigan! We have chosen Delano Service to manufacture our game. To get to our price sweet spot we need to make about 2500 games. We're willing to fund some of this ourselves, but you can make MITH a reality by donating whatever you can. Please check out our great perks to guide your decision.

Your donation will also allow us to sell MITH in stores and online, a portion of the proceeds from which will go to help Mackinac State Historic Parks preserve this wonderful place for coming generations.

With a Michigan-based design team, a Michigan-based manufacturer, a Michigan-based fulfillment company, and your help, MITH will be a mostly Michigan-made product*.

*The pawns and markers will be made in the USA.


Design Team

MITH was designed by Jim Muratzki, who has been playing and designing board games for as long as he can remember. The game includes over 90 photographs by Barbara Overdier, who has a knack for showing you things in a new way. The primary artwork was done by Glenn Wolff, a Traverse City-based artist and teacher whose work has appeared in books by Janine Benyus and Jerry Dennis and in the New York Times, among many others. Ralph Hashoian, artist, teacher, and cartoonist, provided the historical treasure illustrations.

All of the content was reviewed by the staff of Mackinac State Historic Parks and Patricia Martin, Island resident and naturalist (though any errors still belong to us!).

Your Turn

Without your support, MITH won't happen. We're offering lots of great perks to make it easy for you to be a part of this great new way to experience the past and present Mackinac Island. Please participate at whatever level works for you, and we'll thank you.

Let other Mackinac Island fans you know about MITH and think how good our gratitude will make you feel about yourself!

See you on the Island! 
Supporters at The Beach Comber perk level will receive a set of Great Lakes pebbles and beach glass to bring the Mackinac Island karma to your game session when used as pawns and markers! Supporters at The Turtle Islander perk level will receive 8 Forest Confections Turtles, freshly handcrafted with sustainable ingredients (including Shetler Diary cream!), to make your first game session even more enjoyable!

story:
Che cos'è lo yoga? Perché un'applicazione?

Lo yoga è una disciplina millenaria che ha lo scopo di unire il corpo e la mente. Se i due riescono a lavorare insieme, concentrati sullo stesso obiettivo, noi troviamo l'equilibrio.

Ma come? Non era quella roba da contorsionisti?

Eh, no. Cioè... se volete potete imparare posizioni mirabolanti, ma quello non è il fine. Se tutti conoscessimo lo yoga, sapremmo come gestire i piccoli grandi acciacchi di ogni giorno e come ritrovare la calma nei momenti difficili. Il mio scopo è di far conoscere il più possibile questa disciplina.

Basta un'applicazione per imparare lo yoga?

Certo che no. Non basta una vita per imparare lo yoga. Ma ogni grande viaggio inizia con un piccolo passo, e 10minYoga vorrebbe essere il vostro primo passo nel mondo dello yoga.

10minYoga: lo yoga alla portata di tutti!

10minYoga è nata per soddisfare le richieste dei miei lettori, che desideravano avvicinarsi a questa disciplina ma non ne avevano il tempo o la possibilità.

Per loro ho studiato una serie di sequenze gratuite, della durata variabile (da 1 a 10 minuti). Prossimamente verranno aggiunte anche alcune sequenze a pagamento, per chi desidera approfondire l'argomento.

L'applicazione prevede anche due sequenze GRATUITE pensate apposta per i bambini.

10minYoga è al momento disponibile esclusivamente per iOS. Con questa campagna di crowdfunding desidero raccogliere i fondi necessari per poter realizzare 10minYoga per Android.

10minYoga sostiene l'AGPD (Associazione Genitori e Persone con Sindrome di Down). Se la campagna dovesse andare a buon fine e l'app fosse rilasciata, parte degli (eventuali) proventi derivanti dalla vendita degli esercizi a pagamento sarà devoluta all'AGPD.

Se, per mancanza di fondi*, non fosse possibile realizzare l'applicazione, la somma raccolta verrà donata interamente all' AGPD.

Cosa potete fare?

Volete aiutarmi a realizzare 10minYoga per Android e, contemporaneamente, a sostenere l'AGPD?

Contribuite con una donazione.

Non potete fare una donazione? 

  • Aiutateci con il passaparola!
  • Lavorate per un' azienda la cui filosofia si sposa con quella di 10minYoga? Proponetele di sponsorizzare la versione Android!
  • Avete un iPhone, e 10minYoga vi è piaciuta? Spargete la voce! Parlatene in giro, recensitela, consigliatela ai vostri amici. Condividete questa campagna ed aiutateci a far conoscere questa disciplina a più persone possibile.

*Oltre al crowdfunding, siamo alla ricerca di uno sponsor che possa, eventualmente, coprire parte della spesa.

Se tutti conoscessimo lo yoga, sapremmo come gestire i piccoli grandi acciacchi di ogni giorno e come ritrovare la calma nei momenti difficili. Il mio scopo è di far conoscere il più possibile questa disciplina.Basta un'applicazione per imparare lo yoga?Certo che no. Non basta una vita per imparare lo yoga. Ma ogni grande viaggio inizia con un piccolo passo, e 10minYoga vorrebbe essere il vostro primo passo nel mondo dello yoga.10minYoga: lo yoga alla portata di tutti!10minYoga è nata per soddisfare le richieste dei miei lettori, che desideravano avvicinarsi a questa disciplina ma non ne avevano il tempo o la possibilità.Per loro ho studiato una serie di sequenze gratuite, della durata variabile (da 1 a 10 minuti). Prossimamente verranno aggiunte anche alcune sequenze a pagamento, per chi desidera approfondire l'argomento.L'applicazione prevede anche due sequenze GRATUITE pensate apposta per i bambini.10minYoga è al momento disponibile esclusivamente per iOS. Con questa campagna di crowdfunding desidero raccogliere i fondi necessari per poter realizzare 10minYoga per Android.10minYoga sostiene l'AGPD (Associazione Genitori e Persone con Sindrome di Down). Se la campagna dovesse andare a buon fine e l'app fosse rilasciata, parte degli (eventuali) proventi derivanti dalla vendita degli esercizi a pagamento sarà devoluta all'AGPD.Se, per mancanza di fondi*, non fosse possibile realizzare l'applicazione, la somma raccolta verrà donata interamente all' AGPD.Cosa potete fare?Volete aiutarmi a realizzare 10minYoga per Android e, contemporaneamente, a sostenere l'AGPD?Contribuite con una donazione.Non potete fare una donazione? 

Aiutateci con il passaparola!


Lavorate per un' azienda la cui filosofia si sposa con quella di 10minYoga? Proponetele di sponsorizzare la versione Android!

Avete un iPhone, e 10minYoga vi è piaciuta? Spargete la voce! Parlatene in giro, recensitela, consigliatela ai vostri amici. Condividete questa campagna ed aiutateci a far conoscere questa disciplina a più persone possibile.
*Oltre al crowdfunding, siamo alla ricerca di uno sponsor che possa, eventualmente, coprire parte della spesa.

story:
Land of Minecraft is running a fundraiser on IndieGoGo!  In addition to the monthly supporter membership packages, in-game item packages, and claim block packages we are offering the following as part of this fundraiser promotion:
  • $10 - Three month membership package
  • $25 - Land of Minecraft iOS app (Due in a few months!)
  • $30 - BrazenGaming YouTube channel appearance
  • $50 - Land of Minecraft RPG Server Beta access
  • $100 - Skype date with Lyndon, the mastermind behind Land of Minecraft
  • $100 - Lifetime membership to all Land of Minecraft gaming servers
 
That's a lot of different options, and I'll walk you through each one.  The three month package is an incredible 66% discount off the usual price.  We have never offered lifetime membership packages before, and this may be your only opportunity to grab one.  Lifetime membership, at $100, is an absolute bargain!  I still can't believe we are offering it at such a low price.
 
We are currently shooting videos for the new BrazenGaming YouTube channel.  We are going to be covering a wide range of topics ranging from RPG gaming to classics like Portal 2 and, of course, Minecraft.  The $30 package here gives you the opportunity to star in one episode and you get to pick which game!   Have an epic Minecraft build you want to show the world?  Always wanted to tackle a complicated Portal 2 co-op puzzle?  Think you have the chops to take one of us down in an epic battle?  This is your chance to capture it all for the world to see!
 
We are also currently building an entire new Minecraft server revolved around the RPG theme.  The $50 package gets you early access to the server, this fall, before anyone else gets to play.  You will be able to watch as we build the new arenas, towns, expansive road system, warps, games, markets, and tons of other classic RPG gaming features!  This new RPG server will have multiple chat channels and even support server-to-server chat to players in the survival server.  The mcMMO plugin and economies will also be linked between the servers!  You can build up your stats in survival and then come test your strength in one of the three PVP arenas.  Progress up through the tiers and compete at the highest level against players that know how to battle!
 
Currently, Land of Minecraft needs around $150 per month just to keep the lights on.  With the new expansions we have planned, we expect that number to quickly rise as we scale up the in-development servers for full production game play.  Land of Minecraft current expenses include:
 
  • Minecraft server hosting - 4 servers
  • Minecraft server security monitoring and log management
  • Enjin website hosting & server shop
  • PayPal payment processing
  • Dreamhost website hosting
  • iOS app development and developer licensing
 
The time has come to take Land of Minecraft to the next level!  We are committed to giving our players a soon to be legendary RPG, survival, and FTB Minecraft experience.  We are relying on our players to help us fund this expansion and keep the doors open.  If the indiegogo fundraiser does not raise the necessary funds, we will definitely have to re-evaluate our plans for going forward, which will likely include the following cost reduction options:
 
  • Shutting down one or more of the Minecraft servers
  • Going membership only
  • Complete shutdown of all services
 
Don't let Land of Minecraft fade away just as we gain momentum!  Take advantage of the great deals we are offering and help take Land of Minecraft to the next level.

story:
It's a Sid Meier's Pirates-style game (sail around with a ship, shoot at pirates!) that has the basics for a tycoon-style game (buy ships, assign trade routes).  it will likely be a different scene with a Pirates-style controllable ship. The scenery of game sets in the Bermudas Isles. Build forts and buildings, and send your ships to lay siege to the enemy!

The Scene of Somers Isles

In each Scene Level there will be at least eight types of ships, each with their own unique capabilities and strengths. 

  •  Two game modes: Strategy mode (tycoon) and Exploration mode (pirates).

  • Added a new game mode (Exploration) -- just sail around with a ship. - Added wave trails behind the ship in exploration mode. It's possible to place towns at runtime and then have the traders explore to find them and establish towns nearby.

  • Flexible combat system (attach any number of cannons on your ship, each with customized amount of damage, reload time, accuracy, etc).

  • Easily tweakable damage system (hull HP, sail HP, damage reduction, etc).

  • Visible damage via ship's sails.

  • Ship customization via built-in fake decal system using secondary texture coordinates.

  • Fully working trade route logic — establish, assign goods and ships… profit!

  • Weather Effects

  • Add new Ships, Props...

We have the intention of integrating cross platform (between iOS, Android, Mac, PC, Linux and OUYA) multi-player into the entire game. With all this in mind we have a very finite amount of resources to apply to the task at hand, but we feel that the end result will push the boundaries of the genre a little further and hopefully produce an amazing game.

We are a independent game development studio from Taiwan. I have been working on a Island Siege - Battle Pirates Game for about 2.5 months, finished with most of the basic gameplay features. Spent tons of time optimizing the server and designing new GUI. Any questions and not too rude comments are welcome! We will be grateful for all your suggestions and opinions.

VINCENT ( Project Lead and Programming )

Welcome to my technique blog -> http://blog.ceiba3d.com

This is my own project management Site -> http://ceiba3d.com

ID: xxx66601@name.com

PASS: uve88

We absolutely need your help because we don't have a lot of money to support the making of the game, and this is the only chance that we have to make our dream possible.

Your generous pledges will go towards:

* Paying Artists and Sound Designer: We will need money to pay our wonderful team for their hard work.

* Promotion & Marketing: We will need to commission awesome final box art, promotional graphics, video trailers, etc.

story:
About

Galactical Maiden Ciel is a dungeon-based RPG with dating sim and strategy elements. Unlike other RPGs, Galactical Maiden Ciel features a rogue/thief-oriented dungeon which means that abilities such as stealth, detecting traps, opening locks, deciphering ancient runes, and diplomacy will play an important role in the game.

Story

In a desolate desert in the Middle East, a group of scientists uncover an ancient ruin of an alien civilization known as the Dogma Empire. As they enter the ruin, they find its inhabitants in suspended animation. It does not take long until they begin to awake from their slumber and unleash their terrible power on the unfortunate scientists and soon ... the world.

Characters

Umenomiya Kana is one of the scientists captured by the Dogma Empire. She becomes the subject of an experiment to create a powerful Dogma warrior and had a Ciel System installed within her body. Alice manages to save her just before Dogma scientists initiate the brainwashing procedure. Together, they make their escape from the ruin. However, this leaves the installation of her Ciel System uncompleted and untested.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Umenomiya Alice is an intelligent battle android created by Kana's late father. She was captured along with Kana but managed to free herself with the help of a mysterious person. She proceeds to free her mistress and they escape the ruin together. After this event, she gradually begins to act and think like a human, which changes her relationship with Kana.

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kagura Himiko  is a fierce Empress of Yamatai. Thousands of years ago, she commanded 4 starbeasts to defeat and seal Emperor Goram of Dogma Empire and his minions in the ancient ruin. According to legend, she put a spell on herself which make her fall into an eternal sleep as long as Goram’s seal is intact. However, Goram's recent awakening has not broken the spell as intended and the world continues to fall into despair.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Christina Bellmionne was one of the archeologists who worked along Kana’s father in early research of Starbeasts and the Dogma Empire. She went missing after the incident that claimed the lives of her colleagues.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Basic Features

1. Dungeon Exploration

  • Experience a rogue oriented dungeon with traps, locks, ambushes, and magical seals instead of the usual bash-everything-in-sights!
  • Room-based dungeons similar to those in Riviera - The Promised Lands.

2. Semi Real-time Turn Based Battle

  • Higher agility will bring your turn faster.
  • Beautifully animated sprites.
  • As the battle progresses, Ciel Overdrive gauge will be filled, unlocking a powerful Overdrive Attack. This attack depletes Kana's HP, so use it wisely.

3. Starbeasts and Area Management System

  • Starbeast are 4 giant guardians based on Chinese constellations who destroyed Dogma Empire in the past.
  • Genbu - Black Tortoise will serve as Kana's mothership.
  • Command Genbu and defend the cities from Dogma Empire's attacks.
  • Choosing which area to attack/defend can be decisive to humanity's survival

4. Schedule Management System

  • 3 scheduled activities to choose from: Gymnastics, Meditation, and Research.
  • Gymnastic will give physical points which can be used to raise physical stats and skills. These will be useful mostly during battle (improving physical damage, chance to dodge, etc.) and dungeon exploration (avoiding traps, etc.).
  • Meditation will give mental points which can be used to raise mental stats and skills. These will be useful mostly during battle (magical skills, etc) and conversation (noticing lies, persuading people).
  • Research will give research points which can be used to improve Kana's Ciel form's abilities and weaponry.

5. Yuri Dating Sim

  • 2 girls to date ( Alice and Himiko ). Yes, this is a yuri game ^^;

6. Version

  • For now it's PC only, but if we reach our Stretch Goal at $12500 then a Mac and Linux version MIGHT be available. I have no experience with Mac and Linux, so I can't promise anything.

7. Voice Acting

  • Voice acting will be available during battles.

 Stretch Goal - 10500

This stretch goal reflects my ideal view of the game. Please help me to make it real!

1. Characters

  • Alice will be available as party member
  • Research points can be used to upgrade Alice's stats and skills

2. Dungeon

  • more dungeons
  • more bosses
  • more stories

3. Starbeast

  • Seiryuu - Azure Dragon will be available as summon beast

4. Dating Sim

  • 1 more dateable character (a butch!!!)

5. Others

  • More high quality backgrounds and soundtracks!

Screenshots & Artworks

 

 

Why Erobotan needs your help?

So far it's only me working on the sprites, GUIs, and game codes. The funding will be used to commission artists for high quality music, story, background artworks for dialog scenes, sound effects and stuff. I'll finish this game no matter what, but your contribution is needed to give Galactical Maiden Ciel a profesional and polished look that it deserves.

And for all yuri fans out there, the success of this campaign will make sure that more yuri games will come out from my humble workplace!

Please help me spreads the words ^o^ !

Game Rating

I think the game will be rated as teen since it has violence, suggestive themes (no sex scenes though) and stuff. However, there is a chance that it will be rated as Mature because it features lesbian theme according to wikipedia.

Perks

  • Wallpapers and Poster will be sent around 1 month after the campaign ends.
  • T-Shirt and Posters will be shipped separately to reduce damage risk to the posters.
  • Shipping Fee is already included

Links

Erobotan's Diary, my doujin development blog

Erobotan's Twitter, my twitter

story:
Short Summary

We are currently developing a Publishing App along with Online Templates Marketplace.

Easy Flyer Creator will be most advanced and easy to use and cheapest publishing app for Windows platform which will allow designers to make and publish flyers, brochures, certificates, posters, signs, invitation and event flyer templates on the templates marketplace, and on the other side, small businesses , individuals and organizations will be able to use the Easy Flyer Creator app to design flyers for their work and they will also be able to purchase and download additional templates from marketplace, which other users have published up there.

Easy Flyer Creator 4.0 App (with more then 100 built-in templates) will be launched in the first quarter of 2013 while online templates marketplace will go live in second quarter with at least 250 downloadable business templates by mid of 2013, allowing existing app users to upload, publish and sell their templates for other users. This marketplace will allow designers to sell templates in any of the formats, Easy Flyer Creator FLY, Adobe Photoshop PSD, Adobe PDF, Microsoft Publisher PUB

In the third quarter of 2013 we may be starting up a subscription plans for the Templates Marketplace and Easy Flyer Creator App, so user will be able to pay for the software as a service and use the app and download templates for fix monthly fee

We need funding to launch newer version of Easy Flyer Creator App which will be integrated with online templates marketplace so users will be able to download and upload templates from within the app. then we will also be investing in initial setup of the template marketplace

Our current versions of the app (Easy Flyer Creator 3.0) are already being sold through various retail channels and websites and current user base of the current app is around 250,000 users, which guarantees the success of this project

Existing versions of Easy Flyer Creator and more details can be found on http://www.flyerscreator.com

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need around US$30,000 to spend for the development and launch of Templates Marketplace portal which would include hire designers to design templates for the site, Purchasing of Stock images to be used in Templates, Hiring Website Developers to Develop and maintain the website

TemplatesMarketplace.net is going to be unique templates store which will allow small businesses and home users to purchase and download templates in any format (Adobe Photoshop, Easy Flyer Creator FLY or PDF, or Microsoft Publisher)and for less cost then any other templates sites

If we fail to generate enough funds to complete the projects , even then we will continue working on the project, but the launch date might be delayed for the MarketPlace portal, While Easy Flyer Creator App would still be launched within first Quarter of 2013

The Impact

  • TemplatesMarketplace.net would be a global marketplace for designers, small businesses, home businesses and home users, institutes so they can design, share, sell their creativity, while the for other users will be able to buy and download templates for cheaper cost and in any format as PDF, FLY, PSD, PUB etc
  • We have over 250,000 user base for current version of Easy Flyer Creator 3.0, and most of them are active users, so their is not point or doubt that this product could fail see details on www.flyerscreator.com

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • If any of you are designers or app testers then you might help by signing up at http://bit.ly/BetaTestApps 
  • Please spread the wortd by using the Indiegogo share tools! or share info about the product on your social media

If any of you are designers or app testers then you might help by signing up at http://bit.ly/BetaTestApps 
Please spread the wortd by using the Indiegogo share tools! or share info about the product on your social media

story:
The demo is out!

You can try our demo by downloading it here : http://www.indiedb.com/games/tavern-of-heroes/downloads 

Tavern Of Heroes, a rpg where you control the whole party!

Tavern Of Heroes is a game coming to Windows, OSX & GNU/Linux made by Optim GameStudio. In this twist of the rpg genre, the player controls a complete party of heroes during their adventures. The goal of the game is to continually challenge the player through overwhelming numbers of enemies paired with the challenge of controlling multiple heroes.

The game is built in a way that content is generated dynamically and scales with the player's team. This ensures that it is possible to play with every character and experience their unique storyline while always being challenged by the game's difficulty.

This is our first major game and an attempt by us to enter the world of indie game development.

Tavern Of Heroes follows the story of a small tavern located in a kingdom ruled by might and magic. Many heroes from the surrounding regions enjoy the fine ales and the great atmosphere of the tavern. The fate of those heroes will be intertwined depending on your decisions. As these heroes form parties to further their goal, more of them will show up in the tavern. Here's a list of the features of the game:

  • Unique combat system: Interesting twist to the classic point-n-click RPG gameplay which proves to be both challenging and rewarding.

  • Pair heroes together in unique team setup: The player decides his ideal team setup. Multiple teams can be built to overcome different obstacles and the game encourages that. Use different elements and types of skills to your advantage.

  • Time-based skills: The player needs to manage the different skills if he wants to survive the onslaught of monsters. The game focuses on management of their timers rather than mashing them.

  • Explore the storyline of each hero: By completing the quests associated with each hero, you will obtain many rewards. Most importantly, you will be able to unlock it in your regular team setup and further improve its skills.

  • Evolve heroes the way you want: Each hero possesses it's own skill tree with different paths you can choose. These paths will influence the way the hero helps the team. There is no cookie-cutter path, rather ways to make heroes more useful in certain team setups.

  • Gear up your heroes: Dynamic item generation paired with epic items that are awarded through heroes' storyline progress offer many ways to improve your team.

  • Dynamic level generation: Each hero has different locations assigned to it. The quests are dynamically generated depending on several factors and scale with the team power.

  • No DRM, cross-platform: Since the game uses C++ and opengl, it is available for all the major platforms. We also want to offer the game as a single executable and bundled with game services such as desura and steam if possible in the future.

The game itself is still in its early alpha days. We wanted to create some scaffold before making an indiegogo to test the general feeling of the game. Many things need to be added to make it a full game. These features include :

  • More heroes, items and locations: Most of the time intensive work now is adding content to the game. We have a working base which only needs to be polished and the system is made so that adding content is easy.

  • Epic boss battles: We want to add a boss battle system that will involves skillful playing. Rather than only attacking, these boss battles would feature more complex gameplay to survive.

  • Develop a rich story: We want to make a rich and complex story that revolves around conspiracy, politic, power and hate. We want to add themes that are not generally tackled in popular video games.

  • A multiplayer?: That's right, we want to add pvp and possibly large scale pve or network-enabled events with leaderboard. Adding these features would require a lot of time and would probably depend of how well the game is received.

  • And of course, polish, polish, polish: The game needs a lot of polishing to become perfect. We try to listen to the feedback of people as much as possible on suggested changes and feature requests.

Optim GameStudio consists of 3 friends from Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The team includes 2 code monkeys (FrankBro and McBoul) and an artist (Dawnfury). The project started when I, FrankBro, a fresh electric engineering graduate, figured I'd rather make video games than do anything else. Before officially entering the job market, I figured I would give one last try at game development.

Since making a game is not a simple task, I asked one of my friends for help. McBoul, a soon-to-be automated production engineering graduate. We've known each others for a while and we were doing freelance application development for businesses so we're used to working together.

We also needed art for video games. Dawnfury is currently studying graphic design and we've known each other since kindergarden. It has been our dream since childhood to create video games and we're really excited with the prospect of doing that professionally.

Additionally, we've got a great artist that agreed to join us and do the music for our game! His name is KwazeKwaze and you can listen his music on http://soundcloud.com/kwazekwaze

We've been doing this for the past months in a part-time manner. We all have bills to pay and we've only been able to invest about ~20 hours each per week on the project. The reason we're asking for your contribution is to make this project our priority. If we reach the goal, we will drop our part-time jobs and focus our minds on Tavern Of Heroes as our full-time job. That will make it possible to release the game faster to everyone. Also, the artist needs a proper chair.

Our website can be found at http://optim-gamestudio.posterous.com/

It is our development blog and we try to update it as much as possible.

You can also follow us on twitter (https://twitter.com/#!/OptimGameStudio) or facebook (http://www.facebook.com/optimgamestudio). Our posts are automatically set thanks to autopost.

Also, thanks to everyone who shows interest in the game. We love hearing back from our fans, get their feedback or just chat with them.

We also needed art for video games. Dawnfury is currently studying graphic design and we've known each other since kindergarden. It has been our dream since childhood to create video games and we're really excited with the prospect of doing that professionally.
Additionally, we've got a great artist that agreed to join us and do the music for our game! His name is KwazeKwaze and you can listen his music on http://soundcloud.com/kwazekwaze

We've been doing this for the past months in a part-time manner. We all have bills to pay and we've only been able to invest about ~20 hours each per week on the project. The reason we're asking for your contribution is to make this project our priority. If we reach the goal, we will drop our part-time jobs and focus our minds on Tavern Of Heroes as our full-time job. That will make it possible to release the game faster to everyone. Also, the artist needs a proper chair.

Our website can be found at http://optim-gamestudio.posterous.com/
It is our development blog and we try to update it as much as possible.
You can also follow us on twitter (https://twitter.com/#!/OptimGameStudio) or facebook (http://www.facebook.com/optimgamestudio). Our posts are automatically set thanks to autopost.
Also, thanks to everyone who shows interest in the game. We love hearing back from our fans, get their feedback or just chat with them.

story:
Hello, my name is Steven Carr of Trilucid Entertainment LLC. In 1989 I was given a Sega Genesis for my 19th birthday. After getting  past the initial excitement of having the console, I started telling myself that I wanted to make games. I had no clue how I was going to do it, when I was going to do it, or even where to find the right course to take to make this all happen. I am 51 now. I have 4 children, I lost my oldest son in July  of 2020. Throughout the last 25 years I worked on my dream little by little. Even though I never took up formal training to get into the industry, I have met great people along the way who inspired me to keep going. In 2003, A partner of mine and I went to game conference in Chicago. We were absolutely new to it. I was surprised that we were even allowed in the conference. "Fight night" was the headline game being discussed. I knew then I was on the right path to creating my own game.  At that time I was taking martial arts too. I felt that what I was learning in martial arts could possibly translate into an interesting game. "Fight night" in the presenters explanation made perfect sense to me. He and his staff took boxing lessons to present a "true to life" interpretation of what a boxing game should feel like and be. In short, I am working on creating a " true to life" version of a fighting game with a few unique twist. 

 In the creation of S.O.U.L. Heroes, We want to give the user the total experience in  designing your fight style/discipline, you can create yourself and earn belt rankings, fight against other players/factions and go through the main characters life journey to becoming a S.O.U.L. Hero. Your contributions will help us achieve all of these milestones/goals.

 

We're asking for 70,000 to complete the game S.O.U.L. Heroes. 40,000 of the proceeds will be directed toward the software engineers, software and animation artist. They will be cleaning up and adding in all necessary components missing the game currently. S.O.U.L. Heroes is currently in the Alpha stage. The raining 30,000 will be used in Brand recognition, marketing, and S.O.U.L. swag.

We accept all levels of donations. We are very grateful for any level of help to get us to our goal.

5.00 dollar donation will get you the game S.O.U.L. Heroes.

15.00 dollar donation gets you the game S.O.U.L. Heroes and a S.O.U.L. Heroes facemask.

50.00 dollar donation will get you the S.O.U.L. Heroes game, t-shirt, coffee mug or water bottle.

100.00 dollar donation will get you the S.O.U.L. Heroes game, acknowledgement on the game credits, S.O.U.L. Heroes hoodie, coffee mug or water bottle.

500.00 dollar donation will get you the S.O.U.L. Heroes "special edition" version of the game along with a "Special thanks" acknowledgement on the game credits, hoodie, coffee mug, A Professor Unknown figurine with back story.

If for some reason we do not reach our target goal, we will accept what we have taken in and continue moving forward.

 

We feel that or imaginative approach to the creation of this project will allow other inspiring game developers of color, gender, or ethic backgrounds to explore and exist outside of the box. Trust your imagination and believe in yourself despite what obstacles presents itself.

For the last 15 years I have had learn how to move mountains in my life. I have had to find alternative means to overcome problems that come up. for instance, I wanted to use motion capture to create more life like animations. The local technical college offered their motion capture studio to me to use. After a few months of waiting for the okay, I was told that the Kinect camera could give me what I was looking for. I spent the next few months teaching myself motion capture. I was able to capture a few different martial arts styles and the utilize in my characters. Problem solved! I don't run from the problem, I meet them head on. I believe I work with a wise group of individuals. Any pitfalls or potential issue, I have extreme confidence in the people I have surrounded myself with.

I understand with these current conditions that it is a struggle to donate money. You can though donate your spirit and good will to further on this project. You can donate the energy of positive word of mouth. Please share the link with those who you know can help, Thank you.

story:
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Title: Leodetable Institute

Developer: Dearsoul Visual

Genre: Fantasy

Rating: R-18

Language: English

Engine: RPG Maker MV, Unity

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

A BL (Boys Love a.k.a. Male and Male romance story) visual novel with RPG attribute to play the world. Side scrolling map.

Summary

In the world of Varr, magic was a major power, lauded yet feared by all. The leaders of the past once forbade the practice of sorcery and death sentence would befall those who dared to use it. The gods, enraged by such deed, decided to destroy their life by releasing a beast known as "Magaran".

The last few wizards managed to calm the gods and return Magaran to where it came from. They made a pact with the leaders of humans and the gods, which was to gather every single person bearing the potential of magic in order to teach them how to control their power, so that they would not rebel against the kings. Leodetable Institute was one of those. The existence of the institute was still appalling to commoners that they had to remain hidden while gathering their students.

Adri, a blind tailor who've lost his memories five years ago, found a strange letter behind his workshop. It detected him as a dangerous latent wizard. By seconds, The Hunters dragged him to a broken door of dimension and put him under custody. He was forced to become Leodetable Institute's student and to learn control his power in minimum four years study without any contact from outsider.

The characters which Adri could follow were four. Saputra was Adri's roommate who talked so much. They quarreled almost every day. The captain of O.S. (Organization of Student), Wood, seemed love to annoy Adri so much to the point Adri wished to never know him. Seal and Rafi were the main character's classmates with abuser-and-his-victim relationship.

As he live under its roof, Adri found out that the minister of this institute was planning to overthrow the kingdom. Seal wanted to counter-act that and invited Adri to be one of his member. At the same time, Di-On, a mysterious kid, told him to get out of there as soon as possible.

Will Adri stay or will he go? [ErdaEnos]

 

Characters

  • Name: Adri
  • Age: Appears 21 years old
  • Height: 170 cm 
  • Latent Magic Rank: 0
  • Personality: Brotherly and strong-willed
  • Strength: Open minded, Mental Sights
  • Weakness: Selfless, Physically Blind, Water
  • Favorite Food: Red Soil and worms.

“The past can hurt you but the way I face it, you can either run from it or learn from it.”

  • Name: Saputra
  • Age: 19 years old
  • Height: 190 cm
  • Latent Magic Rank: 3 (Year 3)
  • Personality: Ambitious
  • Strength: Observant, Bookworm
  • Weakness: Perfectionist
  • Favorite Food: Raw Steak

“Don’t do something permanently stupid, just because you are temporarily upset.”

  • Name: Seal
  • Age: Appears 24 years old
  • Height: 172 cm
  • Latent Magic Rank: 3 (ex-Year 3)
  • Personality: Mischievous
  • Strength: Strong willed, Mysterious
  • Weakness: Infamous, Adri
  • Favorite Food: Anything Spicy

“All you need to know ish that my love ish yours.”

  • Name: Lord Wynter Wood (Wood)
  • Age: 24 years old
  • Height: 183 cm
  • Latent Magic Rank: 2 (Year 6)
  • Personality: Cheerful Tyrant
  • Strength: Power of Lordship, History
  • Weakness: Prideful, Mood Swings
  • Favorite Food: Treacle Tart

“Be happy and feel blessed. You are mine after all.”

  • Name: Rafi
  • Age: 26 years old
  • Height: 210 cm
  • Latent Magic Rank: 5 (ex-Year 3)
  • Personality: Aloof, Protective
  • Strength: Observant, Healing, Physical Power
  • Weakness: Following any orders given, Thunder
  • Favorite Food: vegetables and fishes

“Say it and I shall follow.”

Other Characters

 

Features

Side scrolling maps! You can interact with the dazzling places and characters around. There are two world; Manche City and Leodetable Institute (5 towers and a dormitory). Find all the hidden things to proceed with the story!  Wisely use the freetime after school between extra lesson, side quests and interaction with others.

 

Visual novel style at the most important events and be captured by the beauty of every scenes; but be careful! There's always traps and time limited choices you have to face! Date the character you want to unlock a whole new plot that will drown you even further in the mysteries and adventures of Magical World!

RPG attribute from battle to leveling system. Help Adri and friends to control all of his potential! 

Unique monsters and enemies; separated by their level and story stages! 

Other features

  • Side missions and puzzles
  • 2 Main Stories and 4 Love Interests
  • Mini Encyclopedia
  • Story Logs
  • 600,000 words+
  • 3 endings for each love interests
  • Multiple bad endings 

Overall Project Plan

 

The plan is to develop "Leodetable Institute" in 15 months time-frame. It will be finished around autumn, October 2018. The story has been through four years of careful planning and is ready to be implemented into the game. I will update the progress at least twice a month at Tumblr and Patreon, so you can know precisely where is the development is going.

Most of my time is for the programming section because of the story branching and sub-consequences for your choices. This is my third project after a game-jam called "Toilet Story" (2015) and a short game called "Immer Sie" back in 2014 (2nd Winner of Game Concept Competition @ Telkom).

As years passed, I decided it is time to create what I have been planning, no matter what. The fund will mostly go to this project's development such as; pay the software extra codes/effects, pay the bills and making sure I have something to eat. It'll be a bit slow because I am going to work this side-by-side with my patreon and side jobs. I believe in trusting my guts and I know this will work.

Unexpected expenses are from my own bank account and will be strengthened  by 8% of the funding plan.

How this works

The finished game will be published in itch.io page around October 2018. The backers who have pledged "Early Birds ~ Pla Magic User", "The Game ~ Pla Magic User", "Minister of Magic" and "Master of Magic" will be given itch.io download keys. Simply make an itch.io account, click the Download Key's link, and claim ownership to prevent anyone else from using it. After claiming ownership, you will be directed to the download page for Mac/Windows.

What about steam? Are you going to put Leodetable Institute in Greenlight?

I will see how this project is going to be first. If there are many requests my project to be there after its launch, I will work it around!

 

Stretch Goals

Everything here based on USD.

($5600) Upgrade Soundtracks

So far, I've been composing the soundtrack on my own. The original plan is to make a contract with talented composers (a mix between dark ages and sci-fi) and singers (for several climax events and ending credits). If this stretch goal is reached, every soundtrack will be remade by more professional artist.

($6000) More CGs and Dungeons

Want more dazzling CGs of these hotties? More dungeons to explore? If we reach this goal, I will make several CGs, Comic Panel and Extra Illustration throughout the game you can find.

($7000) 6th Route

Do I count them wrong? No! Since the main game already have a secret love interest, there is always one character everyone loves but there is no route for this cutie! Rendra is the friendly and the sanest wizard who help Adri through his time in the Institute. If this stretch goal is reached, I am going to open his story and you can fu--, I mean, love Rendra. His true story will be revealed along side with the secret love interest, a.k.a. the true route.

Any surpluses will be used for future projects.

 

THE TEAM

Vya! My name is Erda Enos who is the main creator of "Leodetable Institute"... and the one who got yelled for making too many dark-tragic stories  too many times. I mean, come on, I know many like drama too, right?

Once upon a time, I was a part of game called "Immer Sie". This game currently is not available anymore but it won the 2nd place of a Game Concept Competition in my country.

 

(Courtesy to Sagtavillia, the main artist of "Immer Sie")

It's a horror action adventure (+/-15 minutes) and is under the list of concept game that is going to be made... Although, I cannot handle to watch or play anything "horror", I love to make this kind of story and make people cry (I still don't know why).

Becoming a game developer is my childhood dream. I first learned how to make one when I'm in Junior High with RPGMaker 2003. It became the basic logic of everything I planned out for my projects. Programming is not my ace skill and I stumble around it quite often. Now. I'm jumping bandwagon to Unity and find it's soooo amazing! Just plain fantastic.

At this point, there are many sides that help me out so much!

  • Bellpickle Troops
    • We are a circle from our time in college. My friends and I worked together to sell merchandises like fanarts and fanfictions in several Anime Festivals. They will be helping me to market the project!
    • They are also helping me with alpha testing for the core mechanics to works. Especially, the consequences plot and the flow of the project. (and made them angst with all the unique choices I put.)
  • Tallis1990
    • The very first online friend of mine that helped me gathering the ideas. Unfortunately, it has been years since the last time I saw her online.
  • SweetChiel
    • A very talented artist who is also developing a visual novel! She helped me so, so much, especially with romantic advances and proof-reading inside the game.
  • AkatsukiShin
    • The translator and editor for the first stage, I learned many things from her. Although, she is no longer available due her office work.
  • SinisTer
    • The translator and editor for side quests. His idea of encouragement is slapping me across my face then pointing out my mistakes on the script. He's a great editor.
  • Hiboutchoux
    • A good friend of mine who once worked on an blog: English Boys Love Games in Tumblr. They advertised almost every of my progress in Leodetable Institute and encourage me to keep on trying.
  • Nonoise, Pijon and kas
    • Three first patrons from patreon. Without you guys, I'll be already scrapping junks and stop working on my love and live.

I have yet to find a composer to work with. There are several people who caught my attention but not enough. I am really wishing to find a composer who can make a unique atmospheric soundtrack without being too typical.

Other Ways to Help

Opinions/Critiques are one of the things that will greatly support my motivation. So, please go ahead and talk to me! Anything you think, find or wish to convey, I will gladly receive them. I love it when people want to talk about my children. I can be cynical and sadistic at the same time. Mwahahaha. <3

If you wish to help me on monthly basis, I have a patreon which secure my daily life needs and other arts related from my freelance job as illustrator. In there, for you who pledge $8+, you will able to see a sneak peek of every on going work I am doing, including Leodetable Institute, in their full glory.

Lastly, spread the words! If there are people you know love to play BL a.k.a. yaoi visual novel, let them know about "Leodetable Institute"! Feel free to try the demo and/or get to know my writing style via AO3 (they are mostly fan fictions. So, beware.).

Risk and Challenges

In any production, there is always something to put at risk such as; unexpected technical problems and my daily life. I have been working on this project for four years continuously with all real life problems hindered me from many directions. Nevertheless, I am stubborn. "Believe + Hardwork = Perfection" is what I hold for my entire life.

On the other hand, the most part of the concepts, soundtracks and scripts are already done. So, I am going to jump to the game implementation inside the 15 months time-frame. I can track down everything that will be needed immediately without delay. It is also the reason why I chose to do this project alone. 

Although it is sounded good and all, I will need more time to test everything.

 

That's all for today. I hope you are interested to help me fund "Leodetable Institute".

May the stars bless your path.
story_txt:
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Title: Leodetable Institute
Developer: Dearsoul Visual
Genre: Fantasy
Rating: R-18
Language: English
Engine: RPG Maker MV, Unity
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
A BL (Boys Love a.k.a. Male and Male romance story) visual novel with RPG attribute to play the world. Side scrolling map.

Summary
In the world of Varr, magic was a major power, lauded yet feared by all. The leaders of the past once forbade the practice of sorcery and death sentence would befall those who dared to use it. The gods, enraged by such deed, decided to destroy their life by releasing a beast known as "Magaran".
The last few wizards managed to calm the gods and return Magaran to where it came from. They made a pact with the leaders of humans and the gods, which was to gather every single person bearing the potential of magic in order to teach them how to control their power, so that they would not rebel against the kings. Leodetable Institute was one of those. The existence of the institute was still appalling to commoners that they had to remain hidden while gathering their students.
Adri, a blind tailor who've lost his memories five years ago, found a strange letter behind his workshop. It detected him as a dangerous latent wizard. By seconds, The Hunters dragged him to a broken door of dimension and put him under custody. He was forced to become Leodetable Institute's student and to learn control his power in minimum four years study without any contact from outsider.
The characters which Adri could follow were four. Saputra was Adri's roommate who talked so much. They quarreled almost every day. The captain of O.S. (Organization of Student), Wood, seemed love to annoy Adri so much to the point Adri wished to never know him. Seal and Rafi were the main character's classmates with abuser-and-his-victim relationship.
As he live under its roof, Adri found out that the minister of this institute was planning to overthrow the kingdom. Seal wanted to counter-act that and invited Adri to be one of his member. At the same time, Di-On, a mysterious kid, told him to get out of there as soon as possible.
Will Adri stay or will he go? [ErdaEnos]

 

Characters


Name: Adri
Age: Appears 21 years old
Height: 170 cm 
Latent Magic Rank: 0
Personality: Brotherly and strong-willed
Strength: Open minded, Mental Sights
Weakness: Selfless, Physically Blind, Water
Favorite Food: Red Soil and worms.

“The past can hurt you but the way I face it, you can either run from it or learn from it.”


Name: Saputra
Age: 19 years old
Height: 190 cm
Latent Magic Rank: 3 (Year 3)
Personality: Ambitious
Strength: Observant, Bookworm
Weakness: Perfectionist
Favorite Food: Raw Steak

“Don’t do something permanently stupid, just because you are temporarily upset.”


Name: Seal
Age: Appears 24 years old
Height: 172 cm
Latent Magic Rank: 3 (ex-Year 3)
Personality: Mischievous
Strength: Strong willed, Mysterious
Weakness: Infamous, Adri
Favorite Food: Anything Spicy

“All you need to know ish that my love ish yours.”


Name: Lord Wynter Wood (Wood)
Age: 24 years old
Height: 183 cm
Latent Magic Rank: 2 (Year 6)
Personality: Cheerful Tyrant
Strength: Power of Lordship, History
Weakness: Prideful, Mood Swings
Favorite Food: Treacle Tart

“Be happy and feel blessed. You are mine after all.”


Name: Rafi
Age: 26 years old
Height: 210 cm
Latent Magic Rank: 5 (ex-Year 3)
Personality: Aloof, Protective
Strength: Observant, Healing, Physical Power
Weakness: Following any orders given, Thunder
Favorite Food: vegetables and fishes

“Say it and I shall follow.”
Other Characters

 
Features

Side scrolling maps! You can interact with the dazzling places and characters around. There are two world; Manche City and Leodetable Institute (5 towers and a dormitory). Find all the hidden things to proceed with the story!  Wisely use the freetime after school between extra lesson, side quests and interaction with others.
 
Visual novel style at the most important events and be captured by the beauty of every scenes; but be careful! There's always traps and time limited choices you have to face! Date the character you want to unlock a whole new plot that will drown you even further in the mysteries and adventures of Magical World!

RPG attribute from battle to leveling system. Help Adri and friends to control all of his potential! 

Unique monsters and enemies; separated by their level and story stages! 
Other features

Side missions and puzzles
2 Main Stories and 4 Love Interests
Mini Encyclopedia
Story Logs
600,000 words+
3 endings for each love interests
Multiple bad endings 

Overall Project Plan
 

The plan is to develop "Leodetable Institute" in 15 months time-frame. It will be finished around autumn, October 2018. The story has been through four years of careful planning and is ready to be implemented into the game. I will update the progress at least twice a month at Tumblr and Patreon, so you can know precisely where is the development is going.
Most of my time is for the programming section because of the story branching and sub-consequences for your choices. This is my third project after a game-jam called "Toilet Story" (2015) and a short game called "Immer Sie" back in 2014 (2nd Winner of Game Concept Competition @ Telkom).
As years passed, I decided it is time to create what I have been planning, no matter what. The fund will mostly go to this project's development such as; pay the software extra codes/effects, pay the bills and making sure I have something to eat. It'll be a bit slow because I am going to work this side-by-side with my patreon and side jobs. I believe in trusting my guts and I know this will work.
Unexpected expenses are from my own bank account and will be strengthened  by 8% of the funding plan.
How this works
The finished game will be published in itch.io page around October 2018. The backers who have pledged "Early Birds ~ Pla Magic User", "The Game ~ Pla Magic User", "Minister of Magic" and "Master of Magic" will be given itch.io download keys. Simply make an itch.io account, click the Download Key's link, and claim ownership to prevent anyone else from using it. After claiming ownership, you will be directed to the download page for Mac/Windows.
What about steam? Are you going to put Leodetable Institute in Greenlight?
I will see how this project is going to be first. If there are many requests my project to be there after its launch, I will work it around!
 
Stretch Goals
Everything here based on USD.

($5600) Upgrade Soundtracks
So far, I've been composing the soundtrack on my own. The original plan is to make a contract with talented composers (a mix between dark ages and sci-fi) and singers (for several climax events and ending credits). If this stretch goal is reached, every soundtrack will be remade by more professional artist.

($6000) More CGs and Dungeons
Want more dazzling CGs of these hotties? More dungeons to explore? If we reach this goal, I will make several CGs, Comic Panel and Extra Illustration throughout the game you can find.

($7000) 6th Route
Do I count them wrong? No! Since the main game already have a secret love interest, there is always one character everyone loves but there is no route for this cutie! Rendra is the friendly and the sanest wizard who help Adri through his time in the Institute. If this stretch goal is reached, I am going to open his story and you can fu--, I mean, love Rendra. His true story will be revealed along side with the secret love interest, a.k.a. the true route.
Any surpluses will be used for future projects.
 
THE TEAM
Vya! My name is Erda Enos who is the main creator of "Leodetable Institute"... and the one who got yelled for making too many dark-tragic stories  too many times. I mean, come on, I know many like drama too, right?
Once upon a time, I was a part of game called "Immer Sie". This game currently is not available anymore but it won the 2nd place of a Game Concept Competition in my country.
 
(Courtesy to Sagtavillia, the main artist of "Immer Sie")
It's a horror action adventure (+/-15 minutes) and is under the list of concept game that is going to be made... Although, I cannot handle to watch or play anything "horror", I love to make this kind of story and make people cry (I still don't know why).
Becoming a game developer is my childhood dream. I first learned how to make one when I'm in Junior High with RPGMaker 2003. It became the basic logic of everything I planned out for my projects. Programming is not my ace skill and I stumble around it quite often. Now. I'm jumping bandwagon to Unity and find it's soooo amazing! Just plain fantastic.
At this point, there are many sides that help me out so much!


Bellpickle Troops
We are a circle from our time in college. My friends and I worked together to sell merchandises like fanarts and fanfictions in several Anime Festivals. They will be helping me to market the project!
They are also helping me with alpha testing for the core mechanics to works. Especially, the consequences plot and the flow of the project. (and made them angst with all the unique choices I put.)



Tallis1990The very first online friend of mine that helped me gathering the ideas. Unfortunately, it has been years since the last time I saw her online.


SweetChielA very talented artist who is also developing a visual novel! She helped me so, so much, especially with romantic advances and proof-reading inside the game.


AkatsukiShinThe translator and editor for the first stage, I learned many things from her. Although, she is no longer available due her office work.


SinisTerThe translator and editor for side quests. His idea of encouragement is slapping me across my face then pointing out my mistakes on the script. He's a great editor.


HiboutchouxA good friend of mine who once worked on an blog: English Boys Love Games in Tumblr. They advertised almost every of my progress in Leodetable Institute and encourage me to keep on trying.


Nonoise, Pijon and kasThree first patrons from patreon. Without you guys, I'll be already scrapping junks and stop working on my love and live.


I have yet to find a composer to work with. There are several people who caught my attention but not enough. I am really wishing to find a composer who can make a unique atmospheric soundtrack without being too typical.
Other Ways to Help
Opinions/Critiques are one of the things that will greatly support my motivation. So, please go ahead and talk to me! Anything you think, find or wish to convey, I will gladly receive them. I love it when people want to talk about my children. I can be cynical and sadistic at the same time. Mwahahaha. <3
If you wish to help me on monthly basis, I have a patreon which secure my daily life needs and other arts related from my freelance job as illustrator. In there, for you who pledge $8+, you will able to see a sneak peek of every on going work I am doing, including Leodetable Institute, in their full glory.
Lastly, spread the words! If there are people you know love to play BL a.k.a. yaoi visual novel, let them know about "Leodetable Institute"! Feel free to try the demo and/or get to know my writing style via AO3 (they are mostly fan fictions. So, beware.).
Risk and Challenges
In any production, there is always something to put at risk such as; unexpected technical problems and my daily life. I have been working on this project for four years continuously with all real life problems hindered me from many directions. Nevertheless, I am stubborn. "Believe + Hardwork = Perfection" is what I hold for my entire life.
On the other hand, the most part of the concepts, soundtracks and scripts are already done. So, I am going to jump to the game implementation inside the 15 months time-frame. I can track down everything that will be needed immediately without delay. It is also the reason why I chose to do this project alone. 
Although it is sounded good and all, I will need more time to test everything.
 
That's all for today. I hope you are interested to help me fund "Leodetable Institute".
May the stars bless your path.

story:
DOWNLOAD HERE! http://www.neutrinoboy.com/electron/Download.html

 

Electron!

A futuristic motorcycle racing game with a twist. Create walls of crackling electricity behind you as you speed through levels at hundreds of miles per hour! Place your walls carefully, and drive strategically to ensure your opponent’s demise; time your jumps, and avoid crashing into walls to prevent your own. With up to four players bent on destroying you on the map at a given time, the competition gets fierce.

Gameplay!

You play the role of a high speed motorcyclist, pitted in a fight to the death against others like you. You are given motorcycles with the ability to create walls behind them, as well as brake and boost. The single objective: Survive

Featuring a rich single player and a vast multiplayer with infinite replay-ability, whether staring down your own computer or settling the score with your friends, the action is guaranteed to be fast and intense!

Graphics!

Turn beautiful curves in a multicolored true-3d landscape.  Rising and falling with the level, your bike carves walls of energy into the ground. Nothing better captures the feeling of racing in and around these battles than pictures, and so we will let them do the talking.

Features!

High speed, physics based racing.

Battles with walls that can be turned on and off, and disappear behind you after having lived their lives.

Variable steering, and the ability to jump over any walls in your way.

Smart AI, programmed to seek you out, and destroy everything in their way.

Custom Colors!

10 Different Stages already!

Fast paced multiplayer!

 

 

Funds!

Although much of the game has been developed already, there still remains much to be done. The funds we are seeking are slated to be used to purchase assets that we have been unable to produce ourselves: such as more music, higher quality art, and graphically improved levels.

The remaining funds will be put towards developing more levels, as well as adding in a control customization option! Other possible additions to the game include:

  • A genuine story mode! The story is all written, but not yet included.
  • Multiple bike models to choose from.
  • Gamepad support.
  • In-game video capture support!

We are also open to suggestions from our fans! If you love or hate any of these ideas, or those not listed, let us know! We want this game to be amazing FOR YOU!

Distribution!

Right now the game is only being released for PC and Mac as a downloadable client. The download is currently hosted on my site during the open beta, though partnering with steam or another similar program is not out of the realm of possibilities once the game is released.

One of the goals of this game, is should we have enough funds, to port ELECTRON to the iOS and Android market! That way everyone can also play it on the go! The mental image of a kid on the subway, tilt-steering their cycle, as it races past an opponent – it’s the dream.

More!

To find out more about the game, and to try out the open-beta, please stop by our website at:

ELECTRON

Goodies! (Watermarked...sorry) Click the links for the full-sized images :]

Wallpaper!

T-Shirt!

Mouse-pad!

and finally, the EPIC wall-hanging!

All spread-out!

The Wall Hanging is almost 5 feet long, and2.5 feet tall! Comes with dowel rods (and slots) for hanging! It is pretty awesome.

story:
What is Fashion Stories Boutique?

Fashion Stories Boutique is an exciting fashion game with a unique fantasy theme. Players have the opportunity to explore a magical world full of amazing designs and items.

Join us in this fantastic trip to the world of fashion.

Estimated release date: 1st December 2014




Design Book: Thousands of amazing designs are waiting for you to unlock them. 

  • Open Design Packs
  • Create your favorite clothes
  • Dress your model with the clothes of your dreams


Run Your Boutique: 

  • Display clothes and accessories.
  • Craft materials in order to display clothes.
  • Decorate your Boutique. A huge collection of decorative items is available.
  • Expand your boutique and find many surprises.




Dress Up Your Model: Do you want to become a queen, a fairy or an elf? Create a new YOU every day!

  • A wide variety of clothes, accessories, hairstyles and makeup are available
  • Create your own fantastic style!


Enter Voting Contests: 

  • Vote for the best dressed models.
  • Get exciting prizes.
  • Climb on top of the leader boards!


Portals: Travel your models through magical portals.

  • Choose your models.
  • Win unique rewards!



Quests: Complete quests and earn opals in order to buy design packs.



Many surprises will make the gaming experience more exciting. 




After 3 years of successfully running our GalaStories title, we decided it is time to bring to our community a new game. A new fashion game with different game play and better design will provide the players with an even more engaging content.

Like most indie studios we started off as a group of friends in an MMO community wanting to bring our gaming experience to other players. We have been busy with developing games and cover the costs ourselves in order to present the best possible outcome. Having developed 6 original titles and reached more than 20 million users in total, we now turn to your help:

Donate any amount from $15 to $800 and get a head start into Fashion Stories Boutique. By helping us out, you would be covering server expenses, bringing more and better quality of graphics, as well as helping us add content. Any amount that we raise from the campaign will be used solely for the purposes of bringing a higher quality game.

story:
"Destiny I"

Hi. My name is Steven Bonnell II, more well known in the Starcraft community as "Destiny". For the first time in my life I've decided that I want to host a tournament, combining the best people I can invite from America, Europe and Korea with the top 8 warriors from the North American ladder.

The first (and hopefully not the last...) tournament I host will be known as "Destiny I".

Funding goals/distribution

My budget for this tournament is $5,000.

  • $200 will go towards the Korean/English bilingual admin I have chosen. He'll be responsible for doing vetos/setting up games and doing post game/post group interviews, if we decide to do them.
  • $200 will go towards art work from the artist. This includes branding/logo, slides between games, and overlays for in game.
  • $600 will go towards casters. I will be paying each invited caster $100 for casting 1 day, meaning I will need 6 different casters for the tournament. If I'm not able to find 6, I'll repeat some casters. So far I've confirmed Incontrol, ToD, Nathanias and Minigun as casters.
  • $500 goes towards Indiegogo fees for fundraising.
  • $4000 will go towards the prize pool. The distribution will be as follows: 1st place $1,600, 2nd place $800, 3rd-4th place $400, 5th-8th place $200.
  • Extra money raised from the Indiegogo will be put towards future tournaments (Destiny II).

Tournament Format

I will be drafting 8 players from the top of the North American ladder. In order to qualify from there, the following conditions must be met -

  • You must be playing on an account who's name reflects the person playing it (no barcodes!)
  • You must be the only person laddering on the account.
  • You can't hack, cheat, boost, trade wins or commit any other obviously silly shenanigans.
  • The qualification period for the ladder will end on Sunday, August 3rd, 23:59 EST. At that point I will take the top 8, non-barcoded accounts and invite them to the tournament.

The other 8 players will be invited in. I'll announce the invites as I confirm them.

The tournament will function as follows: the 8 people drafted from the ladder and the 8 invitees will be shuffled into 4 groups of 4 with 2 people from each category being in each group. Each of the groups will play 6 matches (plus a possible sudden death match, if needed) to determine who moves on. Once the 8 group stage survivors have been determined, they will feed into an 8 player bracket where bo5's will be played for quarter finals, then bo7's for semi-finals and a bo9 for the grind final to determine the winner. There will be no 3rd-4th place match.

The group matches will take place one group per day, starting on August 5th and ending on August 8th. The quarter final bracket will start on August 9th, with the semi-finals and grand finals being played on Sunday, August 10th.

All games will start at 10 AM EST (okay time for Americans, perfect time for Europeans, okay time for Koreans) and will probably carry on until about 2-3PM EST, though we'll try to move as briskly as possible.

Future goals

If this tournament is successful, I'd like to take what I learn from this and carry it forward into another tournament. Future tournaments may have more interesting or fun themes, but for now I'd like to keep things basic and just display amazing games with great casters and top-tier players.

Following this tournament I'll provide a detailed write-up of viewership stats and how much money I was able to generate via sponsorships/ad revenue/etc...in a similar fashion to Totalbiscuit's Shoutcraft "post-mortem" reports to give people a better idea about how the procurement and expenditure of said funding works in tournaments like these.

    Can't donate?

    If you're not able to contribute financially, there are still ways you can help! There are plenty of great resources available in both your school and online that will assist you in searching for a place of employment so you can collect and subsequently donate your first paycheck to me.

    In lieu of that, you can follow me on twitter for updates @steven_bonnell. I'll have updates posted on my website in the coming few days as well.

story:
WELCOME TO INRADIUS!

A brand new creative and innovative application that connects you to everything you need based on your current location. This app makes running errands, dining out, and traveling convenient, easy, and all within the touch of a button. With a GPS feature that always knows where you are, you no longer have to scour the internet or local yellow pages to do the most basic things like making reservations at your favorite restaurant, scheduling a hair or nail appointment, finding a barbershop for “your style” haircut, or even getting cab service when you most need it.  Now you simply login and all of these services are at your fingertips, LITERALLY! 


WHAT MAKES US UNIQUE?                                                         

Our two-way communication and feedback system between vendor and user is the central core of our app. The individual times, such as seating, ordering, delivery, appointment booking, and arrival, are all updated by that participating vendor. This ensures that our users have the latest up-to-date info for planning purposes. This unique feature differentiates InRadius from other apps.

 

 

 

SERVICES

Gas Station: Locates and ranks nearest stations by gas prices.

Medical & Dental Offices: Locates local offices and identifies insurance type accepted. Also features the ability to complete and submit non-sensitive sections of the patient registration form ahead of your appointment.

Pet Grooming: Locates and reserve local pet grooming services.

Restaurant: Locates and ranks nearest restaurants by service times (Delivery, Pickup, or Seating) and allow users to reserve seating or order from menu.

Nail Salon: Locates the nearest salon and ranks according to next open reservation time.

Hair Care: Users can find local barber or hair salon and directly reserve an appointment.

Taxi: This feature allows direct taxi contact through map or list mode. GPS feature allows taxi to accept fare and guided pickup.

LANGUAGE SELECTION

Users can select from 7 major languages of their choice.

VENDOR AWARDS

Vendors will be allowed to provide special discounts to compensate for higher service times (Delivery, Pickup, and Seating).


TIMELINE

The development and testing process for InRadius is expected to take 7 months to complete. The beta version should be available for qualified users within 5 months of funding. Both beta and completed versions will be available for download across iOS and Android platforms.

RESTAURANT FEATURE

 

 

With our restaurant tab, you can search local restaurants, check out the menu, and make reservations based on three vendor-updated times: Seating, Pickup, and Delivery. You can even enable the countdown timer, with alert, that enables absolute control of your time. For those looking to pick up and go, or simply want the luxury of having it delivered, each restaurant will have their menu uploaded for your review. You can go over the menu, choose your favorite dish or explore new cuisine, and add to your checkout cart. Your dish comes with an estimated prep time, and once approved, simply check out, review your cart, and pay.

 

COUNTDOWN FEATURE

Yes, there is also the countdown timer for this as well. That's correct, no more waiting in line or phone orders with bad reception that always seems to end in a wrong order. With this quick easy to use tool, your order is 100% correct, just the way you deserve it.

TAXICAB FEATURE

And that’s not all, if you’re like me, I like to frequent a bar from time to time, to socialize and have a good time. Of course, we all know the kind of safety issues this can pose if you drink and drive. And we also know that after last call, it’s time to head home. We spend additional time trying to locate a cab through endless calls and wait times, just to hear “I’m sorry, we have nothing in the area, our closest cab can get to you within 45 minutes.” Now you’re stuck outside the bar waiting for a safe ride home. WELL, NO MORE! With our Hail a Cab tab, finding a ride home or to the next party destination has never been easier.

 

      

 

Through our attractive map and list views, you will see ALL of the cabs, and I do mean the actual cab closest to you, that are available from numerous companies that are InRadius of your location, and for more convenience they will be color coded by company. The taxi service will automatically know where you are, utilizing our vendor version of InRadius. You can then “hail it” and even pay through the app once you have arrived safely to you destination.  Just like our other services, there will be a timer that lets you know just when your cab will arrive.

 

      

 

OTHER FEATURED SERVICES

Included will be the ability to search for local professional Pet Grooming, Nail Salon, Hair Care, Medical and Dental offices, and also Gas Stations in your radius. And stay tuned, there are many more services available.

Similar to the previously mentioned features, the hair care tab allows the user to locate local barbershops and hair salons. The user can review shops and salons by style, prices, and customer reviews. This feature also provides current available appointment slots for individual stylists. Once a stylist from a particular location is chosen, an appointment is booked with a minimal deposited amount agreed upon by the vendor (will be deducted from total cost of service) to ensure seating at the user's convenience.

PAYMENT & SECURITY

Secure account setup and payment is verified by integrating security into our application development process. Users can pay securely using major credit cards and through PayPal.

PRODUCTION COSTS

iOS& Android Development: $35,000

Backend Development: $15,000

THANK YOU!

Thank you for allowing us to share this amazing app with you. We would love for you to be a part of making life more convenient.

InRadius: Life Made Easy!

story:
Short Summary

We're creating an innovative game inclusive of custom built sets for Steamcon V: Around the World and we need your support to fund our efforts!

What We Need & What You Get

We need $500 for the suite and $500 for sets. The balance of the funds raised here on indiegogo will go toward campaign fees and perks.

Anything we raise over and above that will go towards future games to which all are invited!

All perks will be available at the Rise of Aester gaming suite starting on the first day of Steamcon (Friday, October 25). If you are not attending Steamcon, your perks will be mailed to you.

Thank you!

We are so grateful for your ongoing support in our community and we look forward to hosting an incredible game for you this year!
